Title: Abanyarwanda batatu barinda pariki bagiye guhembwa ku rwego rwa Afurika
Body:
Abanyarwanda barimo Mpumuje Leonidas, Nzuki Anthony na Jean Nepomuscene Musekura bari mu barinzi 50 ba Pariki bazashimirwa uyu mwaka mu bihembo bizwi nka ‘African Rangers Awards’ biteganyijwe kuwa 15 Ugushyingo 2019 i Accra muri Ghana.
Abanyarwanda barimo Mpumuje Leonidas, Nzuki Anthony na Jean Nepomuscene Musekura bari mu barinzi 50 ba Pariki bazashimirwa uyu mwaka mu bihembo bizwi nka ‘African Rangers Awards’ biteganyijwe kuwa 15 Ugushyingo 2019 i Accra muri Ghana.
Mpumuje akuriye itsinda rishinzwe kurinda no kwita ku Nkura muri pariki y’Akagera ari naho mugenzi we Nzuki akora nk’umukuru w’agashami k’abarinzi mu gihe Musekura ari umurinzi muri pariki y’Ibirunga.
The African Ranger Awards ni gahunda igamije gushimira abarinzi b’amapariki ku bw’umusanzu w’intagereranywa batanga mu kurinda inyamaswa n’urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima ku mugabane wa Afurika.
Iyi gahunda yatangijwe muri 2017 n’umuherwe w’Umushinwa akaba na nyiri Alibaba ikigo kimenyerewe mu bucuruzi bwo kuri Internet, Jack Ma, abinyujije mu muryango yashinze ushinzwe kubungabunga ibidukikije ‘Paradise Foundation’
Uyu muhango ugamije kuzirikana umurimo ukorwa n’abarinzi ba pariki no gukora ubukangurambaga ku rwego rw’Isi ku kamaro ko kurinda urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima biboneka muri Afurika.
Imibare igaragaza ko mu 2016, 82% by’abarinda pariki muri Afurika bahuye n’ibyago byashoboraga gutuma bapfa mu gihe abangana na 60% batewe na ba rushimusi.
Mu 2015 nibura abarinda pariki 107 barishwe ubwo bari mu kazi kabo naho hagati ya 2006 na 2016 abarinzi ba pariki barenga 1000 bemeye kubura ubuzima bwabo mu kazi ko kurinda inyamaswa.
Muri ibi bihembo by’uyu mwaka hahatanaga abagera ku 115, baturutse mu bihugu 17 byo muri Afurika.
Bimwe mu bigenderwaho hatoranywa uhabwa ibihembo harimo ubwitange n’umusanzu mu kurinda pariki, ibyago n’ingorane yabashije guhangana nabyo ndetse n’ubushobozi mu by’imiyoborere.
The New Times yanditse ko Jack Ma washinze umuryango utanga ibi bihembo yavuze ko aha agaciro akazi abarinda pariki bakora.
Ati “Ubwitange bw’abarinzi ba pariki bunkora k’umutima bukantera n’imbaraga, turizera ko abantu benshi bazaha agaciro kubungabunga inyamaswa n’ibidukikije karemano bikorwa n’abarinzi ba parike”
Umuyobozi Mukuru Ushinzwe ubukerarugendo mu Kigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere (RDB), Belise Kariza, yavuze ko umurava w’abarinda pariki ari ingenzi mu rugendo rw’igihugu ruganisha ku bukerarugendo bushikamye.
Ati “Hatari akazi gakomeye n’ubwitange bigaragazwa n’abarinzi ba pariki bacu, iterambere ry’ubukerarugendo bw’u Rwanda ntiryari gushoboka, bari ku isonga mu kubungabunga urusobe rw’ibidukikije ari nayo mpamvu dushimira umuryango Paradise Foundation ku kuzirikana abarinzi b’amapariki muri Afurika n’akamaro kabo k’ingenzi”.

Title: Byinshi ku Nkura, imwe mu nyamaswa zikaze ku Isi zikundwa na ba mukerarugendo
Body:
Inkura ni imwe mu nyamaswa nini zikundwa na ba mukerarugendo ku buryo pariki izifite iba yihariye icyo gikundiro. Pariki y’Akagera mu Rwanda, ni umwe mu zifite Inkura harimo izakuwe muri Afurika y’Epfo n’izavuye muri Repubulika ya Tchèque.
Inkura ni imwe mu nyamaswa nini zikundwa na ba mukerarugendo ku buryo pariki izifite iba yihariye icyo gikundiro. Pariki y’Akagera mu Rwanda, ni umwe mu zifite Inkura harimo izakuwe muri Afurika y’Epfo n’izavuye muri Repubulika ya Tchèque.
Inkura niyo nyamabere ya kabiri nini ku Isi nyuma y’inzovu. Ni imwe kandi mu zikaze. Ni zimwe mu nyamaswa zagiye zicika ahantu hatandukanye bitewe no kubangamirwa n’ibikorwa bya muntu ari yo mpamvu ababungabunga urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima barimo kugerageza kuzitaho ngo zigwire.
Mu kinyejana cyashize habarwaga inkura zirenga ibihumbi 500 ku Isi, ubu zirabarirwa mu bihumbi 30 ziba mu mashyamba bitewe na ba rushimusi. Inkura z’umukara zisigaye ku Isi zibarirwa mu 5500, izo mu bwoko bwa Javan ni 60, naho izo mu bwa Sumatran ni 100.
Ubuzima bw’inkura, imiterere yazo, ubunini bwazo n’ibindi zihariye, bituma benshi bazitangarira.
-Inkomo y’izina ‘Rhinoceros’ : Inkomoko y’izina Rhinoceros ari yo Nkura mu Kinyarwanda, rikomoka mu magambo abiri y’ururimi rw’Ikigiriki ariyo ‘Rhino’ bivuga izuru na ‘Keras’ bivuga ihembe, muri make iyo uhinnye izina ryayo ukayita Rhino gusa uba uvuze izuru.
-Imiterere: Ubwoko bw’Inkura buba bunini ni Inkura z’umweru dore ko ishobora kugira uburebure bwa metero hagati 3.7 n’ubuhagarike ( kuva ku kimono ugera ku rutugu) bwa metero 1.8 ikagira uburemere bwa toni ebyiri n’ibiro 300.
Inkura nto ni izitwa Sumatran zigira uburebure bwa metero eshatu n’ubuhagarike bwa metero 1.8 n’uburemere bw’ibiro 800, mu gihe Inkura ikivuka ipima hagati y’ibiro 40 na 64.
-Kororoka: Inkura ihaka amezi ari hagati 14 na 18, inkura nto yavutse imara ibyumweru bibiri itunzwe no konka nyina gusa nyuma ikagenda imenyera ihereye ku kurya ibyatsi byoroshye.
Inkura nto ivukana ubwoya ku mubiri buyirinda ubukonje cyangwa gutwikwa n’izuba. Inkura ntishobora kongera kubyara iyo icyana yabyaye kitarakura ibintu bishobora gufata hagati y’imyaka itatu n’itanu. Ibi bitera Inkura z’ingabo kuba rimwe na rimwe zakwica Inkura nto kugira ngo zibone uko zibangurira nyina.
-Inkura zahoranye ubuhagarike bwa metero hafi 5: ubwoko bw’Inkura butagiraga ihembe buzwi nka ‘paraceratherium’ bwazimiye ku isi mu myaka miliyoni 30 ishize nkuko Siyansi ibivuga, bwagiraga ubuhagarike bwa metero 4.8, igihagararo inkura z’ubu zitakigira, kuko nk’Inkura y’umweru ishobora kugira ubuhagarike bwa metero 1.8.
-Inkura y’umweru n’Inkura y’umukara byose birasa ku ibara: uramutse wumvise aya mazina ushobora gucyeka ko imwe ari umukara indi ikaba umweru mu ibara, gusa zose zifite ibara ry’urwirungu, hari abavuga ko iri zina ‘white rhinos’ bivuze inkura z’umweru ryakomotse ku Baholandi babaga muri Afurika bazitaga ’Wijd’ (Wide) bashaka kuvuga inyamaswa ifite umunwa munini bikaza kumvwa nabi n’abavuga Icyongereza bayita ‘white’.
-Umubano wazo n’inyoni zitwa Oxpecker: Inkura zikunze kugaragara zifite Inyoni ku mutwe cyangwa ku mugongo gusa abahanga ntibavuga rumwe kuri uyu mubano kuko hari abavuga ko Inyoni zikunda kuba ziri ku Nkura kubera ko zizitoraho imbaragasa n’ibirondwe, mu gihe abandi bavuga ko izi nyoni zizfasha kumenya ko umwanzi azisatiriye.
Biterwa nuko ubushakashatsi bwagaragaje ko Inkura iyo nta nyoni zifite ku mugongo amahirwe yazo yo kuvumbura ko hari umwanzi uzisatiye ari 23% mu gihe iyo ifite inyoni ku mugongo amahirwe azamuka akaba 97%.
-Iganga mu ntera ndende: Inkura ishobora kuganga mu ntera ya metero hafi eshanu bikaba umwihariko ku ngabo kuko zibikora kugira ngo zerekane amakare yazo.
-Amase ni isoko y’amakuru ku Nkura: mu gihe abantu tubona amase nk’umwanda, ku Nkura ni isoko y’amakuru. Inkura iyo yinukirije amase y’indi ishobora kumenya amakuru menshi kuri yo, nk’imyaka yayo, niba ari ingabo cyangwa ingore cyangwa andi ayo ariyo yose ajyanye n’imyororokere yayo.
-Umusuzi wazo unuka nk’ikinyabutabire cya Sulfur: Inkura izwiho kugira umusuzi unuka cyane ku buryo ugereranwa n’ikinyabutabire cya Sulfar.
Wakomotseho n’imvugo iyo umusemburo wifashishwa mu gukora inzoga binyuze mu gutara iyo utanze ikinyabutabire cya ‘Hydrogene sulfide’ bitewe no kunuka babyita umusuzi w’Inkura (Rhino Fart).
Ihembe: Inkura igira amahembe abiri ahagana ku zuru iry’imbere rikaba rirerire kurusha iry’inyuma kandi akaba agizwe na Keratin, yo mu bwoko bw’inzara z’umuntu. Inkura zifashisha aya mahembe mu kwirwanaho, mu gihe cy’izuba ry’inshi ziyakoresha zicukura imizi y’ibiti yo kurya cyangwa zikayakoresha zicukura isoko y’amazi

Title: U Rwanda rwashyizwe mu hantu heza 19 ku Isi watemberera muri iyi mpeshyi
Body:
Ikinyamakuru CNN cyo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, kizwiho gukora inkuru zicukumbuye ku Isi, cyashyize u Rwanda mu hantu heza 19 ku Isi buri muntu yakwifuza kujya muri iyi mpeshyi ya 2019 akaba yaharuhukira.
Ikinyamakuru CNN cyo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, kizwiho gukora inkuru zicukumbuye ku Isi, cyashyize u Rwanda mu hantu heza 19 ku Isi buri muntu yakwifuza kujya muri iyi mpeshyi ya 2019 akaba yaharuhukira.
Iki kinyamakuru cyavuze ko niba uyu munsi waba urimo gutekereza aho wajya muri iyi mpeshyi, cyaguhitiyemo aha hantu kugira ngo uzahabone ibyo wifuza byose harimo u Rwanda.
Hamwe muri aha cyavuze ni Salar de Uyuni muri Bolivia, aka niko agace kanini ku Isi kagaragamo umunyu wafatanye gaherereye muri Bolivia muri Amerika y’Epfo.
Haza kandi Las Vegas iherereye muri Leta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, aha CCN ivuga ko ari ahantu hazataramirwa n’abahanzi barimo, Lady Gaga Janet, Jackson n’abandi.
Harimo Nova Scotia agace ko muri Canada, hari kandi Londres mu Bwongereza, Grand Canyon, muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Apollo 11 Anniversary Celebrations, Multiple US Cities, Tasmania, New York City, French Polynesia, Anchorage, Alaska, Singapore, Seattle, u Bufaransa, Churchill, Manitoba.
Iki kinyamakuru kandi kigaragaza u Rwanda nk’ahantu heza ho gutemberera muri iyi mpeshyi.
CNN ivuga ko iyo utekereje u Rwanda uhita utekereza Ingagi zo mu Birunga.
Kigaragaza kandi inyamanswa ziherereye muri Pariki y’Akagera nk’Intare, Ibisamagwe, Inkura, Inzovu n’Imbogo ko nabyo biri mu bikwiye gusurwa muri iyi mpeshyi.
Harimo kandi icumbi rigezweho, Magashi Camp riherereye muri iyi parike, aho abantu bashobora kuruhukira bakihera ijisho ibyiza bitatse u Rwanda.
Iri cumbi ryubatswe na Wilderness Safaris ryafunguwe mu Ukuboza 2018, ricungwa n’inzobere mu by’amacumbi muri Afurika y’Amajyepfo n’iy’Uburasirazuba.
Iri cumbi ry’ibyumba bitandatu byo gukambikamo, ryubatswe n’amahema, rikagira restaurant n’aho kuruhukira umuntu yicara yitegeye ubwiza bw’ikiyaga.
Aha hantu hihariye muri Pariki y’Akagera, abahakambitse bazajya babasha kwirebera ubwiza bw’inyamaswa amanywa n’ijoro, batemberejwe mu modoka cyangwa mu bwato.
Ikiyaga cya Rwanyakazinga cyubatsweho Magashi Camp, cyihariye ku mvubu nini muri Afurika, ingona ndende n’izindi nyamaswa zitandukanye mu gishanga kigikikije.
Imiterere y’imbere muri iri cumbi rigezweho n’imitako ihatamirijwe irimo iy’imigongo, ni iyo mu muco nyarwanda.
Abakunda koga, barisanzura muri piscine yabagenewe. Ibi bituma umunezero uba ari wose ku wagendereye Pariki y’Akagera, ifite inyamaswa eshanu zikomeye muri Afurika arizo intare, ingwe, inzovu, imbogo n’inkura.
Uri muri Pariki y’Akagera kandi ubona ibintu bitandukanye birimo amoko y’inyoni arenga 500.
Mu handi CNN yavuze heza ku Isi harimo Umujyi wa Washington, u Busuwisi, Kenya iherereye ku mugabane wa Afurika na Norvège.
Muri Gicurasi nabwo u Rwanda rwaje ku rutonde rwakozwe n’ikinyamakuru Business Insider, rugaragaza ahantu heza buri wese ufite amafaranga arimo gusura mu mwaka wa 2019, akaba yizeye kuba yahagirira ibihe byiza.
Ni urutonde rwakozwe nyuma yo kugenzura ibirebana n’ibishya biri aho hantu, ibikwiye gusurwa bitarakendera, ibizagusigira urwibutso n’impinduka zikomeye mu buzima bwawe.

Title: U Rwanda ruri kwiga uko rwakumira imodoka zishaje cyane zigurwa mu mahanga
Body:
Ikigo cy’Igihugu cyo kubungabunga Ibidukikije (REMA) cyatangaje ko hari kwigwa uko imodoka zishaje cyane zigurwa mu mahanga, zakumirwa kwinjizwa mu Rwanda mu kugabanya umwuka wanduye no kurinda ingaruka wagira ku baturage.
Ikigo cy’Igihugu cyo kubungabunga Ibidukikije (REMA) cyatangaje ko hari kwigwa uko imodoka zishaje cyane zigurwa mu mahanga, zakumirwa kwinjizwa mu Rwanda mu kugabanya umwuka wanduye no kurinda ingaruka wagira ku baturage.
Ubushakashatsi bwa REMA bwagaragaje ko ibiza ku isonga mu guhumanya umwuka uhumekwa mu Rwanda, harimo umwotsi w’imodoka, imyotsi y’amakara n’inkwi n’ibindi.
Bwanagaragaje kandi ko 95,2% y’imodoka ziri mu Rwanda zimaze imyaka irenga 10 zikozwe; 56,6 % zakozwe mbere yo mu 1999 naho 77,2% zakozwe mbere ya 2000.
Bwagaragaje ko uduce duto duto tutabonwa n’amaso twivanga n’umwuka uhumekwa tubangamiye bikomeye ubuzima bw’abaturarwanda bishobora gutera indwara z’ubuhumekero n’umutima.
Mu bice bituwe hari ubwo naho ikigero cy’utwo tuvungukira kirenga urugero rwemewe, ahanini kubera imyuka ikomoka ku gukoresha ibicanwa bikomoka ku biti no gutwika ibyatsi, ibiyorero n’amashyamba.
Ubwo hizihizwaga umunsi mpuzamahanga wo kurengera ibidukikije kuri uyu wa 5 Kamena 2019, Umuyobozi ushinzwe gukumira no kurwanya indwara, Dr. Innocent Turate, yavuze ko buri mwaka hakirwa miliyoni eshatu z’abivuza indwara z’ubuhumekero barimo 13% bazitewe n’ihumana ry’ikirere.
Ati “Umuntu umwe kuri bane ku mwaka arwara indwara y’ubuhumekero, usanga harimo nk’ibicurane, asthma n’izindi.”
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa REMA, Eng. Collette Ruhamya, yavuze ko hari kwigwa uko imodoka zakozwe cyera zakumirwa kwinjira mu Rwanda.
Ntabwo yagaragaje neza icyo iyo nyigo imaze kugeraho ariko yavuze ko izareba uburyo hashyirwaho umwaka ntarengwa, izakozwe mbere yawo ntizemererwe kwinjira mu Rwanda.
Ati “Ku modoka zishaje, haracyigwa uko zagabanywa ndetse zikajya ku myaka runaka tuvuga ngo imodoka irengeje imyaka runaka ntiyinjire mu gihugu.”
Kugeza ubu mu Rwanda nta ruganda ruhari rukora imodoka uretse uruganda Volkswagen rw’Abadage ruzihateranyiriza.
Ati “Muziko tutazikora, tuzikura hanze, ntacyatubuza rero cyane cyane ko mu bihugu duturanye nabo bamaze kubigeraho, turagira ngo twirinde kuba abakira imyanda y’abandi banze.”
Umwaka ushize REMA yari yasabye Leta gushaka uburyo imodoka zipakira ibintu byinshi zinyura mu Mujyi zishakirwa inzira yihariye mu kubungabunga umwuka uhumekwa.
Ubwo yatangizaga imirimo ya Volkswagen mu Rwanda umwaka ushize, Perezida Kagame yavuze ko ‘Umugabane wa Afurika udakeneye gukomeza kuba ikimoteri cy’imoodka zishaje’.
Yavuze ko ‘Gutangiza imirimo yarwo mu Rwanda ari ikimenyetso cy’uko Abanyarwanda n’Abanyafurika muri rusange bakwiye ibyiza, aho guhora bahendwa n’ibyakoze’.
Yagize ati “Afurika ntikeneye kuba ikimoteri cy’imodoka zishaje cyangwa ikindi kintu cyakoreshejwe. Iyo ugiye no kureba usanga wishyuye igiciro kinini. Niba wishyura igiciro kinini ku byakoreshejwe, kuki utacyishyura ugura ikintu gishya. Afurika n’u Rwanda bakwiye ibyiza kandi ubu ni bumwe mu buryo bwo kwerekana ko bashobora kubigura.”

Title: Gutwikira kanyanga mu ruhame ntibyemewe –Eng Ruhamya
Body:
Umuyobozi w’Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe kubungabunga Ibidukikije (REMA), Eng. Colette Ruhamya, yavuze ko gutwika kanyanga ku karubanda bitemewe kuko bihumanya ikirere.
Umuyobozi w’Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe kubungabunga Ibidukikije (REMA), Eng. Colette Ruhamya, yavuze ko gutwika kanyanga ku karubanda bitemewe kuko bihumanya ikirere.
Ingaruka ziterwa n’imyuka ihumanya ikirere ni kimwe mu bibazo bihangayikishije Isi. U Rwanda by’umwihariko ruri mu bihugu bishyize imbere ingamba zitandukanye zigamije kubungabunga ikirere hirindwa gukwirakwiza imyuka ihumanya ikirere.
Umuyobozi wa REMA, Eng. Colette Ruhamya, yasabye abanyarwanda kugira uruhare mu kubungabunga ibidukikije kuko iyo bidakozwe, ingaruka zabyo zigera kuri benshi.
Yabigarutseho mu kiganiro “Zinduka” yagiranye na Radio 10 kuri uyu wa 8 Gicurasi 2019 cyavugaga ku bijyanye no kwandura kw’ikirere, urusaku rubangamira ibidukikije, kubungabunga ibishanga hamwe no guca amacupa akoreshwa rimwe.
Mu byangiza ikirere harimo impamvu kamere nk’iruka ry’ibirunga, ibikorwa bya muntu, ibinyabiziga bikoresha mazutu bisohora imyuka y’umukara ihumanya. Muri make, ibyangiza ikirere bishobora kuba imyuka iboneshwa amaso n’itaboneshwa amaso.
Ati “Gutwika ibiyorero, gutwika imbagara hamwe no gutwikira imyanda ku gasozi ni bimwe mu bihumanya ikirere. Niyo mpamvu duhora tubwira abaturage kubyirinda. Imyanda ishyirwa mu gikoresho cyabugenewe ikajyanwa aho igomba gushyirwa ikabora, hanyuma ibiyorero n’imbagara nabyo birundwa hamwe bikabora bigatanga ifumbire. Iyo ubitwitse uba wangije ikirere.”
Umwe mu bari bakurikiye iki kiganiro yabajije Eng. Ruhamya igikorwa kugira ngo gutwikira ibiyobyabwenge ku karubanda nabyo bicike.
Ati “Avuze kurwanya gutwika nibuka ko Leta itwikira urumogi na kanyanga mu ruhame. Mbariza niba imyotsi yabyo itica agakingirizo k’imirasire y’izuba.”
Eng. Ruhamya yamusubije ati “Gutwika ni bibi. N’izo kanyanga batwika ntabwo byemewe, ubwo nyine baba bakoze amakosa nk’abandi ni ugushaka umwanya tukaganira nabo ndetse bakajya babisabira uruhushya.”
Yakomeje agira ati “Ubundi gutwika hari nibyo usabira uruhushya ukaba wabyemererwa kubera impamvu runaka ariko ntabwo upfa gutwika gusa.”
Ku bijyanye n’imyanda yo kwa muganga, uyu muyobozi yavuze ko itwikirwa ahantu habugenewe kandi ngo haba hari ubushyuhe buri ku gipimo cyo hejuru cyane ku buryo itagira ingaruka ku kirere.

Title: Ellen DeGeneres yashyize mu cyamunara inkweto ashaka inkunga yo kubaka ikigo mu Rwanda
Body:
Umunyarwenya Ellen DeGeneres yashyize mu cyamunara inkweto kugira ngo akusanye amafaranga yo kubaka ikigo kizita ku ngagi zo muri Pariki y’Ibirunga mu Karere ka Musanze.
Umunyarwenya Ellen DeGeneres yashyize mu cyamunara inkweto kugira ngo akusanye amafaranga yo kubaka ikigo kizita ku ngagi zo muri Pariki y’Ibirunga mu Karere ka Musanze.
DeGeneres ni umugore w’imyaka 61 wamamaye muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika kubera ikiganiro cyamwitiriwe kuri Televiziyo kizwi nka ‘The Ellen DeGeneres Show’.
Kuri uyu wa Kabiri izi nkweto zashyizwe ku rubuga rwa interinet rwa eBay rugurirwaho ibicuruzwa bitandukanye. Rufite amabara y’umweru n’umukara, mu ruhande rwayo hashushanyijeho ingagi naho ku mupira handitseho “Ellen DeGeneres Wild Life Fund”.
Amafaranga azava muri iyi cyamunara yose azashyirwa mu kigega Ellen DeGeneres yatangije kigamije kubaka icyicaro cy’ikigo ‘Ellen DeGeneres Campus’, kibungabunga ingagi zo mu birunga mu Rwanda.
Iki kigo cyatangiye kubakwa mu Kinigi mu Karere ka Musanze ni impano Portia de Rossi yahaye DeGeneres bashyingiranwe bahuje ibitsina, ubwo yuzuzaga imyaka 60 y’amavuko.
Iki kigo kizunganira ibikorwa bisanzwe bikorwa n’Ikigega cyitiriwe Diana Fossey, bigamije gushyigikira intego za Leta y’u Rwanda mu kubungabunga ibidukikije n’umutungo kamere.
Ellen DeGeneres Campus niyo izaba irimo ibiro by’ ikigega Dian Fossey Gorilla Fund kimaze imyaka isaga 50 gikorera mu Rwanda binyuze mu gashami kacyo gashinzwe ubushakashatsi ka Karisoke Research Centre mu Karere ka Musnze.
Kizaba kirimo laboratwari, ibyumba by’inama, ibyo kwigishirizamo n’inzu ndangamateka ivuga kuri Dian Fossey wishwe mu Ukuboza 1985.
Biteganyijwe ko ikigo gishya kizafungura imiryango ku mugaragaro mu ntangiriro za 2021, gitwaye miliyoni 10 z’amadolari.
Mu minsi ishize Ellen DeGeneres yateje mu cyamunara agapupe gakoze nk’ingagi umukunzi Portia De Rossi yakuye mu Rwanda. Icyo gihe bari bamaze gukusanya asaga miliyoni $5.

Title: Igishanga cya Nyandungu kizashyirwamo ikiyaga, kigiye gushorwamo asaga miliyari 4Frw
Body:
Igishanga cya Nyandungu kiri ahazwi nko kuri 15 hagati y’Akarere ka Kicukiro n’aka Gasabo, kigiye gushorwamo asaga miliyari enye z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda, yo kugitunganya kugira ngo kibe cyakorwamo n’ibikorwa by’ubukerarugendo.
Igishanga cya Nyandungu kiri ahazwi nko kuri 15 hagati y’Akarere ka Kicukiro n’aka Gasabo, kigiye gushorwamo asaga miliyari enye z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda, yo kugitunganya kugira ngo kibe cyakorwamo n’ibikorwa by’ubukerarugendo.
Gahunda yo gutunganya iki gishanga yatangiye mu 2017 ariko nyuma iza guhagarara mu buryo butunguranye.
Abatuye muri aka gace, babwiye Radiyo Rwanda ko bari bishimiye uburyo iki gishanga cyari cyatangiye gutunganywa cyane ko byari byanatumye bamwe muri bo babona akazi.
Umwe yagize ati “Aha hantu rero hasurwa n’abantu benshi akenshi n’abazungu baba barimo, batangiye imirimo bishimisha abantu benshi ibyo bakoraga ariko nyuma ntabwo bigeze bashaka kurangiza ibyo bari barimo, ntabwo twigeze tumenya niba ari ubushobozi bwababanye buke.”
Undi ati “Hariya hirya gatoya habaga icyapa mbese bavuga ko bagiye kuhashyira ibidendezi by’amazi (pond) umuntu wese yajya ahagera akabona ko ari nk’icyitegererezo ariko urabona ko igihuru cyabaye igihuru kandi hegeranye n’ikigo cy’amashuri.”
Ubuyobozi bw Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe kubungabunga ibidukikije (REMA) bwatanze isoko ryo gutunganya iki gishanga mu 2017, buvuga ko rwiyemezamirimo wari warahawe iri soko yananiwe kuzuza ibyo yari yasabwe bituma rihabwa undi ndetse iyo mirimo ubu imaze amezi atandatu isubukuwe.
Umuyobozi wa REMA, Eng Coletta Ruhamya, yemeza ko imirimo yo kugitunganya haterwamo ibiti n’inzira y’abanyamaguru, imitako n’ibidendezi by’amazi izarangirira ku gihe.
Yagize ati ‘Ubu kampanyi irimo ni nshya, impamvu twayifashe n’uko yerekanye ko ifite ubushobozi buruta ubw’ikompani ya mbere twari twabihaye biba ngombwa ko dushaka abandi bashya bashobora kubikora bijyanye n’icyerekezo cy’igihugu n’icy’Umujyi wa Kigali.”
Rwiyemezamirimo mbere wari waratsindiye isoko ryo gutunganya iki gishanga nyuma yo kunanirwa kuharangiza yishyuwe miliyoni 360, ndetse biteganyije ko gahunda yose yo kugitunganya izarangira hashowemo miliyari enye na miliyoni zikabakaba 530 z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda.

Title: Guverinoma yashoye asaga miliyoni 900Frw mu bikoresho bizagenzura imyuka yoherezwa mu kirere
Body:
Guverinoma y’u Rwanda yashoye miliyoni 927 z’Amanyarwanda mu bikoresho bizajya byifashishwa mu kugenzura imyuka ijya mu kirere, mu rwego rwo kureba ko ingaruka z’imyuka ihumanye.
Guverinoma y’u Rwanda yashoye miliyoni 927 z’Amanyarwanda mu bikoresho bizajya byifashishwa mu kugenzura imyuka ijya mu kirere, mu rwego rwo kureba ko ingaruka z’imyuka ihumanye.
Rwanda Today ivuga ko ibi bikoresho (air quality monitors), byashyizwe mu duce 10 hirya no hino mu gihugu, aho bizajya bigenzura imyuka ijya mu kirere ku mihanda minini, inganda n’ibindi bikorwa remezo nk’ingomero z’amashanyarazi, iminara n’imiturirwa.
Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe kubungabunga ibidukikije, REMA, Eng. Coletha Ruhamya, yavuze ko ibi bikoresho byinshi byamaze kugezwa ahatoranyijwe, ahasigaye n’aho bikazahagezwa vuba.
Ati “ Buri gihe tuzajya tubasha gutanga raporo irimo amakuru asesenguye ku miterere y’ubuziranenge bw’imyuka yoherezwa mu kirere mu gihugu hose”.
Yakomeje avuga ko aya makuru azatuma babasha gusesengura umusaruro w’ingamba za politiki iriho ubu, no gutanga ibitekerezo ku byarushaho kunozwa.
Icyemezo cyo kugenzura ibirebana n’imyuka ihumanye yoherezwa muri kirere kije mu gihe hirya no hino ku Isi ubwiza bw’umwuka bukomeje kwangirika ugereranyije n’ibipimo byemewe by’Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye ryita ku Buzima, OMS.
Inyandiko yakozwe mu 2018 ku mvano y’ihumana ry’ikirere yagaragaje ko imyotsi irekurwa n’ibinyabiziga n’itwikwa rya ‘biomass’ biri mu bikomeje kwangiza ikirere cy’u Rwanda, by’umwihariko mu bice by’imijyi.
Umushakashatsi akaba n’Umunyamabanga Mukuru w’Urwego rushinzwe ubuziranenge muri Afurika, Hermogene Nsengimana, yavuze ko kuba hatabagaho ibikoresho byifashishwa mu kugenzura ibirebana n’imyuka yoherezwaga mu kirere, byatumaga bigorana gutanga impuruza igihe ingaruka zishobora kuba nyinshi ku baturage.
Ati “ Turizera ko u Rwanda rugiye kubera icyitegererezo ibindi bihugu nabyo bigafata iki cyemezo nka kimwe mu biganisha ku igerwaho ry’intego z’iterambere rirambye, no kugabanya umubare w’abahitanwa no guhumeka umwuka uhumanye”.
Ibi bikoresho bizakoreshwa mu kugenzura imiterere y’imyuka yoherezwa mu kirere byashyizwe mu duce turimo; Rusizi, Rubavu, Nyabihu, Gicumbi, Byimana, Kirehe, Kayonza, Nyagatare n’Umujyi wa Kigali.

Title: Umushinga wa Dr Nsengimana wo kubungabunga imisambi wahembwe miliyoni 50 Frw
Body:
Dr Nsengimana Olivier watangije umushinga wo kwita ku misambi yari iri gucika mu Rwanda yahawe igihembo mpuzamahanga cyo kubungabunga urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima kizwi nka ‘Future For Nature Award 2019’.
Dr Nsengimana Olivier watangije umushinga wo kwita ku misambi yari iri gucika mu Rwanda yahawe igihembo mpuzamahanga cyo kubungabunga urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima kizwi nka ‘Future For Nature Award 2019’.
Uyu Munyarwanda w’imyaka 34 na Fernanda Abra ukomoka muri Brésil n’Umuhinde Divya Karnad batoranyijwe buri wese azahabwa 50,000 by’ama-euro, akabakaba miliyoni 50 Frw.
Dr Nsengimana yahembwe mu bagera ku 125 bagaragaje imishinga yo kubungabunga urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima. Umushinga we watsinze ni uwo guteza imbere imyororokere no kurinda imisambi igenda izimira.
Igihembo cya Future For Nature (FFN) yahawe azagishyikirizwa mu birori bizabera muri pariki nto ya ‘Royal Burgers’ Zoo’ mu Mujyi wa Arnhem mu Buholandi, ku wa 4 Gicurasi 2019.
Dr Nsengimana yabwiye IGIHE ko iki gihembo kizamufasha kongera imbaraga mu bikorwa byo kubungabunga urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima.
Yagize ati “Birashimishije cyane. Sinjye wahembwe ahubwo ni igihembo cy’umushinga, ni ishimwe ku bo dukorana n’igihugu kuko u Rwanda rufite umwihariko wo kwihutisha ibikorwa kubera imikoranire n’inzego kandi umusaruro ukagaragara mu gihe gito.’’
Yakomeje avuga ko “U Rwanda rufite ubushake bwo kubungabunga urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima. Kubona igihugu kivugwa birashimishije kandi bizamura isura yacyo.’’
Ibikorwa Dr Nsengimana amazemo imyaka ine byo kubungabunga ibinyabuzima abifatanya na leta harwanywa ubucuruzi bw’imisambi butumwa ihigwa, ikanagurishwa ku bashaka kuyitunga mu ngo zabo.
Yagize ati “Abayitunga batumaga igabanuka, imwe igapfa mu gihe bayihiga. Twaganiriye n’abayifite bemera kuyiduha tuyisubiza muri Pariki y’Akagera. Abanyamahanga batangazwa n’uburyo Abanyarwanda bakorana bakagera kuri iyi ntego.’’
Imishinga ihanzwe amaso mu kubungabunga imisambi
Dr Nsengimana wabaye umuganga w’ingagi yatangije Ikigo kirengera Inyamaswa zo mu Gasozi (RWCA) mu 2014 nyuma yo kubona ko hari inyamaswa ziri gucika zirimo n’imisambi.
Yagize igitekerezo cyo gutanga umusanzu we mu kubungabunga imisambi kubera iyapfuye bayihiga, iyagejejwe mu ngo z’abantu igakatwa amababa bigatuma itisanzura uko bikwiye.
RWCA ifite abakozi 15 n’abakorerabushake 55 bafasha mu kubungabunga imisambi yarimo ikendera mu gihugu no ku Isi muri rusange bitewe no kuyicuruza binyuranye n’amategeko.
Dr Nsengimana yavuze ko “Igihembo twahawe kizadufasha kongera ubushobozi bw’abo dukorana, bakaba ba ambasaderi b’ibikorwa byacu. Tukabaha smartphone, bakatugezaho amakuru mu gihe nyacyo, bakanakorana n’inzego z’ibanze. Turateganya no gukomeza kubarura imisambi no kubaka ikoranabuhanga rizadufasha kureba aho iri n’ibyo irya ku buryo tumenya aho kongera imbaraga.’’
Mu Rwanda habarurwa imisambi 500 iri mu gasozi, irimo iyari isanzwemo n’iyasubijweyo kuva mu 2016. Igikorwa cyo kuyibarura kirakomeje ndetse Abanyarwanda basabwa kukigiramo uruhare.
Uyu muganga yatanze inama yo kudatunga imisambi cyangwa izindi nyamaswa zo mu gasozi mu ngo.
Ati “Ntibyemewe keretse ababifitiye uburenganzira bwa leta. Inyamaswa zishobora kuzana uburwayi bwakwanduza imiryango. Abafite imisambi bataramenyekanisha, byaba byiza bayibaruje kuko yose igiye gukurwa mu ngo z’abantu. Abazaba bakiyifite bashobora kuzahura n’amategeko.’’
Mu 2017, Umuryango utera inkunga abantu bafite ibitekerezo by’ubuvumbuzi n’ubushakashatsi mu bijyanye n’Ubumenyi bw’Isi ‘National Geographic Society’, wahembye Dr. Nsengimana kubera ibikorwa bye byo guteza imbere imyororokere no kurinda imisambi igenda izimira mu rusobe rw’ibinyabuzima. Mu 2014, yari yatsindiye igihembo cya Rolex.

Title: Kigali Marriott yabimburiye izindi hotel mu guca ikoreshwa ry’imiheha ya plastique
Body:
Kigali Marriott Hotel yabaye iya mbere ibimburiye izindi mu gushyira mu bikorwa umwanzuro wafashwe na Marriott International wo kurengera ibidukikije binyuze mu guca ikoreshwa ry’imiheha ikozwe muri plastique.
Kigali Marriott Hotel yabaye iya mbere ibimburiye izindi mu gushyira mu bikorwa umwanzuro wafashwe na Marriott International wo kurengera ibidukikije binyuze mu guca ikoreshwa ry’imiheha ikozwe muri plastique.
Muri Nyakanga 2018 nibwo Marriott International yafashe umwanzuro wo kugabanya ikoreshwa ry’imiheha ya plastique muri hotel zayo zisaga 6500 ziri hirya no hino ku Isi.
Icyo gihe Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Marriott International, Arne Sorenson, yatangaje ko batewe ishema no kuba kimwe mu bigo binini muri Amerika bifasha umwanzuro wo guhagarika ikoreshwa ry’imiheha ya plastique mu mashami ari hirya no hino ku Isi.
Ati “Guhagarika ikoreshwa ry’imiheha ya plastique ni uburyo bworoshye abakiliya bacu bashobora gukoresha mu kugira uruhare mu kugabanya ikoreshwa rya plastique igihe bacumbitse iwacu. Igikorwa gisanzwe kibahangayikishije kandi batangiye gushyira mu bikorwa mu ngo zabo”.
Mu ntego iki kigo cyihaye ni uko kugera muri Nyakanga 2019, uyu mwanzuro uzaba wamaze gushyirwa mu bikorwa aho bateganya kujya bagabanya imiheha isaga miliyari imwe yakoreshwaga buri mwaka.
Iyi gahunda yo guhindura ubwoko bw’imiheha ikoreshwa yahise itangira gushyirwa mu bikorwa na hotel zirimo Kigali Marriott, ni imwe mu bikorwa byinshi Marriott International ikomeje gukora mu rwego rwo kurushaho kubungabunga no kurengera ibidukikije.
Mu ntangiriro za 2018, Marriott yatangiye gusimbuza ubwoko bw’amacupa arimo ibikoresho by’isuku byifashishwa mu bwiherero, igikorwa cyitezweho kugabanya amacupa asaga miliyoni 35 buri mwaka.
Uyu mwanzuro ushyizwe mu bikorwa mu gihe Inama y’Abaminisitiri idasanzwe yateranye ku wa 28 Mutarama 2019, yemeje umushinga w’Itegeko ryerekeye kubuza ikorwa, itumizwa mu mahanga, ikoreshwa n’icuruzwa ry’ibikoresho bikozwe muri plastique bikoreshwa inshuro imwe.
Minisitiri w’Ibidukikije, Vincent Biruta, yasobanuye ko uyu mushinga ugamije guca ibikoresho bya plastique bitari amashashi bigenda bikwira hose nk’imiheha, udukombe, amacupa, amasahani, amakanya, ibiyiko n’ibindi bikoreshwa rimwe ugasanga birajugunywe kandi bitazabora.
Yavuze ko bazahera ku dukombe n’imiheha ya plastique kuko abantu batabikoresheje ntacyo baba, iyi miheha yo bikaba bishoboka ko yasimbuzwa indi ikozwe mu mpapuro zishobora kubora ari nayo kuri ubu Kigali Marriott ikoresha.
Iri tegeko rigiye kujyaho nyuma y’imyaka isaga 10 Leta y’u Rwanda iciye ikoreshwa ry’amashashi aho yanashyizeho itegeko rihana ababirenzeho, ibi byatumye ruza mu bihugu 40 ku Isi byateye intambwe mu kurengera ibidukikije.

Title: Minisitiri Biruta yagaragaje uko kubungabunga ibishanga byafasha mu guhangana n’inzara
Body:
Minisitiri w’Ibidukikije mu Rwanda, Dr. Vincent Biruta, yavuze ko ibishanga bibungabunzwe neza byafasha mu guhangana n’ibibazo by’imyuzure, amapfa n’inzara.
Minisitiri w’Ibidukikije mu Rwanda, Dr. Vincent Biruta, yavuze ko ibishanga bibungabunzwe neza byafasha mu guhangana n’ibibazo by’imyuzure, amapfa n’inzara.
Yabigarutseho kuri uyu wa Kane mu ijambo yagejeje ku bitabiriye umunsi mpuzamahanga w’ibishanga, ufite insanganyamatsiko igira iti “Tubungabunge ibishanga duhangana n’ingaruka z’imihindagurikire y’ibihe”.
Uyu munsi wahuriranye no gusoza icyumweru cyahariwe kubungabunga ibishanga mu Rwanda, cyibanze ku bikorwa byo gukangurira abaturage kumenya akamaro k’ibishanga ku mibereho yabo n’abatuye Isi.
Hari kandi kubibutsa kubibungabunga, kubigarurira isura byari bifite no kuvanamo ibikorwa byagiye bibyangiza bikanatera ingaruka zitandukanye.
Minisitiri Biruta yavuze ko mu myaka 35 ishize ibiza byikubye kabiri kandi 90% bifite aho bihuriye n’amazi. Mu Rwanda ahanini ibiza biterwa n’imvura.
Yakomeje avuga ko mu igenzura riherutse gukorwa mu turere 15, by’umwihariko ibiza bituruka ku mwuzure mu Majyaruguru n’Amajyepfo n’ibituruka ku mapfa mu Ntara y’Iburasirazuba, byagize ingaruka za miliyari 204 z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda. Avuga ko ibishanga bicunzwe neza byafasha mu guhangana n’ibi bibazo byose.
Ati “Ayo mafaranga yose hamwe aruta ingengo y’imari igenda ku buhinzi bw’igihugu, ibi rero bigiye biba buri mwaka ntabwo dushobora guterera iyo ndetse byagira n’ingaruka nyinshi n’inzara yabaho.”
“Ibishanga rero bifite akamaro gakomeye mu buryo bwo guhangana n’imihindagurikire y’ibihe, mu kurwanya imyuzure bikagira uruhare no kuba twahangana n’amapfa n’inzara.”
Ibarura ry’ibishanga mu Mujyi wa Kigali ryakozwe na REMA, mu mpera za 2018, ryagaragaje ko ibikorwa bigera ku 7 222 bikorerwa mu bishanga, icyanya cy’inganda i Gikondo hatarimo.
Imirenge ya Remera, Gisozi, Gatsata, Kinyinya na Kacyiru ifite ibikorwa byinshi mu bishanga birimo; insengero, ubworozi, amasoko, amagorofa, gare, ubucuruzi n’ibindi.
Iyi mibare ikomeza igaragaza ko 78%, ari amazu atuwemo, naho 9.44%, ni ubucuruzi. Inyubako 3.18% ni izo abantu batuyemo kandi banacururizamo, naho ibiraro byo kororeramo ni 2.85%.
Mu bafite ibikorwa mu bishanga abagera kuri 51% ntabwo bafite ibyangombwa birimo iby’ubutaka, iby’ubugure n’ibindi.
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa REMA, Eng. Coletha Ruhamya, yavuze ko igenzura ryakozwe ryagaragaje ko hari ibintu byinshi bikeneye gushyira imbaraga hamwe by’umwihariko ibijyanye no kwigisha abantu amategeko n’impamvu zo kurengera ibishanga.
Itegeko rirengera ibidukikije rishyira ubutaka bungana na metero 50 uvuye kubiyaga, metero 20 uvuye ku bishanga na metero 10 uvuye ku migezi mu butaka rusange bwa Leta, bivuze ko nta muntu wemerewe kubwiyandikishaho no gushyiramo ibikorwa.

Title: Kigali: Abafite ibikorwa mu bishanga basabye guhabwa aho kwimukira n’ingurane
Body:
Abaturage batuye n’abafite ibikorwa by’ubucuruzi n’inganda mu bishanga byo mu Mujyi wa Kigali, basabye ubuyobozi kubashakira aho kwimukira bagahabwa n’ingurane ku butaka bwabo kuko hari ababufitiye ibyangombwa.
Abaturage batuye n’abafite ibikorwa by’ubucuruzi n’inganda mu bishanga byo mu Mujyi wa Kigali, basabye ubuyobozi kubashakira aho kwimukira bagahabwa n’ingurane ku butaka bwabo kuko hari ababufitiye ibyangombwa.
Aba baturage batangaje ibi nyuma y’ubugenzuzi buri gukorwa n’Umujyi wa Kigali, ufatanyije Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe kubungabunga Ibidukikije (REMA).
Ni ubugenzuzi buri gukorerwa mu bishanga biri mu turere tw’Umujyi wa Kigali, aharebwa niba ibikorwa byagombaga kuvanwamo byaramaze kuvamo. Uyu munsi ubugenzuzi bwakorewe mu Karere ka Nyarugenge.
Bavukiyehe Eugène ufite ububiko bw’ibishyimbo n’ibigori mu gishanga kiri mu Murenge wa Muhima, Akarere ka Nyarugenge yavuze ko n’ubwo ibyo ari gusabwa n’ubuyobozi yabyumvise kandi abishyigikiye ariko afite impungenge z’aho azimurira ibikorwa bye.
Yagize ati “Ahubwo bagombye gutekereza niba bashaka ko tuhava, twashoye amafaranga muri banki baduhe amafaranga y’ingurane tugende tugure ahandi tubone ubwimura ibikorwa dufite aho tubijyana.”
“Kuko ntabwo wabwira umuntu washoye miliyoni akarangura ibintu warangiza ukamusaba kubyikorera adafite aho abijyana. Twifuza baduhe ingurane dushake aho twimukira.”
Mbarushimana Ibrahim uzwi ku izina rya Braaza, na we ufite ibikorwa birimo amacumbi, resitora n’igaraje mu gishanga cya Nyabugogo yagize ati “Igishanga ndacyumva kandi gukoreramo ibintu byangiza ibidukikije si byiza ahubwo nibagenzure metero mfite kuva ku gishanga nasize metero 50 izindi nzikoramo ubusitani.”
Braaza avuga ko yumvise amabwiriza kandi nawe yiteguye kubungabunga igishanga.
Kugeza ubu ibishanga byo mu mujyi bibarizwaho ibikorwa bitemewe birenga 2,000 birimo 1,600 by’ubwubatsi.
Umuyobozi w’Umujyi wa Kigali, Rwakazina Marie Chantal, yavuze ko hashize umwaka urenga abaturage bakabaye baramaze kuvana ibikorwa byabo mu bishanga ari nayo mpamvu hongeye kubaho iri genzura.
Rwakazina yavuze ko abari gusaba guhabwa ingurane ahanini barimo “Abafitemo ibikorwa badafitiye uruhushya na rumwe, ari urwo kubaka, gukoreramo cyangwa ibyangombwa by’ubutaka.”
Yakomeje agira ati “Abo rero ni nabo twari tugendereye kuko ingurane uko bigaragara izakorwa ariko bisaba kugira ngo habeho ubwumvikane. Mu gihe batarahabwa ingurane bakamenya ko iki ari ikibazo nabo kibafitiye ingaruka bakatwemerera kuvamo tugacunga igishanga neza nyuma bakazahabwa ingurane.”
Ikijyanye no guhabwa aho bimurira ibikorwa, Rwakazina, yavuze ko Kigali ari ngari kandi ubuyobozi bwiteguye kubafasha kugira ngo bubahirize amabwiriza yo kubungabunga ibishanga.
Mu Rwanda habarizwa ibishanga 935, bigize ubuso bungana 10.6% ku butaka bw’igihugu. Bifite uruhare rukomeye mu buhinzi butunze Abanyarwanda barenga 70%.
Kuva mu 1900, ibishanga birenga 64% byarasibamye mu gihe 50% y’ibiri mu Mujyi wa Kigali byazamuweho ibikorwa bitandukanye.
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa REMA, Eng. Coletha Ruhamya, yavuze ko ibishanga bifite akamaro mu kurengera ibidukikije, ubuzima bw’abantu n’imihindagurikire y’ikirere.
Yagize ati “Ibishanga akamaro kanini bifite, ni uko byakira ayo mazi kandi ayo mazi aho akenewe bya bishanga birayarekura agafasha kuhira no kugaburira indi migezi. Ikindi ni uko bifite umwihariko wo kuyungurura ayo mazi, kandi ibishanga ni umwihariko wo kuba iwabo w’ibinyabuzima bitandukanye.”
Iri genzura ribaye mu gihe u Rwanda rwitegura kwifatanya n’Isi mu kwizihiza umunsi mpuzamahanga w’ibishanga ku wa 31 Mutarama 2019 mu birori bizabera muri Kigali Serena Hotel. Uyu munsi usanzwe wizihizwa ku wa 2 Gashyantare buri mwaka.

Title: Amasezerano ku kayunguruzo k’izuba yaraje ijoro ibihugu 200 i Kigali yatangiye kubahirizwa
Body:
Kwinjira mu mwaka wa 2019 byahuriranye n’uko kuri uyu wa 1 Mutarama, hatangiye gushyirwa mu bikorwa ibyavuguruwe mu masezerano ya Montréal agamije kurinda akayunguruzo k’imirasire y’izuba, byabereye i Kigali ku wa 15 Ukwakira 2016.
Kwinjira mu mwaka wa 2019 byahuriranye n’uko kuri uyu wa 1 Mutarama, hatangiye gushyirwa mu bikorwa ibyavuguruwe mu masezerano ya Montréal agamije kurinda akayunguruzo k’imirasire y’izuba, byabereye i Kigali ku wa 15 Ukwakira 2016.
Hari mu nama ya 28 yahuje ibihugu 197 byayashyizeho umukono. Ibyavuguruwe bigamije ko ibyuma bikonjesha nka za frigo n’ibitanga ubuhehere mu nyubako bikoresha ibinyabutabire bya Hydrofluorocarbons (HFCs), bisimbuzwa ikoranabuhanga rishya ritifashisha iyo myuka yangiza ikirere.
Amavugurura ya Kigali agena ko ibihugu bikize bigomba kugabanya ikoreshwa rya HFCs ku gipimo cya 85% hagati y’umwaka wa 2019 na 2036; ibihugu biri mu nzira y’amajyambere bikagabanya iyo myuka kuri 80% hagati ya 2024 na 2045.
Uyu muhigo wemejwe nyuma y’uko ayo masezerano yari amaze imyaka irindwi aganirwaho, yemeranyijweho mu rukerera rwo kuwa 15 Ukwakira 2016 ubwo abari mu biganiro byabasabaga kurara ijoro muri Kigali Convention Centre bajya impaka.
Kugira ngo ibyavuguruwe kuri aya masezerano bitangire gushyirwa mu bikorwa hari hakenewe ibihugu 20 bibyemeza burundu, bikaba byarabonetse mu Ugushyingo 2017. Ubu bimaze kugera kuri 65.
Minisitiri w’Ibidukikije, Dr Biruta Vincent, yabwiye IGIHE ko nyuma y’imbaraga ibiganiro ku kwemeranya amavugurura byatwaye, kubishyira mu bikorwa bitazagorana kuko guca ibinyabutabire bya Hydrofluorocarbons ari amahirwe mashya y’ubucuruzi.
Ati “Ziriya gaz zirakorwa zikagurishwa, biriya byuma bikonjesha nabyo ni ibintu bicuruzwa. Iyo ikoranabuhanga rishya rije rigashyirwa ku isoko rigenda risimbura iryari rishaje, ariko bisaba ko buri gihugu kigira gahunda yo kugenda gisimbuza ibikoresho bya kera ndetse n’imyuka bikoresha.”
Yavuze ko nko ku Rwanda gahunda yamaze gukorwa ndetse ibikoresho bikonjesha bitarimo ibinyabutabire byangiza akayunguruzo k’izuba, byatangiye kugera ku isoko.
Ati “Ubu turimo gukora igenzura ry’ibigomba gusimburwa byose uko bingana, hanyuma dutangire kureba niba ibyinjira mu gihugu byuzuza neza ibipimo bishya, ari nako tugenda dusimbura ibyari bihasanzwe kugira ngo bihuze n’ariya masezerano.”
Dr Biruta avuga ko indi ngingo itanga icyizere ku ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry’ibyavuguruwe mu masezerano ya Montreal, ariko uko aya masezerano muri rusange ari amwe mu yabashije kugera ku ntego ku Isi.
Amasezerano ya Montréal muri rusange bibarwa ko amaze kugabanya 98% by’imyuka yangizaga akayunguruzo kagabanya ubukana bw’imirasire y’izuba iza ku isi, Ozone, irimo nka chlorofluorocarbons (CFCs) na hydrochlorofluorocarbons (HCFCs), ku buryo katangiye kugaragaza ibimenyetso byo kwisubiranya.
Nubwo HFCs zo zitangiza Ozone, zifite ingaruka inshuro ibihumbi mu gushyushya uyu mubumbe kurusha ‘dioxide de carbone,’ CO2.
Gusimbuza ibi bikoresho ku Rwanda ngo bishobora kutazaba akazi gakomeye kuko ingano yabyo ari nke, bitandukanye n’uko bimeze mu bihugu nka Arabie Saoudite, igira n’ibyuma bikonjesha inzu yose.
Mu itangazo Umuryango w’Ibihugu by’u Burayi, EU, washyize ahagaragara kuri uyu wa Kabiri, watangaje ko ibihugu biwugize byatangiye neza urugendo rwo guca HFCs.
Amasezerano ya Montreal yuzuzanya n’aya Paris 

Amasezerano ya Paris yerekeye imihindagurikire y’ibihe, yemeranyijweho mu Ukuboza 2015, agena uburyo bwo gushyira mu bikorwa ingamba zitandukanye kugira ngo igipimo mpuzandengo cy’ubushyuhe bw’Isi kigume munsi ya dogere calcius 2, intego ikaba ko kigera hasi ya dogere 1.5.
Dr Biruta avuga ko guca HFCs no guteza imbere ikoreshwa ry’ibyuma bikoresha ingufu nkeya kandi zitangiza ibidukikije, byombi byuzuzanya.
Mu nama ya 24 ku mihindagurikire y’ibihe yabereye Katowice muri Pologne ku wa tariki 3-14 Ukuboza 2018, ibihugu byemeranyije ku mabwiriza ngenderwaho mu gushyira mu bikorwa amasezerano ya Paris.
Gusa Amerika nk’igihugu kinarekura imyotsi myinshi mu nganda zacyo, cyivanye mu masezerano ya Paris ndetse Perezida Donald Trump ntahwema kuyanenga.
Minisitiri Dr Biruta avuga ko mu 2020 ibihugu bizongera kugaragaza ukwiyemeza kwabyo, igikorwa kizajya kiba buri myaka itanu.
Yakomeje agira ati “Kuba Guverinoma ya Amerika itemera ariya asezerano, nabyo ni ukubishyira mu cyiciro cyabyo muri politiki, ariko nubwo guverinoma nkuru ivuga biriya, hari leta zo muri Amerika zishyira mu bikorwa ibikubiye mu masezerano ya Paris, kandi twizera n’abandi ko hari igihe bazagera aho bakabyumva neza.”
“Ikindi ni uko ibimenyetso byerekana ko ihindagurika ry’ibihe rihari kandi rituruka ku bikorwa bya muntu. Ikindi gituma tugira icyo cyizere ni uko ikoranabuhanga ririmo kugenda riganisha ku ntego zihawe mu masezerano ya Paris.”
Yatanze ingero ku buryo mu bihugu byinshi barimo kwitabira kubyaza umusaruro ingufu z’imirasira y’izuba, uburyo ikoreshwa ry’ibicanwa nk’amakara bigabanyuka n’uburyo inganda z’imodoka zirimo izamaze gukoresha amashanyarazi, zitarekura imyotsi ihumanya ikirere.
Ati “Iyo ikoranabuhanga ryafashe umurongo nk’uwo, wabyemera utabyemera, ufata umurongo isoko riguhaye. Ni cyo kintu kiduha icyizere, natwe nubwo tudakora imodoka hari imyaka izagera nushaka imodoka ya mazutu ntuyibone kuko ntawe uzaba akiyikora.”
Ibipimo bigaragaza ko mu Rwanda ubushyuhe bwazamutse ku gipimo mpuzandengo cya dogere celcius 1.4 kuva mu 1970, kandi mu gihe nta gikozwe, cyazamuka kugera kuri dogere celcius 2.5 bitarenze umwaka wa 2050.

Title: Hatagize igikorwa tumwe mu duce tw’Iburasirazuba twahinduka ubutayu
Body:
Tumwe mu duce two mu Ntara y’Iburasirazuba, twugarijwe n’izuba mu buryo bukomeye ku buryo hatagize igikorwa hamera nko mu butayu.
Tumwe mu duce two mu Ntara y’Iburasirazuba, twugarijwe n’izuba mu buryo bukomeye ku buryo hatagize igikorwa hamera nko mu butayu.
Mu myaka ya 2002 kugeza 2006 abigaga mu mashuri abanza hirya no hino mu gihugu baribuka imfashanyo zatangwaga n’abanyeshuri, insengero n’imiryango itandukanye hagamijwe gufasha abaturage bari batuye mu Bugesera bitewe n’izuba ryahavaga bahinga bikuma.
Icyo gihe Bugesera inzara yavuzaga ubuhuha biturutse ku zuba ryahavaga ari ryinshi cyane kubera uburyo hari ubutayu, nta biti byaharangwaga. Byatumaga abaturage bari bahatuye basuhukira hirya no hino mu gihugu.
Icyo gihe leta yagerageje uko ishoboye ihashya inzara muri aka gace maze Bugesera itahwamo amahoro biturutse ku ngamba zafashwe zirimo ko buri muturage atera igiti akakivomerera, abanyeshuri bikaba uko ubu Bugesera ntiwamenya ko inzara yahigeze.
Aya mateka sinyagaruye kugira ngo nibutse abantu izuba ryavuye icyo gihe, ahubwo mbigaruye kugira ngo twibukiranye ibyatumaga ya mvura ibura mbona na n’ubu tudafatiranye bya bihe byagaruka mu batuye Kirehe, Ngoma na Kayonza.
Maze iminsi ngenderera utu turere ndi mu modoka z’abagenzi, twahagera nkabona abagenzi bose bafite agahinda bitewe n’ibishyimbo n’ibigori byumiye mu mirima kubera kubura imvura.
Iyo unaganiriye n’abaturage bahatuye wumva agahinda ari kose kuko imvura igwa hakurya Tanzania, igahita yambuka ikagwa Rwamagana n’ahandi nyamara igice kinini cya Kayonza, Ngoma na Kirehe ntihagwe ikahasimbuka.
Bamwe mu baturage iyo muganira batebya bagira bati “Impamvu tutabona imvura ni aba bashinwa bari kubaka uyu muhanda kuko no mu 1974 ubwo bubakaga uyu muhanda inaha nabwo twari twarabuze imvura”.
Nyamara iyo utereye amaso mu bigaragara ukirengagiza ibyo abaturage bavuga, usanga ikibitera ari ukutagira amashyamba menshi muri aka karere, imisozi myinshi yaho yambaye ubusa uraterera ijisho ku musozi rigahingukira hakurya ku buryo wagira ngo ni mu butayu.
Benshi mu batuye aka gace bavuga ko bijya gutangira, abari abayobozi bigabije amashyamba ya leta yarari muri ibi bice bagurisha ibiti byose ibindi babitwikamo amakara abanya-Kigali, barayarangura biratinda Kayonza iramamara mu Rwanda mu kugira amakara meza.
Icyo gihe uwashakaga amakara meza bamurangiraga kugura ayaturutse Kayonza, nyamara uko batemaga ibiti niko n’udusozi badusigaga ku gasi twambaye ubusa.
Mu 2016 ibi bice byateje gusuhuka ku banyarwanda bitewe n’izuba ryinshi

Mu 2016 izuba ryinshi ryavuye mu Rwanda, ryatumye bamwe mu batuye Iburasirazuba basuhuka, aho bavugaga ko bahunga inzara nyamara bamwe mu bayobozi bo bavugaga ko atari inzara ari amapfa.
Icyo gihe Minisitiri w’ubuhinzi n’ubworozi , Dr Gerardine Mukeshimana, yavuze ko izuba ryavuye cyane ryangije hegitari ibihumbi 17 z’ibihingwa, ingaruka z’ibiza zikaba zaratumye imiryango ibihumbi 47 360 yugarizwa n’ibura ry’ibiribwa.
Mu turere twa Kayonza, Kirehe na Ngoma hegitari zigera ku bihumbi 9000 z’imyaka yavuze ko zumye kubera izuba ryinshi. Gusa ahakana ko nta nzara yariri mu Rwanda ko igihari ari amapfa.
Abashinzwe ubumenyi bw’ikirere barabisobanura

Mu mibare ituruka mu kigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe ubumenyi bw’ikirere (Meteo Rwanda), igaragaza ko mu mezi ya Nzeri n’Ukwakira utu duce aritwo twabonye imvura nke mu gihugu ariko mu kwezi k’Ugushyingo n’iminsi makumyabiri y’Ukuboza 2018, hakaba haraguye imvura ingana na 75-100mm n’imvura nke izagwa mu kwezi kwa Mutarama 2019 iri hagati ya mm 30-40.
Umuyobozi w’agateganyo mu ishami ry’iteganyagihe mu kigo cy’Igihugu cy’ubumenyi bw’Ikirere Mbiti Mugunga Mathieu, yabwiye IGIHE ko impamvu biriya bice bibura imvura ari uko nta biti biharangwa.
Yagize ati “Iyo urebye imiterere ya hariya hantu ntabwo yafasha imvura kugwa kuko nta mashyamba na make ahagaragara ,hambere nagiyeyo nsanga uretse no kuba nta mashyamba nta n’ibiti bihagaragara. Nabajije abayobozi baho impamvu badatera ibiti bambwira ko babitera rimwe na rimwe abaturage bakabitema bikiri bito bakajya kubicana ibindi ngo bikuma kubera kubura imvura.”
Yakomeje agira ati “Muri kariya gace imvura nziza baheruka niyo babonye mu kwezi kwa kane naho nyuma yaho babona nke cyane. Imvura izayo iturutse mu mashyamba ya Tanzaniya yahagera ikabura ibiti n’amashyamba biyikomeza igaca hejuru ikajya kugwa za Kabarondo n’ahandi”.
Mugunga yagiriye inama leta yo kuhafatira ingamba kuko biri kugenda biba bibi ati “Inama natanga nuko leta yakwita kuri kiriya gice bakahatera amashyamba menshi nibwo abaturage bakongera kubona imvura neza.”
Umuyobozi w’Ikigo gishinzwe kubungabunga amazi n’amashyamba Ngabonziza Prime, yabwiye IGIHE ko bafite gahunda yihariye yo kwita ku Ntara y’Iburasirazuba kuko icyo kibazo nabo bakibonye.
Yagize ati “Icyo kibazo turakizi ni nayo mpamvu twatangiye gahunda yihariye yo kwita ku Ntara y’Iburasirazuba cyane cyane Kirehe, Kayonza, Ngoma na Nyagatare. Iyi ntara tuyishoramo 70% by’amafaranga yose tubona ariko sinzi aho ikibazo kikiri. Mu igenamigambi rya 2018/2019 ni rya 2019/2020, tuzahashora 70% by’amafaranga yose duhabwa na leta.”
Yakomeje avuga ko hari n’indi gahunda bahafite izatangira muri Nzeri umwaka utaha izibanda cyane cyane muri ibi bice byangiritse cyane kubera kutagira amashyamba.
Ngabonziza yibaza impamvu nta gihinduka mu turere tuba twabonye amafaranga menshi anasaba inzego zibanze kubafasha gukangurira abaturage kwita ku biti biba byatewe.
Ati “Siniyumvisha uburyo nka Kirehe ntampinduka zihaba nyamara uyu mwaka ariko Karere twahaye amafaranga menshi cyane, twagahaye miliyari imwe mu gihe utundi turere twabahaye nka miliyoni 30. Icyo dusaba rero inzego zibanze nizidufashe gukangurira abaturage kwita ku biti biba byatewe nibatabyitaho ntacyahinduka nibumve ko igiti kitabwaho nk’ibindi bihingwa byose.”
Muri gahunda Ikigo gishinzwe kubungabunga amazi n’amashyamba giteganya gukora muri utu turere twa Kayonza, Ngoma na Kirehe bigaragara ko hazaterwa ibiti byinshi byitezweho kuzahura ibi bice byakunze kurangwa n’igisa n’ubutayu.
Akarere ka Ngoma hateganyijwe guterwa ibiti bivangwa n’imyaka kuri hegitari 2 668, amashyamba ku misozi angana na hegitari 228 hasazurwa amashyamba hegitari 18 hanaterwe ibiti by’imbuto 9155.
Akarere ka Kayonza hateganyijwe guterwa ibiti bivangwa n’imyaka hegitari 7065, Amashyamba kumisozi hegitari 1511 hazasazurwa hegitari 5 haterwe ibiti by’imbuto kuri hegitari 9500.
Akarere ka Kirehe hateganyijwe guterwa ibiti bivangwa n’imyaka huri hegitari 1582 hazasazurwa hegitari 5,4 hazaterwa amashyamba angana na hegitari 675 ndetse haterwe n’ibiti by’imbuto kuri hegitari 5141.
Karekezi Godfrey utuye muri aka gace avuga ko izuba riri kwibasira aka gace ryatumye insina ze zuma nyamara mbere yarapakizaga imodoka akajyana kugurisha.
Ati “Mbere izuba ritaraba ryinshi napakizaga imodoka ibitoki nkajyana i Kigali, ariko ubu no kubona icyo ndya ntibinyorohera hashize nk’imyaka itatu tuvusha izuba kuva mu kwa Gatanu kugera mu kwa cumi n’abiri, leta ikwiye kugira icyo ikora hakiri kare.”
Karekezi akomeza asaba leta kubashyiriraho uburyo bwiza bahingamo, kuko iyo bakurikije ibihe by’ihinga ibyo batera bikunda gupfira mu mirima kubera izuba ryinshi.
Minisitiri w’ubuhinzi n’ubworozi, Dr. Gerardine Mukeshimana, yabwiye IGIHE ko babibonye ko mu myaka itatu ishize igihembwe cya mbere cy’ihinga kitakunze kugenda neza muri ibi bice, gusa akavuga ko hari ingamba bafashe zirimo no kuhira imyaka.
Ati “Mu mirenge ya Mpanga na Mahama twatangiye gukorerayo imishinga yo kuhira imyaka ku buryo bwagutse hegitari ibihumbi 5000, ariko na Kayonza mu murenge wa Ndego dufiteyo umushinga uzatangira umwaka utaha turi kugenda twagura ibikorwa byo kuhira muri iyi mirenge ikunda guhura n’ibibazo”.
Yakomeje avuga ko hari nabo bazi bateye bikumira mu murima kubera izuba ryinshi ariko ko bababaruye kugira ngo babafashe hakiri kare, yijeje abatuye muri ibi bice kubagezaho ibikoresho by’ingenzi hakiri kare mu rwego rwo kwitegura igihembwe cya kabiri cy’ihinga.

Title: Icyuho mu guca ibikoresho byonona amashanyarazi bikanasohora imyuka yangiza ibidukikije muri EAC
Body:
Ibihugu byo muri Afurika y’Uburasirazuba ntibirahuriza ku ngamba zigenga ikoreshwa ry’ibyuma bikonjesha nka frigo, ibyohereza umwuka mu nyubako n’amatara akoresha amashanyarazi bisohora imyuka yangiza ibidukikije n’ingufu z’amashanyarazi.
Ibihugu byo muri Afurika y’Uburasirazuba ntibirahuriza ku ngamba zigenga ikoreshwa ry’ibyuma bikonjesha nka frigo, ibyohereza umwuka mu nyubako n’amatara akoresha amashanyarazi bisohora imyuka yangiza ibidukikije n’ingufu z’amashanyarazi.
Ibihugu biri muri EAC bifite ingamba zo gukumira ibi bikoresho ariko ntiziranozwa ngo zishyirwe mu bikorwa.
Kenya yashyizeho amabwiriza mu 2012 ariko ntacyo yahinduye mu iyinjizwa ry’ibi bikoresho. Uganda nayo yayashyizeho ariko ntiyashyizwe mu bikorwa.
U Rwanda ruri mu nzira yo gushyiraho amabwiriza mu gihe u Burundi, Tanzania na Sudani y’Epfo, intambwe yabyo ikiri hasi.
Umuyobozi w’Ikigo gishinzwe Kubungabunga Ibidukikije (REMA), Eng. Coletha Ruhamya, yasabye ko EAC na Afurika yose ikwiye guhuza ingamba mu gukumira ibi bikoresho.
Yabigarutseho ku wa 29 Ugushyingo 2018 mu kiganiro cyahuje abayobozi baturuka muri Afurika cyabereye mu Ihuriro rya mbere Nyafurika ku Bukungu butangiza Ibidukikije riteraniye i Kigali.
Insanganyamatsiko yacyo yibanze ku “Kwihutisha ingamba zo gukumira ibikoresho bikonjesha byangiza ingufu z’amashanyarazi bikanangiza ibidukikije muri Afurika.’’
Bigamije gushyira mu bikorwa amavugurura ya Kigali ku masezerano ya Montréal yerekeye ibintu byangiza akayunguruzo k’imirasire y’izuba. Yemejwe burundu muri Mata 2017.
Umuyobozi wa Gahunda ya Rwanda Cooling Initiative, Kayitare Morris, yasobanuye ko hazashyirwaho ibipimo ntarengwa bizagenderwaho ku bikoresho nka frigo n’ibyuma bitanga ubukonje mu nzu (air conditioners), harebwa umuriro bitarenza ku mwaka n’imyuka bikoresha (Refrigerant) igomba kuba itangiza ibidukikije ari byo byitwa Minimum Energy Performance Standards (MEPS).
Yagize ati “Muri uyu mushinga turareba ingufu z’amashanyarazi n’imyuka ibyo bikoresho bikoresha. Hari frigo zigomba gukurwaho zifite imyuka ya Hydrochlorofluorocarbons (HCFCs) kuko ihumanya ikirere, naho izikoresha hydrofluorocarbons (HFCs) zikagabanywa nkuko amavugurura ya Kigali abiteganya.”
Amasezerano ya Montréal yemeje ikurwaho ry’ibikoresho bifite imyuka ya HCFCs, bisimbuzwa ibisohora iya HFCs ariko na byo ubushyuhe bwabyo buguma ku Isi bikangiza ibidukikije.
Amavugurura y’i Kigali yemeje ko bihagarikwa. Agena ko ibihugu bikize bizagabanya ikoreshwa rya HFCs ku gipimo cya 85% hagati ya 2019 na 2036; ibiri mu nzira y’amajyambere bikayigabanya kuri 80% hagati ya 2024 na 2045.
 Kayitare yavuze ko “Mu Rwanda hari ibikoresho bifite ubushyuhe bukenewe, hari n’ibirengeje urugero. Frigo zizanwa mu gihugu zizajya zisuzumwa, izitujuje ibisabwa ngo zinjire zikumirwe.”
Frigo nyinshi ziza mu Rwanda zituruka mu Bushinwa. Ubu izigezweho ku isoko ni izikoresha imyuka ya HFO (hydrofluoro-olefin) itangiza Ozone.
Biteganyijwe ko aya mabwiriza azemezwa mu 2019, agatangira kubahirizwa mu myaka ibiri.
Impuguke mu Kigo cya Afurika y’Uburasirazuba cyita ku Ngufu zisubira (EACREEE), Michael Kiza, yavuze ko hakenewe kongera ubukangurambaga mu bihugu bya EAC bitarashyiraho amabwiriza.
Yagize ati “Ikigo cyacu cyita ku gushyiraho ingamba zihuriweho mu Karere kuko turi ku isoko rimwe aho ibicuruzwa bihererekanywa byoroshye mu bihugu bitandatu.”
Yavuze ko hakiri imbogamizi mu bushobozi kuko ibi bikoresho bihenda ndetse ibyiganje ku isoko biba byarakoreshejwe.
Amahirwe ari mu guhuza amabwiriza arimo kubaka isoko rimwe ritumizwaho ibikoresho byifuzwa, kugabanya ibiciro, kurwanya magendu no gushyiraho laboratwari igenzurirwamo ubuziranenge bw’ibikoresho.
Amavuvurura ya Kigali azashyirwa mu bikorwa muri Mutarama 2019. Ni nyuma y’Inama mpuzamahanga yiga ku mihindagurikire y’Ikirere (COP 24) izabera Katowice muri Pologne.
Eng. Ruhamya yavuze ko iyi nama Afurika ikwiye kuyijyamo ifite intego imwe ku guhangana n’iyangirika ry’ibidukikije.
Yanasabye ko habaho inyandiko ihuriweho na Afurika igaragaza ko yiyemeje gukumira ibikoresho byangiza ibidukikije n’ingufu z’amashanyarazi, ikazaganirwaho muri iyo nama.
Ibyuma bitanga ubukonje na frigo bizikuba hafi inshuro ebyiri bigere kuri miliyari ebyiri mu 2030, mu bihugu biri gutera imbere. Ingufu zikoreshwa na zo ziziyongera kuko mu 2050, 2/3 by’inyubako zose zizaba zirimo ibyuma bitanga amahumbezi.
Muri Werurwe 2018, Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye ryita ku Bidukikije (UN Environment) ritera inkunga umushinga wa Rwanda Cooling Initiative, ryaganiriye na EAC ku ishyirwaho ry’ingamba zihuriweho.

Title: Ibyemezo bya Trump ku kubungabunga ibidukikije bizahombya Amerika miliyari $500 ku mwaka
Body:
Muri Kamena 2017, Amerika yivanye byeruye mu masezerano ya Paris arebana n’imihindagurikire y’ibihe yashyizweho mu rwego rwo guhangana n’imihindagurikire y’ikirere ihangayikishije Isi.
Muri Kamena 2017, Amerika yivanye byeruye mu masezerano ya Paris arebana n’imihindagurikire y’ibihe yashyizweho mu rwego rwo guhangana n’imihindagurikire y’ikirere ihangayikishije Isi.
Ni icyemezo, Perezida wa Amerika, Donald Trump yavuze ko kigamije kuzuza inshingano ze zo kurinda Amerika n’abayituye.
Ibiro bye bya White House byasohoye inyandiko igaragaza ko ibyemezo bye birebana no kubungabunga ibidukikije bizatwara abenegihugu miliyari $500.
Ni imibare yatangajwe nyuma ya raporo y’impapuro 100 yasohowe ku wa Gatanu nyuma y’ibirori bizwi nka “Thanksgiving.”
Ivuga ko “Hari ibihamya ko imihindagurikire y’ikirere igira ingaruka ku muntu yiyongera ubutitsa. Ingaruka z’imihindagurikire y’ikirere ziteye inkeke mu gihugu cyose ndetse impungenge ku buzima bw’Abanyamerika, imibanire n’ubukungu ntibigarara.”
Itsinda rya Trump ryirinze kugaragaza ko politiki yo kureberera ibyangiza ikirere izoreka igihugu.
Abahanga mu by’ubumenyi bw’Isi bahuriye mu Kigo cyita ku Bidukikije cya National Climate Assessment (NCA) batanze impuruza ko kuba nta gikorwa bizagira ingaruka ndetse bigatwara Abanyamerika miliyari $500 ku mwaka bitewe n’ubwiyongere bw’indwara n’impfu, iyangirika ry’inyubako, igabanuka ry’umusaruro w’abakozi n’ibindi.
Ni ubusesenguzi bushingiye ku nyandiko ikubiye mu mpapuro 600 yakozwe kuva mu 2017, igaragaza ingaruka ibyemezo bya Trump bifite ku Banyamerika.
Ikinyamakuru Thinkprogress cyanditse ko White House yabonye raporo ariko yirengagiza ibyayivuyemo.
Raporo ivuga ko uburemere buterwa no kuba ubutegetsi bwa Trump ntacyo bukora buzagira ingaruka zikomeye ku bazadukomokaho mu myaka 50 iri imbere.
Ku butegetsi bwa Obama nibwo Amerika yemeye amasezerano ya Paris yashyizweho umukono n’ibihugu hafi 200 mu Ukuboza 2015. Yasabaga ko igabanya imyuka ihumanya ikirere yoherezwa, nibura kuri 30% bitarenze 2025.
Amerika ni iya kabiri ku Isi mu bihugu byohereza Carbon nyinshi mu kirere nyuma y’u Bushinwa.
U Rwanda ku wa 20 Ukwakira 2016 rwinjiye mu mubare w’ibyageraga kuri 80 byari bimaze kwemeza burundu amasezerano y’i Paris. Agena ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry’ingamba zo gukumira izamuka ry’igipimo mpuzandengo cy’ubushyuhe bw’Isi, kikaguma hasi ya dogere Celcius ebyiri ariko intego ikaba ko kigera hasi ya dogere Celcius 1.5.

Title: Ingagi zo mu misozi zavanywe mu cyiciro cy’inyamaswa ziri mu byago bikomeye byo gukendera
Body:
Ihuriro Mpuzamahanga ryo kubungabunga ibidukikije (IUCN), ryemeje ko ingagi zo mu misozi zikomeje kwiyongera ku rwego rushimishije, ku buryo zitakiri mu mubare w’inyamaswa zigeramiwe ndetse zishobora gucika ku Isi.
Ihuriro Mpuzamahanga ryo kubungabunga ibidukikije (IUCN), ryemeje ko ingagi zo mu misozi zikomeje kwiyongera ku rwego rushimishije, ku buryo zitakiri mu mubare w’inyamaswa zigeramiwe ndetse zishobora gucika ku Isi.
IUCN ikurikirana urwego inyamaswa n’ibimera bibungabunzweho ku Isi yose, hashingiwe ku bimenyetso n’isesengura ry’abahanga.
Nk’uko yabitangaje kuri uyu wa Gatatu, ingagi zo mu misozi ziganje mu Rwanda, Uganda na Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo zavanwe mu cyiciro ziri cya ‘critically endangered’ zishyirwa mu cyiciro cya “endangered’ hagendewe ku rwego rw’ibyago bikizibuza kororoka.
Mu myaka 40 ishize nibwo Dr Diane Fossey wamenyekanye mu Rwanda mu kwita ku ngagi n’amahanga ashishikazwa no kwita ku bidukikije, bashavujwe n’uko umuryango w’ingagi wari uzwi nka ‘Group 4’ wamazwe n’ibikorwa bya ba rushimusi.
Group 4 niwo muryango wa mbere w’Ingagi wakoreweho ubushakashatsi n’ikigo Karisoke Research Center cyashinzwe na Dr. Fossey.
Mu 1978 ingagi enye zari zigize Group 4 zishwe na ba rushimusi, izindi eshatu zipfa zizize ingaruka zishingiye ku ihungabanywa ry’umuryango wazo. Kugeza mu Ukuboza uwo mwaka, imiryango itatu y’ingagi muri 11 yabarurwaga niyo yari ikiba hamwe.
Nyuma y’isenywa rya Group 4 ingagi zigasigara ari 240 gusa, Fossey yatangiye kugira ubwoba ko ingagi zizazimira bitarenze umwaka wa 2000.
Gusa bijyanye n’imbaraga nyinshi zashyizwe mu kubungabunga ingagi mu birunga, zarongeye ziba nyinshi ku buryo zavuye kuri 240 mu myaka 30 ishize, zigera kuri 604 muri Kamena 2016. 
Iyi mibare kandi ntirimo iziri mu ishyamba rya Bwindi muri Uganda kuko ho ubushakashatsi bugikorwa, ariko ibarura ryaho mu 2011 ryerekanye ko harimo ingagi zigera kuri 400. Bivuze ko ubu ingagi zibarurwa muri iki gice zirenga 1000.
Umuyobozi wa Fossey Fund, Dr. Tara Stoinski yavuze ko iyi ari inkuru ikomeye ku rugendo rwo kubungabunga ibinyabuzima.
Ati “Ni umusaruro w’ibikorwa bimaze imyaka myinshi byo kurengera ingagi ndetse hari n’abantu babisizemo ubuzima, n’igihamya cy’imbaraga zikomeje gukoreshwa na Guverinoma y’u Rwanda, Uganda na Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, aho izi ngagi ziba.”
Umuyobozi ushinzwe u Rwanda muri Fossey Fund, Felix Ndagijimana, we yavuze ko ibi ari ari urugero rwiza rw’ubufatanye bwa za Guverinoma, imiryango irengera ibidukikije n’abaturage.
Yashimangiye ko biteguye kongera imbaraga mu gufatanya na Guverinoma y’u Rwanda mu kurengera umurage w’ibinyabuzima.
Dr. Stoinski yavuze ko nubwo hari intambwe ikomeye imaze guterwa, bikwiye kuzirikanwa ko ibibazo byugarije ingagi ntaho byagiye, birimo icyanya zituyemo.
Zose hamwe zisaranganya ubuso bungana na metero kare miliyoni 2.5, zigakomeza kwibasirwa n’indwara, ibikorwa bya muntu n’ihindagurika ry’ibihe, byose bikazifatanye n’umubare muto wazo.
Uretse ingagi zo mu misozi ziganje cyane mu Rwanda zikomeza kwiyongera, andi moko y’ingagi yo yagumye mu cyiciro cy’inyamaswa zugarijwe, akomeje gukendera.
Fossey Fund ivuga ko ikomeje kongera imbaraga mu kurengera ingagi z’ubwoko bwa Grauer buba muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo. Nibura 80% by’ubwo bwoko bw’ingagi zishwe mu myaka 20 ishize.
N’andi moko y’ingagi nka ‘Cross River gorilla’, Western lowland gorilla n’andi atandukanye, nayo agenda agabanyuka kubera indwara zirimo na Ebola.
Ingagi zo mu misozi zaherukaga gushyirwa mu cyiciro cya ‘critically endangered’ ubwo zari nke cyane, munsi ya 250.
Guverinoma y’u Rwanda iheruka gutangaza gahunda yo kwagura Pariki y’Igihugu y’Ibirunga ikava ku buso bwa kilometero kare 160, ikongerwaho ¼ bitarenze imyaka itanu.
Muri Gicurasi 2017 Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere (RDB) cyakubye kabiri igiciro cy’abajya gusura ingagi mu birunga kiva ku madolari 750 kigera ku 1500$ ku bantu bose, hagamijwe gushaka ishoramari ryo gushyira mu mishinga yo kuzibungabunga.
Mu mwaka ushize umusaruro u Rwanda rukura mu bikorwa by’ubukerarugendo wageze kuri miliyoni $438, wiyongeraho miliyoni $34 ugereranyije na 2016.

Title: Imishinga myiza y’ubuzima no kubungabunga ibidukikije muri Afurika igiye guhatanira $50,000
Body:
Ba rwiyemezamirimo mu ikoranabuhanga bashyiriweho irushanwa ry’inkorokoro mu guhanga udushya two kubaka uburyo bwo guhangana n’ibibazo bitandatu by’ingutu biri mu buzima n’ibidukikije muri Afurika.
Ba rwiyemezamirimo mu ikoranabuhanga bashyiriweho irushanwa ry’inkorokoro mu guhanga udushya two kubaka uburyo bwo guhangana n’ibibazo bitandatu by’ingutu biri mu buzima n’ibidukikije muri Afurika.
Iri rushanwa ryateguwe na Sosiyete y’Abanyamerika ya Johnson & Johnson ikora mu bijyanye na serivisi zo kwa muganga, yashinzwe mu 1886.
Ryiswe Champions of Science Africa Innovation Challenge 2.0, ni irushanwa rya kabiri rikomeye mu yahuza abahanga mu ikoranabuhanga muri Afurika binyuze mu kugaragaza ibitekerezo by’udushya n’ingamba zakomeza kuzanzamura umugabane.
Abazaryitabira bazatanga ibitekerezo mu byiciro bitandatu. Birimo kwita ku bafite ikibazo cy’uburwayi bwo mu mutwe; abari hagati ya 75-85% barwaye mu mutwe muri Afurika ntibagerwaho na serivisi z’ubuvuzi.
Ikindi kijyanye no kubyaza umusaruro ibikoresho byakoreshejwe (Packaging Innovations). Izamuka ry’imyanda iterwa n’ibisigazwa by’ibikoresho riteye inkeke muri Afurika.
Icya gatatu ni ugukora imiti ivuye mu byatsi n’ibiti (Botanical Solutions). Ingo ziri hagati ya 60 na 80% muri Afurika zikoresha imiti gakondo mu buvuzi.
Hari n’uburyo bwunganira abakora kwa muganga bagorwa no gukurikirana indwara z’ibyorezo n’imbogamizi ziri mu buvuzi. Ni uburyo buzafasha abaganga n’abaforomo gutanga serivisi nziza.
Ubuvuzi kandi bukeneye ikoranabuhanga rigezweho ryafasha Afurika guhangana n’indwara nka Sida, Igituntu, Ebola, ubuzima bwo mu mutwe n’ubw’umubyeyi, byibasira cyane abagore. Haziyambazwa application n’ubundi buryo bwakoroshya ihanahana ry’amakuru mu kwihutisha ubuvuzi.
Afurika kandi ikeneye abahanga mu kubaga kuko hari indwara zivurwa abarwayi banyujijwemo icyuma mu gihe ibitaro byinshi bidafite izo serivisi.
Ibi ni byo bishakirwa ibisubizo birambye binyuze mu mishinga izatoranywa.
Ba ny’ir’imishinga izatoranywa bazahabwa $50,000, akabakaba miliyoni 44Frw, banahugurwe n’abahanga bakorana Johnson & Johnson ku kuyishyira mu bikorwa.
Umuyobozi ushinzwe Ikoranabuhanga muri Johnson & Johnson Consumer Inc. Josh Ghaim, yavuze ko iri rushanwa rigiye kuba ku nshuro ya kabiri rigamije kwagura ba rwiyemezamirimo no kubafasha guhanga ibisubizo by’ibibazo bihari.
Yagize ati “Izamuka ry’ibigo byo guhanga udushya muri Afurika riragaragaza ba rwiyemezamirimo bashya bafite inyota yo gushaka inzira nshya zo gushaka ibisubizo bya sosiyete zabo.”
Johnson & Johnson Family igizwe n’ibigo bikomeye mu by’ubuzima ndetse imaze imyaka 85 ikorana na Afurika mu bihugu birenga 25.
Ibitekerezo by’imishinga bishobora gutangwa n’umuntu ku giti cye cyangwa ikigo. Ushobora gusura urubuga rwa Africa Innovation Challenge ku bindi bisobanuro.
Igikorwa cyo kwakira imishinga izatoranywa kizasozwa ku wa 16 Mutarama 2019, ari nawo mwaka uzatangarizwamo iyatoranyijwe.

Title: Ubuso bungana na 30% bw’u Rwanda buzaba buteyeho amashyamba mu 2020
Body:
Leta y’u Rwanda yiyemeje ko mu 2020 ubuso buteyeho amashyamba buzaba bungana na 30 % bw’ubugize igihugu ukuyemo uburiho inzuzi ibiyaga n’imigezi.
Leta y’u Rwanda yiyemeje ko mu 2020 ubuso buteyeho amashyamba buzaba bungana na 30 % bw’ubugize igihugu ukuyemo uburiho inzuzi ibiyaga n’imigezi.
Kugeza ubu ubuso buteyeho amashyamba mu Rwanda, bungana na 29.6%, mu gihe kitageze ku myaka ibiri bukazaba bungana na 30% hagamijwe kubungabunga urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima.
Byatangajwe na Minisitiri ushinzwe Imirimo y’Inama y’Abaminisitiri, Marie Solange Kayisire, mu muganda usoza ukwezi k’Ukwakira 2018 wahuriranye no kwizihiza ku nshuro ya 43 umunsi w’amashyamba, wizihirijwe mu karere ka Kicukiro mu Murenge wa Gatenga, ahatewe ibiti by’inturusu ku buso bwa hegitari zisaga 20.
Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Ikigo gishinzwe kubungabunga amazi n’amshyamba mu Rwanda, Ngabonziza Prime, yavuze ko muri iki gihembwe bahariye gutera amashyamba hazaterwa ibiti bivangwa n’imyaka ku buso bwa hegitari ibihumbi 38 hamwe n’ibiti by’ishyamba kuri hegitari hafi ibihumbi bitanu, bakazanaha abaturage ibiti by’imbuto ibihumbi 225.
Mu Rwanda, abaturage 500 batuye kuri kilometero kare imwe, bamwe muri bo batuye ku misozi ihanamye aho bagiye batema amashyamba yari ahateye.
Ibi bishobora gushyira ubuzima bwabo mu kaga kuko bashobora kwibasirwa n’isuri ndetse n’ibiza.
Mu 2011, Guverinoma y’u Rwanda yihaye intego ko mu 2030, ubuso bungana na hegitari miliyoni ebyiri buzaba buteyeho amashyamba, kugeza ubu hamaze hegitari zisaga 600 z’amashyamba yari ashaje.

Title: Icyogajuru BepiColombo cyatangiye urugendo rujya ku mubumbe wa Mercure
Body:
Icyogajuru BepiColombo cyoherejwe mu bushakashatsi ku mubumbe wa Mercure, urugendo rwa kilometero miliyari zirinzdwi rwitezweho kuzafata imyaka irindwi.
Icyogajuru BepiColombo cyoherejwe mu bushakashatsi ku mubumbe wa Mercure, urugendo rwa kilometero miliyari zirinzdwi rwitezweho kuzafata imyaka irindwi.
BepiColombo yoherejwe mu kirere iturutse muri Amerika y’Epfo, yitwaje ibikoresho bibiri bizwi nka "sondes’ birimo icyakorewe mu Kigo gishinzwe ibirebana n’ibyogajuru mu Burayi, ESA na Jaxa yo mu Buyapani.
Iki cyogajuru gifite ubushobozi bwo kubaho imyaka 8.5, cyitezweho kohereza ku Isi amakuru atandukanye ku bibazo byibazwa ku mubumbe wa Mercure uzwiho gushyuha cyane.
Prof Dave Rothery wo muri Open University mu Bwongereza yabwiye BBC ko nta byinshi bizwi ku buryo umubumbe wa Mercure wabayeho, kandi igihe cyose batarawusobanukirwa bigoye kumenya ukuri kuzuye ku birebana n’Isi.
U Burayi n’u Buyapani byohereje icyogajuru kuri Mercure, nyuma y’aho mu 1970, Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zoherejeyo icyitwa Mariner.
Mariner yatumye haboneka amakuru make kuri Mercure arimo kuba uyu mubumbe uriho amazi ariko yahindutse urubura, ndetse n’ibuye risa n’irikoreshwa mu ikaramu y’igiti (graphite).
Umubumbe wa Mercure uherereye mu kilometero miliyoni 58 uvuye ku Izuba. Abahanga mu bumenyi bw’ikirere bavuga ko Izuba rihagera rikubye inshuro 10 irigera ku Isi.
