Title: Byinshi kuri Banki yihariye izatera inkunga imishinga irengera ibidukikije mu Rwanda
Body:
U Rwanda rwiyemeje gushyira ingufu zishoboka mu kurengera ibidukikije zirimo ishyirwaho rya banki itera inkunga imishinga iri muri uru rwego.
U Rwanda rwiyemeje gushyira ingufu zishoboka mu kurengera ibidukikije zirimo ishyirwaho rya banki itera inkunga imishinga iri muri uru rwego.
Iyi banki biteganywa ko izitwa ‘Rwanda Catalytic Green Investment Bank’, yitezweho kongera amafaranga yashorwaga mu mishinga igamije kurengera ibidukikije mu gihugu.
Izaba ikora nk’izindi banki ariko yibanda gusa ku gutanga inguzanyo no gushora imari yayo mu mishinga igamije kurengera ibidukikije.
Uru rwego rw’imari ruteganywa gushyirwaho, ruzafasha mu gukangurira ibigo byigenga gushyigikira ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry’imishinga itangiza ibidukikije mu gihugu.
Umukozi ushinzwe itumanaho mu kigega cya leta gisanzwe gitera inkunga imishinga irengera ibidukikije (Fonerwa), Doreen Nakure, yabwiye IGIHE ko Fonerwa ari yo ishinzwe gukurikirana by’umwihariko ishyirwaho ry’iyo banki, cyamaze gushyiraho itsinda ry’inzobere rizatanga ishusho nyayo y’imiterere n’imikorere y’iyo banki mu gihe cya vuba.
Ati “Ubu twamaze guha akazi umuryango ‘Coalition for Green Capital’ kizadusesengurira ndetse kikaduha imiterere y’ishusho y’iyo banki ku rwego mpuzamahanga. Ibijyanye n’ingano y’amafaranga iyo banki izatangiza bizagaragazwa n’inyigo iri gukorwa n’icyo kigo gifatanyije n’abandi bafatanyabikorwa.”
The Coalition for Green Capital ni umuryango udaharanira inyungu, wibanda cyane ku guteza imbere isoko ry’ingufu zidahumanya, binyuze mu gushyiraho banki ziteza imbere imishinga irengera ibidukikije.
Kuva mu mwaka wa 2009, uyu muryango ufatanya n’ibihugu, ndetse n’imiryango itari iya Leta gushyiraho ibigo by’imari bishyigikira imishinga migari irengera ibidukikije, kigakora ubuvugizi, ndetse kigatanga ubujyanama n’ubugenzuzi mu mikorere y’ibyo bigo.
Kugeza ubu ntibirasobanuka neza niba iyi banki izaba ari iya Leta cyangwa iy’abikorera; gusa Nakure avuga ko bizaterwa n’ibintu byinshi bikiri kuganirwaho ubu, ariko akagaragaza ko byagakwiye kuba igikorwa cy’abikorera.
Iyi banki nitangira, izajya itera inkunga imishinga ya Leta n’abikorera igamije kurengera ibidukikije, habanje kurebwa niba yujuje ibisabwa.
Nakure avuga ko iki gitekerezo cyo gushyiraho iyi banki kiri gushingira ku mahame yihariye ajyanye no kugena uburyo bwo kwifatira ibyemezo mu ishoramari, ubushobozi bwo kwiyongerera imari ivuye mu bigo by’imari ndetse no mu bikorera, hashingiwe cyane cyane ku bikorwa by’indashyikirwa bya banki mpuzamahanga zitera inkunga imishinga irengera ibidukikije, ubufasha bwa Fonerwa ndetse n’abandi bagira uruhare muri iri soko.
Amakuru ajyanye n’itangizwa ry’iyi banki mu Rwanda yatangarijwe bwa mbere mu kiganiro cyatangiwe mu nama ya Cop 25 iherutse kubera muri Espagne mu mpera z’umwaka ushize yigaga ku ruhare rwa banki zigamije guteza imbere ibidukikije mu gutuma ibihugu bigera ku ntego zabyo.
Igitekerezo cyo gushyiraho banki nyarwanda itera inkunga imishinga irengera ibidukikije, kije nyuma y’uko Afurika y’Epfo na yo yashyizeho iyo banki ifite imari shingiro ya miliyoni 100 z’amadorali ya Amerika.
Umuyobozi ushinzwe ibijyanye n’imihindagurikire y’ikirere muri Banki Nyafurika itsura Amajyambere (AfDB), Anthony Nyon, ubwo yari mu nama ya COP 25, yatangaje ko hakenewe ingamba zihamye mu guhanga ikoranabuhanga rishya rigamije guhangana n’ibibazo by’imihindagurikire y’ibihe.
Ati “Ku bw’iyo mpamvu, Banki Nyafurika itsura Amajyambere, binyuze mu bufasha bw’ikigega kigamije kurengera ibidukikije, iri gukorana n’ihuriro rya banki zigamije kurengera ibidukikije mu kureba uburyo butandukanye bwo gushyira igishoro mu bikorwa bifasha kurengera ibidukikije ku rwego rwo hasi, ari na ko tuzamura uruhare rw’abikorera.”
Leta yashyizeho ikigega Fonerwa cyahawe inshingano zo gufasha u Rwanda kugera ku bukungu butangiza ibidukikije binyuze mu gutera inkunga imishinga ya Leta n’abikorera iri muri uyu murongo.
Kuva iki kigega cyashingwa muri 2013, hahanzwe imirimo 138 000 itangiza ibidukikije. Mu 2017, habarurwaga ko ubutaka bungana na hegitari 21 847 bwatunganyijwe hagamijwe kwirinda ko butwarwa n’isuri ndetse hegitari 12 998 z’inkombe n’imigezi n’ibiyaga zarasubiranyijwe, hegitari 41 116 ziterwaho amashyamba, ndetse imiryango 65,340 ifashwa kubona ingufu zikomoka ku mirasire y’izuba mu gihe toni miliyoni 65 z’imyuka ihumanya ikirere zakumiriwe.
Icyo gihe Fonerwa yari imaze gutanga inkunga ya miliyoni 100 z’amadorali, iyi nkunga ikaba ihabwa imishinga yatsinze binyuze mu marushanwa.
Umushinga w’uruganda rw’amashanyarazi rutanga megawati 8.5 ruri mu karere ka Rwamagana, ni urugero rwiza rw’ishoramari ryakozwe mu rwego rwo kurengera ibidukikije.
U Rwanda rwihaye intego ko mu 2050, ruzaba rwagabanyije umwuka uhumanya ikirere ku rugero rwifuzwa.

Title: Ingano y’umwuka wa CO2 Umunyarwanda yohereza mu kirere
Body:
Ubushakashatsi bwagaragaje ko nibura umwuka wangiza ikirere, dioxyde de carbone (CO2), Umwongereza azagira uruhare mu kohereza mu kirere mu byumweru bibiri bya mbere bya 2020, uzaba ungana n’uwo umuturage wo mu bihugu birindwi bya Afurika birimo n’u Rwanda azagira uruhare mu kohereza mu gihe cy’umwaka wose.
Ubushakashatsi bwagaragaje ko nibura umwuka wangiza ikirere, dioxyde de carbone (CO2), Umwongereza azagira uruhare mu kohereza mu kirere mu byumweru bibiri bya mbere bya 2020, uzaba ungana n’uwo umuturage wo mu bihugu birindwi bya Afurika birimo n’u Rwanda azagira uruhare mu kohereza mu gihe cy’umwaka wose.
Ubushakashatsi bwakozwe na Oxfam bwatangajwe kuri iki Cyumweru, bwagaragaje umuntu umwe mu Bwongereza bizamufata iminsi itanu kugira ngo agire uruhare mu bikorwa bituma haboneka CO2 mu gihe iyo ngano y’uyu mwuka ku muntu uri mu Rwanda bizamufata umwaka.
Ku Cyumweru gitaha tariki ya 12 Mutarama, nibura Umwongereza azaba amaze kohereza mu kirere umwuka wa CO2 ungana n’uzoherezwa umwaka wose n’umuturage wo mu bihugu birimo Madagascar, Malawi, Ethiopia, Uganda, Guinea na Burkina Faso.
Ubu bushakashatsi bwagaragaje ingano y’uyu mwuka woherezwa mu kirere ku batuye mu Rwanda ari toni 0.09, Malawi ni 0.19, Burkina Faso zigeze kuri toni 0.25 ku mwaka.
Bwagaragaje ko umuturage wo muri Nigeria agira uruhare mu bikorwa byohereza mu kirere uyu mwuka uhumanya ungana na toni 0.49 buri mwaka naho uwo mu Buhinde akaba ari 1.68.
Ikigereranyo rusange ku Isi kiri kuri toni 4.7 ku muntu buri mwaka. Mu Bwongereza honyine, umuturage abarirwa toni 8.3.
Abongereza benshi bavuze ko hakwiye kugira byinshi bikorwa mu kurwanya ikibazo cy’imihindagurikire y’ikirere cyane mu kugabanya umwuka uhumanya woherezwa mu kirere.
Ubwiyongere mu kirere bw’uyu mwuka wa CO2 bugira ingaruka ku bidukikije zirimo ubushyuhe bukabije ku Isi, imyuzure n’ibindi.
Mu myaka 100 ishize, ibikorwa bya muntu byongereye ubushyuhe ku Isi ho dogere celcius 2.5. Uko kwiyongera k’ubushyuhe ku Isi kwagiye gutera ibibazo bitandukanye birimo ihindagurika ry’ibihe, imyuzure ya hato na hato, kuzimira kw’inyamaswa n’ibimera bitandukanye n’ibindi.
Mu myaka myinshi ishize, ibikorwa bya muntu byakomeje kugira uruhare mu iyangirika ry’urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima ndetse n’ihindagurika ry’imiterere y’Isi.
Ahari ubutayu bwa Sahara hahoze ibyatsi, amazi ndetse n’amashyamba nkuko byatangajwe n’Umushakashatsi Dr Curt Stager wo muri Kaminuza ya Smith College, nyamara byaje guhindurwa n’imyuzure, agace gasigara kambaye ubusa.
Kubera ubushyuhe, ibikorwa bya muntu n’ibindi, amoko 1000 y’inyamswa yarimutse ajya gushaka ahandi aba, andi menshi yo yarazimiye.
Mu myaka 15 iri imbere, isunzu ry’umusozi wa Kilimanjaro rizwiho urubura rizaba ryambaye ubusa. Ubushakashatsi bwagaragaje ko ubushyuhe bw’Isi buri gutuma urubura kuri uwo musozi rushonga bidasanzwe.
Uyu mwuka wa CO2 ugira ingaruka nyinshi ku buzima bwa muntu. Zirimo kurwara umutwe, kugira umunaniro, kubura ibitotsi, kugira ibibazo by’ubuhumekero kimwe no gututubikana ndetse wongera uburyo umutima utera umuntu akaba yarwara indwara y’umuvuduko ukabije w’amaraso cyangwa se akaba yajya muri Coma mu buryo butunguranye kubera kubura umwuka mwiza.
Ubushakashatsi buherutse kugaragaza ko ingaruka z’imihindagurikire y’ibihe ku bukungu bw’u Rwanda zishobora kugera ku kigero cya 4.5% by’umusaruro mbumbe w’igihugu mu mwaka wa 2030.
Ubu bushakashatsi bwakozwe n’itsinda ry’ibihugu 19 bihuriye ku kuba bisangiye ingaruka bigirwaho n’imihindagurikire y’ikirere (V20), bwerekanye ko ingaruka z’imihindagurikire y’ibihe ku buzima bw’abanyarwanda zishobora kurushaho gukomera harimo ukwiyongera kwa Malaria ndetse n’ibyorezo bituruka ku bukonje ndetse n’ubushyuhe bw’ikirere.
Ubushakashatsi bw’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cyo kubungabunga Ibidukikije (REMA) bwo muri Gicurasi 2018, ku bitera ihumana ry’umwuka n’iyangirika ry’ikirere, bwagaragaje ko ibintu biza ku isonga mu guhumanya umwuka uhumekwa mu Rwanda harimo umwotsi w’imodoka, imyotsi y’amakara n’inkwi n’ibindi.
Bwanerekanye ko uduce duto duto tutabonwa n’amaso twivanga n’umwuka uhumekwa, tubangamiye bikomeye ubuzima bw’abaturarwanda bishobora gutera indwara z’ubuhumekero n’umutima.
Bwanagaragaje ko mu bice bituwe hari ubwo naho ikigero cy’utwo tuvungukira kirenga urugero rwemewe, ahanini kubera imyuka ikomoka ku gukoresha ibicanwa bikomoka ku biti no gutwika ibyatsi, ibiyorero n’amashyamba.
Hari ibice bimwe na bimwe byagaragayemo ko mu mpeshyi muri metero kibe imwe y’umwuka usangamo hagati ya mikorogarama (microgram) 100 na 150 z’utwo tuvungukira mu gihe ikigero cyemewe kitagomba kurenga mikorogarama 35 kuri meterokibe y’umwuka.
Mu guhangana n’ingaruka ziterwa n’ihindagurika ry’ibihe n’iyangirika ry’ikirere, u Rwanda rwashyizeho ingamba nyinshi zitandukanye zirimo gutera ibiti byinshi bitanga umwuka mwiza aho kuri ubu ari ku buso bungana na 30% bw’igihugu.
Harimo kandi gukumira imodoka zisohora imyuka ihumanya ihumanya binyuze mu isuzuma zikorerwa no kwimakaza ikoreshwa ry’ingufu zidahumanya. Ibi bijyanye n’uko ubu ku isoko ry’u Rwanda hagejejwe imodoka na moto zikoresha amashanyarazi.

Title: Mu Rwanda hagiye gutangizwa banki itera inkunga imishinga y’ibidukikije
Body:
Mu Rwanda mu gihe kiri imbere hazatangizwa banki itera inkunga imishinga igamije kurengera ibidukikije, aho yitezweho kongera amafaranga yashorwaga mu mishinga igamije kurengera ibidukikije mu gihugu.
Mu Rwanda mu gihe kiri imbere hazatangizwa banki itera inkunga imishinga igamije kurengera ibidukikije, aho yitezweho kongera amafaranga yashorwaga mu mishinga igamije kurengera ibidukikije mu gihugu.
Amakuru ajyanye n’itangizwa ry’iyi banki mu Rwanda yatangarijwe mu kiganiro cyatangangiwe mu nama ya Cop 25 iherutse kubera muri Espagne mu mpera z’umwaka ushize kireba uruhare rwa banki zigamije guteza imbere ibidukikije mu gutuma ibihugu bigera ku ntego zabyo.
Muri iyo nama niho hatangarijwe ko u Rwanda ruzashyiraho banki igamije gushyigikira imishinga igamije kurengera ibidukikije, “Rwanda Catalytic Green investment bank”.
Uru rwego rw’imari ruzafasha mu gukangurira ibigo byigenga gushyigikira ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry’imishinga itangiza ibidukikije mu gihugu.
Umuyobozi ushinzwe ibijyanye n’imihindagurikire y’ikirere muri Banki Nyafurika itsura Amajyambere (AfDB), Anthony Nyon, yatangaje ko hakenewe ingamba zihamye mu guhanga ikoranabuhanga rishya rigamije guhangana n’ibibazo by’imihindagurikire y’ibihe.
Ati “Ku bw’iyo mpamvu, Banki Nyafurika itsura Amajyambere, binyuze mu bufasha bw’ikigega kigamije kurengera ibidukikije, iri gukorana n’ihuriro rya banki zigamije kurengera ibidukikije mu kureba uburyo butandukanye bwo gushyira igishoro mu bikorwa bifasha kurengera ibidukikije ku rwego rwo hasi, ari nako tuzamura uruhare rw’abikorera.”
Kubera ibibazo by’imihindagurikire y’ibihe, nibura abahinzi bo mu Rwanda batakaza 40% by’umusaruro wabo. Leta yashyizeho ikigega Fonerwa cyahawe inshingano zo gufasha u Rwanda kugera ku bukungu butangiza ibidukikije binyuze mu gutera inkunga imishinga ya Leta n’abikorera iri muri uyu murongo.
Kuva iki kigega cyashingwa, hahanzwe imirimo 138000 itangiza ibidukikije. Mu 2017, habarurwaga ko ubutaka bungana na hegitari 21 847 bwatunganyijwe hagamijwe kwirinda ko butwarwa n’isuri ndetse hegitari 12,998 z’inkombe n’imigezi n’ibiyaga zarasubiranyijwe ndetse imiryango ifashwa 17 449 kubona ingufu zidakomoka ku ngomero z’amashanyarazi.
Icyo gihe FONERWA yari imaze gutanga inkunga ya miliyoni 100 z’amadorali, iyi nkunga ikaba ihabwa imishinga yatsinze binyuze mu marushanwa.

Title: Ubushakashatsi bwerekanye ko Umuryango w’ingagi zo mu Birunga uri kwaguka
Body:
Ubushakashatsi bushya bw’ Umuryango ugamije guteza imbere ibyo kurengera urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima mu gace k’Ibirunga (Greater Virunga Transboundary Collaboration, GVTC) bwerekanye ko Ingagi zo mu misozi, zifatwa nka zimwe mu nyamanswa ziri gukendera ku Isi, ziyongereye muri pariki y’Ibirunga aho zigeze ku 1,063.
Ubushakashatsi bushya bw’ Umuryango ugamije guteza imbere ibyo kurengera urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima mu gace k’Ibirunga (Greater Virunga Transboundary Collaboration, GVTC) bwerekanye ko Ingagi zo mu misozi, zifatwa nka zimwe mu nyamanswa ziri gukendera ku Isi, ziyongereye muri pariki y’Ibirunga aho zigeze ku 1,063.
Ubwo bushakashatsi bwerekana ko ingagi zo mu ishyamba rya Bwindi muri Uganda na Sarambwe muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo (RDC) zavuye kuri 400 zikagera kuri 459.
Mu Rwanda, imibare y’ingagi yariyongereye zigera kuri 604 zivuye kuri 480 zabarurwaga umwaka ushize. Ibyo byatumye ingagi zibarurwa mu gice cy’imisozi y’Ibirunga zigera ku 1,063.
Ubushakashatsi bwakozwe bigizwemo uruhare n’Ikigega cyita ku ngagi muri Pariki y’Ibirunga (Dian Fossey Gorillas Fund) bushyirwa ahagaragara ku wa mbere tariki 16 Ukuboza 2019.
Umuyobozi wa Dian Fossey, Dr Tara Stoinski, yagize ati “ Ibyavuye muri ubu bushakashatsi ni gihamya y’imbaraga zo kwita ku bidukikije, hagati ya Guverinoma zirimo iy’u Rwanda, RDC na Uganda.”
Yongeyeho, ati “Ingagi zo mu misozi ni zimwe mu nyamaswa zirinzwe cyane kuri uyu mugabane, kandi uyu munsi turabona icyo imbaraga z’abafatanyabikorwa mu kuzitaho zishobora gukora. Ni akazi gakomeye ku baturage, abayobozi ba za Guverinoma n’ababungabunga urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima, ariko bishobora gukorwa.”
Mu bushakashatsi bwabanje, ku ngagi zo mu misozi, ababukoze bageze mu bice byose by’ishyamba bashaka ibyafasha kubona amakuru ku ngagi n’izindi z’inyamabere n’ibimenyetso by’ibikorwa bya muntu.
Mu bikorwa byabo bakusanyije umwanda wazo kugira ngo harebwe inkomoko yazo, ibyo byakozwe inshuro ebyiri kuva muri Werurwe kugeza Gicurasi 2018 no kuva mu Kwakira kugeza Ukuboza 2018 kugira ngo bimenyekane neza ko buri ngagi yagezweho.
Mu mwaka ushize, Ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe iterambere (RDB) cyongeye ubuso bwa Pariki y’igihugu y’Ibirunga iherereye mu Majyaruguru y’u Rwanda buva kuri Hegitari 16,000 bugera ku 16,027 hagamije kwita ku rusobe rw’ibinyabuzima biyirimo.

Title: Imvura imaze guhitana abantu 15 hirya no hino mu gihugu
Body:
Umunyamabanga Uhoraho muri Minisiteri y’Ibidukikije , Fatina Mukarubibi yatangaje ko imvuya nyinshi imaze iminsi igwa hirya no hino mu gihugu imaze guhitana ubuzima bw’abantu 15.
Umunyamabanga Uhoraho muri Minisiteri y’Ibidukikije , Fatina Mukarubibi yatangaje ko imvuya nyinshi imaze iminsi igwa hirya no hino mu gihugu imaze guhitana ubuzima bw’abantu 15.
Guhera mu Ukwakira uyu mwaka mu bice bitandukanye by’igihugu hagaragaye imvura nyinshi kurusha iyari isanzwe.
Ni imvura y’umuhindo Minisiteri y’ibidukikije igaragaza ko ubwinshi bwayo bwatewe n’uruhurirane rw’imiyaga ituruka mu nyanjya y’u Buhinde n’ituruka mu ishyamba rya Congo.
Mu kiganiro Kubaza bitera Kumenya cyatambutse kuri Radiyo Rwanda kuri iki Cyumweru tariki 8 Ukuboza, Umunyamabanga Uhoraho muri Minisiteri y’Ibidukikije , Fatina Mukarubibi yavuze ko imvura imaze guhitana abanyarwanda 15 ikangiza n’ibindi bikorwa byinshi.
Yagize ati “Muri iyi minsi imvura yabaye nyinshi, ibiza byahitanye ubuzima bw’abantu 15 n’amatungo ndetse hangiritse imyaka iri mu mirima, imihanda, ibiraro amashuri. Ahibasiwe cyane ni mu Ntara y’Amajyepfo n’Iburengerazuba.”
Mu guhangana n’ibyo biza, Mukarubibi yavuze ko hakozwe ikarita igaragaza ahantu hashobora kwibasirwa n’ibiza ndetse n’ibigomba kuhakorwa mu rwego rwo kurwanya isuri inashobora gutera imyuzure. 
By’umwihariko muri ibi bihe, yasabye abaturage kuzirika ibisenge, guca imirwanyasuri no gusibura inzira z’amazi kandi bagatanga amakuru igihe hari ahabaye ibibazo by’ibiza.
Mu ngamba z’igihe kirekire, Mukarubibi yavuze ko hari imirimo irimo ikorwa mu rwego rwo kurinda no gusubiranya icyogogo cya Sebeya kuko umugezi wa Sebeya nawo wagiye uteza ibiza mu myaka ishize.
Hari kandi gusaba abubaka gushyiraho uburyo bwo gufata amazi ava ku bisenge by’inzu.
Mu rwego rwo gukumira ko ibiza by’imvura byangiza ibikorwaremezo nk’imihanda n’ibiraro , Mukarubibi avuga ko begereye inzego zibishinzwe kugira ngo bijye byubakwa habanje kwegeranywa amakuru ya tekiniki azatuma ibyubatswe biramba.
Yatanze urugero rw’ikiraro cya Nyabarongo cyajyaga kirengerwa n’amazi mu bihe by’imvura, ubu bikaba byarakosowe.
Imvura nyinshi imaze iminsi igwa no mu bindi bihugu bya Afurika y’Iburasirazuba ndetse imaze guhitana abasaga 250. Kimwe cya kabiri cy’abapfuye ni abo muri Kenya, mu gihe yagize ingaruka ku baturage basaga miliyoni eshatu.
Biteganyijwe ko muri uko kwezi imvura ikomeza kugwa ari nyinshi.

Title: Minisitiri Mujawamariya yibukije abangiza ibidukikije ko nta yindi si bafite yo kuzaturaho
Body:
Minisitiri w’Ibidukikije, Dr Jeanne d’Arc Mujawamariya, yibukije ko abangiza ibidukikije bagomba kujya bazirikana ko Isi batuyeho ari imwe ko nta handi bafite bazerekeza, bityo bagomba kuyibungabunga uko byagenda kose.
Minisitiri w’Ibidukikije, Dr Jeanne d’Arc Mujawamariya, yibukije ko abangiza ibidukikije bagomba kujya bazirikana ko Isi batuyeho ari imwe ko nta handi bafite bazerekeza, bityo bagomba kuyibungabunga uko byagenda kose.
Ibi yabigarutseho kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki 19 Ugushyingo 2019, ubwo iyi Minisiteri yahuraga n’abafatanyabikorwabayo harebwa uko bakomeza kunoza ubufatanya mu kurengera ibidukikije.
Iyangirika ry’amashamba, imyuka ihumanya ikirere iva mu nganda no mu binyabiziga, ndetse n’ibindi bikorwa bitandukanye bya muntu, ni bimwe mu biza ku isonga mu gukomeza kwangiza ibidukikije hirya no hino ku Isi.
Minisitiri Mujawamariya avuga ko iyi nama iba igamije guhuza abafatanyabikorwa mu bikorwa bitandukanye barimo abakora mu by’amashyamba, ubutaka n’abandi, intego ari ugukokomeza kugira igihugu cyiza.
Ati “Dukeneye kubungabunga ibidukije ariko n’igihugu gikeneye amajyambere byaba mu bucuruzi bw’amabuye y’agaciro n’ahandi, icyo dusaba abafatanyabikorwa ni ugukomeza mu nzira turimo nk’u Rwanda dukomeza guteza imbere ibidukikije, kandi dukomeza kugira igihugu kirangwamo n’ibidukikije byitaweho kuva ku mwana kugera ku mu kambwe.”
Ati “Iyi si dutuyeho niyo yonyine dufite aho gutura, tugomba rero kuyirinda kubera ko nta handi dufite dutura ni aha gusa, buri wese uko yaba angana kose akwiye kumva ko ari inshingano ze zo kubungabunga ibidukikije.”
Umuyobozi w’Ikigo gishinzwe kubungabunga ibidukikije, Eng. Coletha Ruhamya, yavuze ko hakiri imbogamizi mu kubungabunga ibidukikije zirimo ingengo y’imari igenerwa uru rwego, kudahuza ibikorwa mu nzego ndetse n’ishoramari ridahagije mu kurinda ibidukikije.
Agira ati "Usanga ingengo y’imari leta yakoresheje yose, 2,9% ni yo yagiye mu bintu birengera ibidukikije, ibyo byose rero turashaka kureba ukuntu izo nzego zindi zibishyira muri gahunda yazo.’’

Title: Abahanga batanze umuburo ku ngaruka zishobora kwibasira Isi kubera udusimba duto dukomeje gupfa
Body:
Abahanga mu by’ibinyabuzima n’ibidukikije bagaragaje ko hatagize igikorwa, igabanuka rikabije ry’udusimba duto nk’inzuki n’utundi bimeze kimwe rikomeje kwigaragaza rishobora kugira ingaruka ku buzima bw’abantu n’ibidukikije muri rusange.
Abahanga mu by’ibinyabuzima n’ibidukikije bagaragaje ko hatagize igikorwa, igabanuka rikabije ry’udusimba duto nk’inzuki n’utundi bimeze kimwe rikomeje kwigaragaza rishobora kugira ingaruka ku buzima bw’abantu n’ibidukikije muri rusange.
Ubushakashatsi buheruka gukorwa na Kaminuza ya Sussex mu Bwongereza, bugaragaza ko umubare w’udusimba duto turi ku Isi ukomeje kugenda ugabanuka mu buryo bukabije, by’umwihariko 41% byatwo byagabanutse bitewe n’ingaruka z’ihindagurika ry’ibihe, ibiza, ibikorwa bya muntu n’ibindi.
Umwarimu wigisha amasomo y’ibinyabuzima muri kaminuza ya Sussex, akaba n’umwe mu bayoboye ubwo bushakashatsi, Dave Goulson, yavuze ko ‘Iryo gabanuka nirikomeza, ingaruka zizaba nyinshi’.
Ati “Bitatu bya kane (3/4) by’ibihingwa byacu bibeshwaho n’udusimba duto. Ibihingwa bizatangira kurumba. Ntituzongera kugira imbuto zirimo nk’inkeri...Ntitwabasha kugaburira abantu barenga miliyari 7.5 utu dusimba tudahari.”
Gusa iyi raporo basohoye igaragaza ko mu gihe abantu bashyize hamwe babasha kubona igisubizo ku kibazo kigaragara nka kirimbuzi.
Ati “Udusimba tuba mu busitari na Pariki byacu, abazitaho bashobora gukora ibitangaza. Igikenewe cyane ni uguhindura abahizi bakaba inshuti n’inyamaswa, bakagabanya gukoresha imiti yica udukoko. Ibyo byafasha cyane.”
Abayikoze batanga inama z’uko kandi abantu bakwiye guhinga ibihingwa bifasha iyororoka ry’ibimera akenshi bigizwemo uruhare n’utwo dusimba duto turimo nk’inzuki igihe zirimo gutara.
Ubushakashatsi bugaragaza ko utu dusimba duto turimo kugabanuka mu buryo bukabije mu bihugu birimo u Budage na Puerto Rico. Igaragaza ko muri rusange utu disimba ku mwaka tugabanukaho nibura 2.5%.
By’umwihariko mu Bwongereza iyi raporo yibanze igaragaza ko hagati ya 1968 na 2007 twagabanutseho nibura 28%. Abakoze iyi nyigo bavuga ko hari izindi zisaga 70 zakozwe ariko nta mpinduka igaragara mu kutubungabunga cyane cyane mu Burayi na Amerika ya Ruguru.

Title: Intara y’Iburasirazuba yahawe umwihariko mu gutera amashyamba kubera ubuke bwayo
Body:
Umunyamabanga uhoraho muri minisiteri y’ibidukikije, Mukarubibi Fitina yatangaje ko intara y’iburasirazuba bayihaye umwihariko mu mu gutera amashyamba menshi bitewe nuko ariyo ikiri inyuma mu kugira ubuso buteweho amashyamba buke.
Umunyamabanga uhoraho muri minisiteri y’ibidukikije, Mukarubibi Fitina yatangaje ko intara y’iburasirazuba bayihaye umwihariko mu mu gutera amashyamba menshi bitewe nuko ariyo ikiri inyuma mu kugira ubuso buteweho amashyamba buke.
Ibi yabitangaje ubwo hatangizwaga igihembwe cyo gutera amashyamba 2019/2020 cyatangirijwe mu Murenge wa Rukumberi mu Karere ka Ngoma ahatewe ibiti ibihumbi 16 ku buso bungana na hegitari 80.
Muri iki gihembwe iburasirazuba hazaterwa amashyamba ku buso bungana na hegitari 609.8, haterwe ibiti bivangwa n’imyaka kuri hegitari 5138.6. Hazavugururwa kandi amashyamba angana na hegitari 275 ndetse hanaterwe ibiti by’imbuto ibihumbi 163 505 mu rwego rwo guhangana n’ikibazo cy’ubutaka bunini budateweho ibiti burangwa muri iyi ntara.
Akarere ka Kirehe niko kazaterwamo ibiti byinshi aho kazaterwamo amashyamba angana na hegitari 276, ibiti bivangwa n’imyaka bingana na hegitari 286 n’ibiti by’imbuto 9750.
Mukarubibi Fitina yavuze ko bahaye umwihariko iyi ntara kugira ngo bahangane n’ikibazo cy’amashyamba make akunda kuyigaragaramo bigatuma ibice bimwe na bimwe bitabonekamo imvura nkuko bikwiye.
Yakomeje avuga ko bishimira ko intego igihugu cyari cyarihaye yo gutera amashyamba ku kigero cya 30% cy’ubuso bw’igihugu yagezweho mbere ya 2020.
Ati “Mu gice cy’iburasirazuba ho baracyari inyuma cyane nko mu Karere ka Ngoma turacyari kuri 12 by’ubuso buteweho amashyamba, biradusaba imbaraga kugira ngo tuzamure iyo mibare ariko n’abaturage barasabwa kubigira ibyabo kugira ngo bya biti babirere bihinduke ishyamba.”
Yongeyeho ati “Ubu tugiye gufatanya dushyireho gahunda yihariye yo gutera amashyamba mu burasirazuba by’umwihariko nka Ngoma n’ahandi, hari ubwoko bw’ibiti byagaragaye ko bishobora kwera muri iki gice kandi bigatanga umusaruro harimo nk’igiti cy’umugazi, igifenesi n’ibindi bitandukanye bivangwa n’imyaka, ibyo byose nibyo tugiye gutera muri iyi ntara.”
Mukarubibi yavuze ko zimwe mu mpamvu zituma iyi ntara idakunda kugira amashyamba menshi harimo kuba ubutaka bwaho bukunda kugira umuswa mwinshi hakiyongeraho n’izuba ryinshi.
Yasabye abaturage bo mu burasirazuba gukoresha ibiyaga bafite buhira ibiti kugira ngo bahangane n’izuba rikunda kubyumisha.
Abaturage bavuga ko zimwe mu mpamvu zituma muri iyi ntara ibiti bihaterwa bidakura ngo biterwa nuko hakunda kugaragara izuba ryinshi na bike bizamutse bikaragirwamo amatungo .
Habanabakize Daniel utuye mu Murenge wa Rukumberi yagize ati “ Ibiti inaha turabitera ariko hari bamwe muri twe babiragiramo amatungo bigatuma bitazamuka, ikindi ni ubutaka bw’inaha usanga kubera izuba ryinshi ridapfa kubyorohera mu mikurire yabyo.”
Mukakayibanda Verediana we yagize ati “ Hari abantu babyahuramo inka nijoro kuburyo banazishora no mu mirima yacu, kugira ngo ibiti dutera bikure rero nuko leta idufasha mu guhana abo bantu bonesha amashyamba yacu.”
Ibarura riheruka gukorwa mu 2016 ryagaragaje ko amashyamba y’abaturage ari ku kigereranyo cya 67% y’ubuso, naho aya leta akaba ku kigereranyo cya 33%. Hagaragajwe kandi ko amashyamba y’abaturage afashwe nabi kandi afite umusaruro muke.

Title: Miliyoni 12 z’amadolari zigiye gushorwa mu mushinga wo kwita ku bidukikije i Gicumbi
Body:
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Akarere ka Gicumbi, Epimaque Mpayimana yatangaje ko umushinga wo kwita ku bidukikije ugiye gukorera muri ako Karere, mu by’ibanze uzabafasha harimo kurwanya isuri, no guca amaterasi ku misozi ihanamye mu rwego rwo kongera butaka buhingwa.
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Akarere ka Gicumbi, Epimaque Mpayimana yatangaje ko umushinga wo kwita ku bidukikije ugiye gukorera muri ako Karere, mu by’ibanze uzabafasha harimo kurwanya isuri, no guca amaterasi ku misozi ihanamye mu rwego rwo kongera butaka buhingwa.
Umushinga wiswe uwa Gicumbi (Green Gicumbi Project), uzamara imyaka itandatu uhereye mu Ukwakira 2019, ukora ibikorwa byo kwita ku bidukikije mu Karere ka Gicumbi.
Arenga miliyoni $ 12.5 muri miliyoni $ 32 azakoreshwa muri uwo mushinga wose, azajya mu bikorwa byo kubungabunga ibishanga, inkengero z’imigezi n’ibindi bikorwa byerekeye ubuhinzi.
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Akarere ka Gicumbi, Epimaque Mpayimana avuga ko kubera imiterere y’ako Karere, imvura igira ingaruka zikomeye ku buhinzi kubera imisozi itarwanyijeho isuri.
Ati “Twe tugira umwihariko kuko ari imisozi miremire, iyo ahantu rero hari imisozi miremire cyane cyane itarwanyijeho isuri, duhura n’imyuzure, isuri, imihanda ikangirika, ibiraro bigacika n’amazi menshi ingaruka mu by’ukuri ni nyinshi ugereranyije no mu tundi turere, imyaka kumanurwa n’isuri, abaturage bagahinga ariko bamara gutera isuri ikaza ikabitwara.”
Avuga ko mu by’ibanze uwo mushinga uzabafasha ari ugutunganya imisozi ihanamye. Agira ati “Mu buryo bw’ikubitiro azabanza kujya, kudufasha gutunganya imisozi ihanamye, ni ukuvuga ngo iyo utunganyije iyo misozi, ya mirima yo mu bishanga yajyaga itwikirwa n’isuri uba ukoze ku buryo itakwangirika. ibihinzwemo uba ufite icyizere kuko uko wahinze ushobora kweza nta suri ibitwaye.”
Ni umushinga ashimangira ko uziye igihe kuburyo n’abaturage bitezweho kugaragaza ubufatanye mu bikorwa byawo.
Mu mwaka w’ingengo y’imari ushize Akarere ka Gicumbi kabashije gutunganya Hegitari 2,000 z’amaterasi y’indinganire. Icyakora n’ubundi kugeza ubu ngo hari imisozi itarakorerwaho ubuhinzi kubera imiterere yayo.
Amaterasi namara kugera kuri iyo misozi bizaba byongereye ubutaka buhingwa n’umusaruro uva mu buhinzi ukaziyongere. nkuko Mpayimana abisobanura, agira ati “Ni ukuvuga ngo rero tubonye izindi hegitari ziyongera zirwanyijeho isuri ziriho amaterasi y’indinganire mu byukuri kiba ari igisubizo kirambye ku baturage bacu kubera ko ubutaka bwo guhinga buba bwiyongeye. Hari ahantu imisozi ihanamye kuburyo udashobora gukoreraho imirimo y’ubuhinzi ubu ngubu. Iyo ukoze amaterasi uba wongeye ubuso buhingwa kandi kongera ubuso buhingwa bisobanuye ko uba wongereye umusaruro.
Imibare y’ikigo cy’ibarurishamibare mu Rwanda yerekena ko mu Karere ka Gicumbi, amaterasi ari ku buso bungana na hegitari 8,653.5 naho ubutaka burwanyijeho isuri muri rusange bungana na 88.2%.
Uyu mushinga wanyujijwe mu kigega cyita ku bidukikije n’imihindagurikire y’ibihe mu Rwanda (Fonerwa).
Umuyobozi w’icyo kigega Hubert Ruzibiza, avuga ko uzita no ku bindi bikorwa bireba imibereho y’abatuye Gicumbi ndetse no gutera ibiti. Ikindi kandi ukazafatwa nk’icyitegererezo cyo kwigiraho kuburyo wazakomereza mu tundi turere tw’igihugu.
Ati “Uyu mushinga wa Gicumbi dufatanyije n’ikigega cy’Isi cyita ku bidukikije, twafatanyije gushyira amafaranga muri Gicumbi tumaze kubona ibibazo yanyuzemo cyane cyane ku bireba ibidukikije […] dushaka kuzamura ubuzima bw’abaturage no kureba babaho muri rusange no gutera ibiti, iki ni icyiciro cya mbere tuzayifata nk’icyitegererezo cyo gutuma ukomereza mu tundi duce tw’u Rwanda.”
Imibare y’ikigo cy’ibarurishamibare mu Rwanda y’igihembwe cy’ihinga cya 2019-B yerekana mu buryo bwo kurwanya isuri, Gicumbi yari ifite amaterasi y’indinganire ku kigero cya 32.1% y’ubutaka bwahinzwe muri icyo gihembwe, 0.6% ahateye ibiti, n’imiringoti kuri 0.2%.
Mu buhinzi akarere ka Gicumbi kibanda ku bishyimbo bishingirirwa, ingano, ibirayi, ibigori n’imyumbati ku butaka buhujwe burenga hegitari 32,164. Bahinga kawa ku buso bungana na hegitari 601,7 n’icyayi ku buso bungana na hegitari 1678,2.

Title: Ubuso bw’u Rwanda 30 % bwamaze guterwaho amashyamba
Body:
Minisitiri w’ibidukikije, Vincent Biruta, yatangaje ko u Rwanda rwageze ku ntego rwari rwarihaye y’uko mu 2020 , 30% y’ubuso bwarwo ruzaba ruteyeho amashyamba.
Minisitiri w’ibidukikije, Vincent Biruta, yatangaje ko u Rwanda rwageze ku ntego rwari rwarihaye y’uko mu 2020 , 30% y’ubuso bwarwo ruzaba ruteyeho amashyamba.
Mu 2011, Guverinoma y’u Rwanda yihaye intego ko mu 2020, ubuso bungana na 30%, buzaba buteyeho amashyamba, naho mu 2030 bukaba bugeze kuri hegitari miliyoni ebyiri mu 2030, hagamijwe kurengera urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima.
Mu isuzuma ry’aho urwego rw’amashyamba rugeze, mu ntego nyinshi zitandukanye rwihaye n’intego zo kuruteza imbere mu myaka iri imbere, hagaragajwe ko intego ya mbere yagezweho, nkuko The New Times yabitangaje.
Minisitiri Vincent Biruta, yagize ati “Mu mwaka w’ingengo y’imari wa 2018/19 urwego rw’ibidukikije n’umutungo kamere rwageze kuri byinshi ndashimira ubufatanye n’abafatanyabikorwa batandukanye. Ndagira ngo mbabwire ko ubwo bufatanye bwatumye tugera kuri 30% dutera amashyamba aho atari ateye n’aho yatemwe.”
Iyi ni intego y’ibanze mu zigamijwe kugerwaho mu 2020. Ati “Dushobora kwishimira aho tugeze.”
Inyigo yerekanye ko hagati ya 1990 na 2010, u Rwanda rwatakaje 37% by’amashyamba yarwo bitewe no kuyatema.
Minisitiri Biruta yagize ati “Twongeye gutera ibiti aho byari bayatemwe kugira ngo tubungabunge imigezi kandi nishimiye kubabwira ko hegitari zirenga 3,000 zatewe kuri Nyabugogo, Muvumba, Sebeya n’igice cya ruguru cya Nyabarongo.”
Yongeyeho ati “Abikorera bajya mu bijyanye no kubungabunga amashyamba nabo bariyongereye. 30% by’amashyamba ya leta ubu aracungwa n’abikorera kandi tuzakomeza gukorana n’abafatanyabikorwa mu kongera kugeza kuri 80% mu 2024.”
 Amashyamba ya leta ari kuri hegitari 65,000 hatabariwemo Pariki z’igihugu.
Mu gukaza politiki n’amategeko Minisitiri Biruta yavuze ko Minisiteri yashyizeho politiki nshya n’ingamba zigamije kwita ku mashyamba, ibidukikije, imihindagurikire y’ibihe, ubutaka no gucunga ibipimo by’ubushyuhe.
Guverinoma yashyizeho uburyo bushya bwo kongera amashyamba bikozwe n’abikorera ndetse no kuyacunga neza.
Yashyizeho amatsinda y’abikorera yo gucunga amashyamba “Private Forest Management Units:PFMU” aho amashyamba ari ku buso buto acungwa n’amakoperative.
Ayo matsinda agizwe n’amakoperative 8 y’abikorera bato yageragerejwe mu turere twa Gakenke, Gicumbi, Rulindo na Rwamagana mu buryo bw’igerageza yabashije gutera amashyamba kuri hegitari 276.
Umuryango Mpuzamahanga wita ku bidukije (IUCN) utangaza ko gusana hegitari imwe y’ubutaka haterwa amashyamba, bisaba amadolari asaga 1000 ariko mu Rwanda ngo ntageramo (ari hagati ya 200 na 400) kubera byinshi bikorwa n’abaturage mu muganda.

Title: Minisitiri Biruta yashimye uruhare rwa Banki ya Kigali mu rugamba rwo kugira igihugu gitoshye
Body:
Minisitiri w’Ibidukikije Dr Vincent Biruta yasabye ibigo byigenga kugera ikirenge mu cya Banki ya Kigali ikomeje gutanga umusanzu muri gahunda yo gutera amashyamba mu bice by’Intara y’Iburasirazuba.
Minisitiri w’Ibidukikije Dr Vincent Biruta yasabye ibigo byigenga kugera ikirenge mu cya Banki ya Kigali ikomeje gutanga umusanzu muri gahunda yo gutera amashyamba mu bice by’Intara y’Iburasirazuba.
Yabigarutseho kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki 2 Ugushyingo 2019, mu muganda udasanzwe wo gutera ibiti bivangwa n’imyaka mu Murenge wa Rweru mu Karere ka Bugesera muri gahunda ya Banki ya Kigali yo gutera amashyamba, ibiti bivangwa n’imyaka n’imbuto.
Banki ya Kigali yafatanyije n’ikigo mpuzamahanga cy’amashyamba, ishami ry’u Rwanda (ICRAF-Rwanda), mu gutubura imbuto no guhugura abaturage bazafasha bagenzi babo mu kubungabunga no kwita kuri ibi biti.
Mu muganda wo kuri uyu wa Gatandatu, mu Kagari ka Nemba, hatewe ibiti ibihumbi 61, ku buso bungana na hegitari 16. Ibiti byatewe birimo ubwoko bwa Grevillea (bibazwamo imbaho), Gracidea (bikurura umwuka), Calliandra na Leucaena.
Umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Bugesera, Mutabazi Richard yavuze ko iyo umuntu arebye amateka y’u Rwanda nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, ibiti byo muri aka karere byangijwe bitwikwamo amakara byaje gutuma mu 2000, akarere kaba ubutayu.
Yakomeje agira ati “Byagize ingaruka ku baturage bacu murabizi bamwe baranasuhutse ariko Leta yahise ishaka icyakorwa ishyira imbaraga mu gutera amashyamba. Igikorwa cy’uyu munsi tunashimira Banki ya Kigali yatanze iyi nkunga, ni kimwe n’ibindi bigomba gukomeza gukorwa biri mu rwego rwo kugira ngo tugire Bugesera itoshye.”
Minisiteri y’Ibidukikije mu Rwanda igaragaza ko u Burasirazuba bufitemo amashyamba make aho na Bugesera iri mu turere tudafite amashyamba akwiriye.
Imbuto z’ibiti biri gutuburirwa i Bugesera ari nabyo byatewe uyu munsi zirimo izavanwe mu mahanga, aho Banki ya Kigali ariyo yatanze ubushobozi bwo kugura izi mbuto n’amahugurwa yahawe abafashamyumvire.
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Banki ya Kigali, Dr Diane Karusisi yavuze ko nubwo batanga serivisi z’imari ariko bagomba kureba niba n’abaturage bafite imibereho myiza, ari nayo mpamvu bahisemo gutanga umusanzu mu kurengera ibidukikije ariko hanibandwa ku biti byagirira akamaro abaturage.
Ati "Twarabitangiye mu myaka ishize i Gatsibo na Nyagatare ariko uyu mwaka twaje i Bugesera, ni akarere keza ariko iyo ureba mu misozi ya hano ubona nta biti bihari. Ibi biti ni ibyanyu, mugomba kubyitaho ku buryo uyu murenge wanyu uzatera imbere."
Muri rusange Banki ya Kigali imaze gutera ibiti bigera ku bihumbi 500. Intego ni ugutera ibigera kuri miliyoni ariko hibandwa mu bice by’Iburasirazuba.
Dr Karusisi yakomeje ati “Turashaka gukorana namwe abaturage dutera ibiti ku buryo mu bihe biri imbere nta bibazo by’imvura cyangwa amapfa n’imirire mibi bizongera kuba muri aka karere n’ahandi hose hari ibi bibazo. ”
Mu 2011, Guverinoma y’u Rwanda yihaye intego ko mu 2020, ubuso bungana na 30%, buzaba buteyeho amashyamba, naho mu 2030 bukaba bugeze kuri hegitari miliyoni ebyiri mu 2030, hagamijwe kurengera urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima.
Minisitiri Biruta avuga ko ibi bidashobora kugerwaho hatabayeho imbaraga z’abafatanyabikorwa by’umwihariko abikorera, aho yatanze urugero rwiza rwa Banki ya Kigali yatangiye kugira uruhare muri uru rugamba.
Yavuze ko igice kinini cya Bugesera ari ubutaka bwiza kandi bwera ariko bwakwera neza bukanatanga umusaruro habayeho kubungabunga amashyamba.
Ati "Aka karere karera neza , ariko kakwera kurushaho gateweho amashyamba. Ibyo birasaba gukomeza gufatanya kandi birashoboka. Mu 2000, aka karere kari kabaye ubutayu ariko ubu imvura yaragarutse nubwo idahagije. Bababwiye mwe nk’abaturage ko aya mashyamba turi gutera ari ayanyu mukwiye kuyitaho mukayabungabunga.”
Minisitiri Biruta yashimye abafatanyabikorwa barimo BK avuga ko Mu 2015 yafatanyije na leta gutera ibiti mu Karere ka Gatsibo aho kuri ubu ishyamba rimeze neza.
Yakomeje agira ati “Ibyakozwe na BK bigaragaza uruhare rw’abikorera mu kurengera ibidukikije. Dufatanyije na BK muri Bugesera ubushize twafatanyije I Gatsibo, ngaho ibaze ibigo by’imari byose biri mu Rwanda, buri kimwe cyafashe Akarere kamwe urumva byagenda bite? Turagira ngo dufatanye twubake u Rwanda rutoshye."
Banki ya Kigali ntabwo yatanze ibiti bivangwa n’imyaka gusa ahubwo hari n’imbuto zirimo avoka, amapapayi ndetse n’imyembe. Ni mu gihe kandi gahunda ya leta ari uko nibura buri rugo rwo mu Rwanda rugira ibiti bitatu by’imbuto.
Umwe mu baturage bo muri uyu Murenge wa Rweru witwa Tuyizere , yavuze ko bazakomeza gufatanya n’abaturage gukomeza kubungabunga ibi biti.
Yagize ati "Ibi biti bitewe uyu munsi tuzabibungabunga kandi bitugirire akamaro ari ukutubyarira ifumbire n’imbuto ziribwa. Kuva aho dutangiye gutera ibiti bivamgwa n’imyaka by’umwihariko imbuto byagabanyije imirire mibi mu miryango yacu.”
Ubuyobozi bwa Banki ya Kigali bwongeye kandi kwibutsa abaturage bo mu Karere ka Bugesera by’umwihariko abahinzi dore ko bagera ku bihumbi 32, kugana gahunda ya ‘Ikofi’ yashyiriweho abahinzi by’umwihariko.
Ubu buryo buheruka kwiyongeraho serivisi y’imari ya IKOFI yatangijwe na Banki ya Kigali muri Gicurasi uyu mwaka, ifasha umuhinzi kubitsa amafaranga, kubikuza, kuyohereza ku buntu mu Rwanda, kwishyura imbuto n’inyongeramusaruro, ubwiteganyirize bwa ‘Ejo Heza’ n’ibindi.

Title: TI-Rwanda igiye gukurikiranira hafi umushinga wa Gicumbi uzatwara miliyoni $ 32
Body:
Umuryango urwanya ruswa n’akarengane, (Transparency International Rwanda) ugiye gufasha mu ikurikiranabikorwa ry’umushinga wo kwita ku bidukikije mu Karere ka Gicumbi, uzatwara miliyoni $ 32.
Umuryango urwanya ruswa n’akarengane, (Transparency International Rwanda) ugiye gufasha mu ikurikiranabikorwa ry’umushinga wo kwita ku bidukikije mu Karere ka Gicumbi, uzatwara miliyoni $ 32.
Umushinga wo kwita ku bidukikije mu karere ka Gicumbi uzamara imyaka itandatu, ukazakorerwa mu Mirenge itandatu y’ako Karere; ariyo Rubaya, Cyumba, Kaniga, Mukarange, Rushaki na Shangasha.
Imibare y’ubushakashatsi bwakozwe n’umuryango urwanya ruswa n’akarengane mu 2017 yerekana ko imishinga yerekeye imihindagurikire y’ikirere yabayeho mu Rwanda yagiye irangwa n’ibura ry’uruhare rw’abaturage rimwe na rimwe n’abayobozi mu nzego z’ibanze ugasanga batayizi.
Ibyo bigatuma abayishyira mu bikorwa bakoresha ingengo y’imari yayo mu buryo abagenerwabikorwa badasobanukiwe.
Umuyobozi Nshingwabikorwa wa TI Rwanda, Mupiganyi Apolinaire asobanura ko imibare yerekana ko abaturage 55.5% batari bazi iby’iyo mishinga ndetse ngo hari n’abayobozi mu nzego z’ibanze bagera kuri 40.4% nabo ntibagishijwe inama ngo harebwe niba ariyo bakeneye cyangwa bamenye uruhare rwabo.
Ati “Hari imbogamizi twabonye mu mishinga itandukanye nka za biogaz n’indi mishinga igerageza kugabanya kwangiza ibidukikije. Dushingiye kuri ibyo bibazo twabonye mu isesengura twakoze ku yindi mishinga yabanje, twafashe iya mberengo turebe uko twatera ingabo mu bitugu gahunda y’igihugu cyacu yo guha uruhare umuturage kugira ngo amenye ibimukorerwa”.
Avuga ko ibi ari byo bizatuma bagira uruhare rukomeye bafatanyije n’indi miryango, inzego n’umuturage kugira ngo ibipimo by’abagenerwabikorwa bavugaga ko batazi ibikorerwa bigabanyuke.
Ati "Turemera ko niba tuzamuye imyumvire y’umuturage, gukorera mu mucyo no kubaza utanga serivisi ibyo yakoze niba atabikurikiranye akabibazwa bizafasha kugira ngo uriya mushinga w’icyitegererezo muri Gicumbi uzagere ku ntego twifuza hanyuma bishobore no gukorerwa mu tundi turere.”
 Yongeyeho ko bagendeye ku byo babonye mu bushakashatsi bakoze, uyu mushinga munini wa mbere FONERWA ikoze ugomba kurindwa ba rusahurira mu nduru.
Umuyobozi mukuru wa FONERWA, Hubert Ruzibiza, yavuze ko binjiye mu bufatanye na TI Rwanda, kugira ngo uzabafashe mu ikurikiranabikorwa bityo ibyo abagenerwabikorwa, abafatanyabikorwa n’igihugu bawitezeho bizagerweho.
Ati "Mu by’ukuri aya ni amafaranga menshi, kandi ibyitezwe biri hejuru cyane, yaba ari ku muturage yaba ari kuri twebwe, na leta cyangwa n’ikigega cyita ku bidukikije [cyateye inkunga uwo mushinga]”.
Yongeyeho ko hari uburyo butandukanye burimo ubwo mu ikoranabuhanga buzatuma umuturage ashobora gutanga igitekerezo ku byo abona aho umushinga uri gukorerwa, ku buryo ayo makuru yagera no ku bafatanyabikorwa b’umushinga baba mu mahanga.
Biteganyijwe ko mu myaka itandatu uyu mushinga uzafasha abaturage kugabanya imyuka ya gaz carbonique (CO2) ingana na toni 273,720. Uzagera ku baturage 150,000 ugirire akamaro abarenga 380,000 muri rusange.

Title: Igifenesi, urubuto rushobora kuba imari ishyushye ku isoko ry’u Rwanda
Body:
Kankwanzi Anastasie utuye mu Karere ka Kirehe mu Murenge wa Gahara amaze imyaka umunani yenga urwagwa rukoze mu bifenesi benshi bafata nk’igihingwa kidafite umumaro muri aka gace.
Kankwanzi Anastasie utuye mu Karere ka Kirehe mu Murenge wa Gahara amaze imyaka umunani yenga urwagwa rukoze mu bifenesi benshi bafata nk’igihingwa kidafite umumaro muri aka gace.
Uru rwagwa aho aruranguza barugurisha amafaranga 500 ariko ngo ntarashobora guhaza isoko afite bitewe n’uko ari rinini cyane.
Uyu mugore byamuteje imbere ku buryo yubatse uruganda rukora inzoga muri urwo rubuto, akaba afite gahunda yo guhinga ibifenesi byinshi no kubikangurira abandi.
Igifenesi ni rumwe mu mbuto zo bwoko bw’inkeri bitewe n’uburyo kiremye, kikaba gikomoka mu Buhinde ariko gikunze kugaragara cyane no muri Thailand, Malaysia na Indonesia.
Mu Rwanda urubuto rw’igifenesi ntirukunze kugaragara nk’izindi bitewe n’uko abanyarwanda bataratangira kwitabira kuruhinga, ariko ni urubuto rukize cyane ku ntungamubiri ndetse runafasha kugabanya umuvuduko w’amaraso, kugira uruhu rwiza n’isukari y’umwimerere.
Mugabo Jean Pierre uyobora ishami ry’amashyamba mu Kigo gishinzwe guteza imbere amazi n’Amashyamba, RWFA, yavuze ko ari urubuto abantu benshi bakwiriye guhinga.
Ati “Igifenesi ni urubuto rwifitemo isukari y’umwimerere, kigabanya umuvuduko w’amaraso, gifasha umuntu kugira uruhu rwiza, kikagira n’intungamubiri za magnesium zigira uruhare mu gukomeza amagufa.”
Mugabo yongeraho ko igifenesi gifasha umuntu kubona neza cyane cyane kubageze mu zabukuru, kikagira ubutare buvura indwara yo kubura amaraso bukanatera amaraso kudatembera neza.
Ikindi ni uko ibiti by’ibifenesi bishobora kwifashishwa mu kwirinda isuri, bikaba byakwifashishwa kandi mu gukora ibikoresho byo mu nzu, imirimo y’ubwubatsi, ibikoresho by’umuziki.
Igifenesi kandi cyifashishwa mu gukora verini basiga imbaho, guhoma ubwato n’imyenge y’indobo.
Mugabo yakanguriye abanyarwanda gutera igiti cy’igifenesi cyane ko ngo Ishami ry’amashyamba mu Kigo gishinzwe guteza imbere amazi n’Amashyamba, RWFA, rizabafasha kubona ingemwe, bakaba baniteguye gushyira igiti cy’igifenesi mu bizaterwa mu gikorwa ngarukamwaka cyo gutera ibiti.
Ati “Abanyarwanda turabasaba kugitera ku buryo buhagije kugira ngo n’abagikeneye babashe kukibona cyane ko bashobora kubibona mu buhumbikiro butandukanye. Twebwe tuzakomeza kubafasha kubona ingemwe kugira ngo cyinjizwe no muri gahunda ngarukamwaka yo gutera ibiti, dufashe n’abikorera kucyongerera umusaruro.”
Urubuto rw’igifenesi rweze rupima ibiro hagati ya 3-5, rukaba rumara amezi 16 mu buhumbikiro. Kugira ngo nyirarwo atangire kurusarura ni uko byibuze ruba rumaze imyaka itandatu rutewe.
Igifenesi gisarurwa kabiri mu mwaka, igiti kimwe gifite ubushobozi bwo kwera imbuto 200. Ni igiti gikunze guhingwa mu duce dushyuha nko mu Bugesera, Kayonza, Huye, Gisagara, Nyanza, Ngoma na Rusizi.
Mu 2018, Akarere ka Ngoma nka kamwe mu duce duhingwamo igifenesi cyasaruye toni 69. Ku isoko usanga uru rubuto ruri hagati ya 1000-1500 Frw.
Inkuru bijyanye: Uko Kankwanzi yahaye agaciro igifenesi muri Kirehe agikoramo inzoga

Title: Byinshi ku kayunguruzo k’imirasire y’izuba gakomeje guhangayikisha Isi
Body:
Ubusugire bw’akayunguruzo k’imirasire y’izuba ‘Ozone’, ni kimwe mu bihangayikishije Isi ku buryo ingamba nyinshi zikomeje kugenda zifatwa mu kukarinda kwangirika kubera ingaruka byagira ku mibereho ya muntu n’ikitwa ikinyabuzima cyose.
Ubusugire bw’akayunguruzo k’imirasire y’izuba ‘Ozone’, ni kimwe mu bihangayikishije Isi ku buryo ingamba nyinshi zikomeje kugenda zifatwa mu kukarinda kwangirika kubera ingaruka byagira ku mibereho ya muntu n’ikitwa ikinyabuzima cyose.
Abahanga bavuga ko aka kayunguruzo ari umwuka uboneka mu kirere ku bilometero hagati ya 15-30 uvuye ku butaka, ukaba utandukanye n’umwuka abantu bahumeka wa Oxygène.
Abantu benshi bakunze kwibaza icyo ako kayunguruzo k’imirasire y’izuba kayungurura, imiterere yako n’ingano gafite.
Umwarimu mu Ishami rya Kaminuza y’u Rwanda y’Ubumenyi n’Ikoranabuhanga mu ishami ry’ubutabire, Dr. Birame Sekomo Christian, avuga ko imirasire y’izuba ifite imbaraga n’ubukana butandukanye.
Asobanura ko iyo imirasire y’izuba imanutse ivuye mu isanzure, umwuka wa Ozone uhita utangira kuyiyungurura ikagira iyo yemerera kugera ku isi (ari ryo zuba tubona), hakaba n’imirasire yitwa ‘Ultraviolet’ ifite ubukana bwangiza igera ku kayunguruzo k’imirasire y’izuba igahita isubira mu kirere kubera ko kaba katayemereye ko ihita.
Gusa iyo akayunguruzo k’imirasire y’izuba kangiritse, ya mirasire ifite ubukana ibasha kukanyuramo bikagira ingaruka ku bantu n’ibindi binyabuzima.
Ku bavuga ko akayunguruzo k’imirasire y’izuba wakabonesha amaso cyangwa ari ikintu gifatika, Dr. Birame avuga ko baba bibeshya cyane kuko ni umwuka ntabwo ari ikintu gifatika, nta nubwo wakabonesha amaso.
Uko akayunguruzo k’imirasire y’izuba kangirika
Dr Birame avuga ko kwangirika kw’akayunguruzo k’imirasire y’izuba bituruka ku kuba katewe n’ibindi binyabutabire bituruka ahanini mu byo dukora mu nganda zacu na gaz dukoresha mu byuma bikonjesha nka za firigo n’ibindi bitanga ubuhehere mu nzu z’abantu no mu modoka.
Ibyo binyabutabire byangiza akayunguruzo k’imirasire y’izuba birimo Chlorofluorocarbons (CFCs), Hydrochlorofluorocarbons (HCFCs), Hydrobromofluorocarbons (HBFCs), Halons, Methyl bromide na Carbon tetrachloride.
Imyuka kandi irimo ibinyabutabire nka chlorine, Bromine na Fluorine, iyo izamutse igahura n’umwuka wa Ozone ari ko kayunguruzo k’imirasire y’izuba iragasenya.
Uyu mwarimu avuga ko kuva ibihugu bitandukanye ku isi byashyira umukono ku masezerano ya Montreal yari agamije kurebera hamwe uburyo bwo kubungabunga akayunguruzo k’imirasire y’izuba mu 1987, hagiye habaho impinduka nziza.
Ibi abishingira ko mu bipimo byafashwe mu 1990 byerekanye ko aka kayunguruzo karimo gusubirana. Dr Birame avuga ko amasezerano ya Montreal ari amwe mu yatanze umusaruro ugaragara ugereranyije n’andi agenda asinywa.
Mu 2016 mu Rwanda hasinywe amasezerano ya Kigali agamije kurwanya iyoherezwa mu kirere ry’imyuka ituruka mu byuma bikonjesha. Amasezerano ya Kigali (Kigali Amendment) avugurura amasezerano ya Montreal yerekeye imyuka yangiza akayunguruzo k’izuba yasinywe mu 1987.
Isano y’ubushyuhe bw’izuba na Ozone
Dr. Birame avuga ko kuba izuba ryavuye ari ryinshi ku Isi ubushyuhe bukaba bwinshi nta sano bifitanye n’akayunguruzo k’imirasire y’izuba ahubwo ubwiyongere bw’abantu ku isi, ibikorwa abantu bagenda bakora nko gutwika imodoka, ari byo bishobora gutera ubwiyongere bw’ubushyuhe ku isi.
Ati “Ntaho bihurira, tugomba kumenya ko isi ari yayindi idahinduka ariko umubare w’abantu uriyongera n’ibikorwa by’abantu bikiyongera umunsi ku munsi. Ni ukuvuga ngo hari iyindi myanda twe tujugunya hanze igira ingaruka mbi ku bihe. Hari indi myuka twohereza mu kirere urugero nko gutwika imodoka na mazutu, ibyo bituma ubushyuhe bwiyongera ku isi.”
Yongeraho ko gutwika amavuta y’indege, ibiti n’ibindi bintu byose byifitemo izindi ngufu, bizamura umwuka mubi wa CO2 ugira uruhare mu kongera ubushyuhe ku isi.
Ati “Iyo utwitse ikintu gisanzwe gifite ingufu muri cyo, izo ngufu ntabwo zitakara ahubwo zirimuka zigahindura iyindi shusho. Iyo utwitse igiti hasigara ivu, ariko se bwa bunini bw’igiti bwagiye he? Bwahindutse umwuka bujya mu kirere.”
Ingaruka zo kwangirika kw’akayunguruzo k’imirasire y’izuba
Ingaruka za mbere zo kwangirika kw’akayunguruzo k’imirasire y’izuba ni uko urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima byangirika. Amafi mu nyanja aragabanuka kuko ibiribwa by’amafi byo bihita byangirika iyo bihuye n’imirasire ifite ubukana ya ultra violet [ifite ubukana].
Amababi ku bimera nayo arangirika iyo yahuye n’imirasire ifite ubukana agahinduka umukara. Ibyo bituma igikorwa cya photosynthèse gituma amababi yaba icyatsi nk’uko bisanzwe kitaba kubera iyo mirasire mibi.
Dr. Birame akomeza avuga ko kwangirika kw’akayunguruzo k’imirasire y’izuba bigira ingaruka no ku bantu nko kuzana ishaza mu jisho, no kurwara kanseri y’uruhu.
Buri mwaka iyi myuka ifite ubukana yiyongera mu kirere ku kigero cya 10% na 15 %. Ikibi cyayo kandi iguma mu kirere imyaka igera kuri 29.

Title: Inyoni zo muri Canada na Amerika zagabanyutseho hafi miliyari eshatu mu myaka 49
Body:
Ubushakashatsi buherutse gushyirwa hanze, bwagaragaje ko inyoni zo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika no muri Canada, zagabanyutse cyane uhereye mu 1970.
Ubushakashatsi buherutse gushyirwa hanze, bwagaragaje ko inyoni zo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika no muri Canada, zagabanyutse cyane uhereye mu 1970.
Ubwo bushakashatsi bwagaragaje ko inyoni zo muri ibyo bihugu zagabanyutseho 29 % mu myaka 49 ishize, kandi ko ari ikimenyetso kibi ku bijyanye no kubungabunga ibidukikije.
Bwakozwe n’abashakashatsi bo muri Amerika na Canada, ikigo gishinzwe inyoni muri Amerika n’ibindi bigo byita ku rusobe rw’ibinyabuzima.
Ibyavuyemo byagaragaje ko 90 % by’inyoni zagabanyutse cyane ari izo mu moko 12 zirimo ibishwi, intashya n’ibindi.
Inyonzi zibasiwe cyane kandi ni iziba mu mu kenke n’ahandi haba ibyatsi byinshi, aho zagabanyutseho izigera kuri miliyoni 720. Inyoni zo mu ku mazi no ku migezi nazo zagabanyuteho kimwe cya gatatu.
Peter Marra, umwe mu bakoze ubushakashatsi yavuze ko hakwiriye gufatwa ingamba zikomeye kuri iri gabanyuka rikabije ry’inyoni, kuko zifite uruhare runini mu buzima bwa muntu.
Abashakashatsi ntabwo bagaragaje impamvu yihariye inyoni zagabanyutse ariko bavuga ko ari ikibazo kiri hirya no hino ku isi.
Nko muri Amerika y’Amajyaruguru, bavuga ko kugabanyuka bishobora kuba byaratewe n’ibibazo mu mibereho y’inyoni no kororoka kwazo.
Ikindi bakeka kuba intandaro y’igabanyuka, harimo kwiyongera kw’ibikorwa bya muntu nk’ubuhinzi bukorerwa aho inyoni zabaga no kutitabwaho.
Hari kandi ibikorwa by’imijyi n’ubwiyongere bw’abaturage, ikoreshwa ry’imiti yica udukoko twatungaga inyoni n’ibindi.
Basabye ko hafatwa ingamba zikomeye mu kubungabunga inyoni, haba ku mpande za Guverinoma n’abaturage ubwabo.

Title: Ubushakashatsi bwagaragaje ko Isi iri mu kaga kubera ubushyuhe bukabije buri kwiyongera
Body:
Ubushakashatsi bwashyizwe ahagaragara n’Umuryango w’Abibumbye kuri iki Cyumweru buraburira Isi ko iri mu kaga, kubera kwirengagiza ikibazo cy’ubushyuhe bukabije bumaze imyaka itanu bwibasira ibice bitandukanye ku isi.
Ubushakashatsi bwashyizwe ahagaragara n’Umuryango w’Abibumbye kuri iki Cyumweru buraburira Isi ko iri mu kaga, kubera kwirengagiza ikibazo cy’ubushyuhe bukabije bumaze imyaka itanu bwibasira ibice bitandukanye ku isi.
Raporo y’ubwo bushakashatsi yatangarijwe mu nama ikomeye y’Umuryango w’Abibumbye yiga ku mihindagurikire y’ikirere ubwo Umunyamabanga mukuru, Antonio Guterres yahamagariraga ibihugu kongera ingamba zo kugabanya ibyuka bihumanya Ikirere.
Raporo “Ishimangira ko hagomba gushyirwaho ingamba zihamye zo guhangana n’ikibazo cy’ubushyuye n’ingaruka zikomeye z’imihindagurikire y’Ikirere”.
Impuzandengo y’ubushyuhe bwaranze Isi hagati ya 2015 na 2019 igaragaza ko kugeza ubu ariyo myaka itanu igiye kurangwa n’ubushyuhe bukabije mu mateka y’Umubumbe w’Isi, nkuko byagaragajwe n’iyo raporo.
Igaragaza ko “Ubu ubushyuhe bwazamutseho 1.10C ugereranyije na mbere y’iterambere ry’inganda hagati y’imyaka ya 1850 na 1900 na 0.20C z’ubushyuhe ugereranyije no kuva 2011 kugeza 2015”.
Umuyobozi mukuru w’Itsinda rirwanya umwuka wa Karubone (anti-carbon group E3G), Tom Burke, yabwiye Al Jazeera ko ikibazo kiri kwiyongera kurusha uko abantu babitekereza.
Ati “Ndatekereza ko ibyago biri kwiyongera bivuze ko dufite igihe gito cyo gukemura icyo kibazo kurusha uko tubitekereza. Ni ukuvuga ngo niba dushaka kurandura imihindagurikire y’Ikirere tugomba guhagarika gutwika ibinyabutabire byohereza ibyuka bihumanya ikirere.”
Mu cyumweru gishize, Guterres yavuze ko Isi iri gutatanya imbaraga ashingiye kuri iyo raporo igaragaza icyuho kiri hagati y’ibisabwa n’ibiri gukorwa.
Mu 2018 umwuka uhumanya ikirere, CO2 wiyongeyeho 2% bihita bigeza ku mubare wo hejuru mu mateka ungana na Toni miliyari 37.
Igiteye impungenge ni uko nta bimenyetso bigaragara byo kugera ku ntego yo gutangira kugabanyuka kw’ibyo byuka byoherezwa mu kirere.
Amasezerano y’i Paris yo mu 2015 agaragaza ko ibihugu byiyemeje gushyiraho ingamba zo kugabanya izamuka ry’ubushyuhe kugeza nibura kuri 20C cyangwa 1.50C kuko aribyo bishobora guhagarika izamuka ry’ubushyuhe mu buryo buhamye.
Gusa ubwo bushakashatsi bwatanze umuburo uvuga ko nubwo buri gihugu cyagera kuri iyo ntego, ubushyuhe buzazamuka kuva kuri 2.90C kugera kuri 3.40C. Kandi nabyo kugira ngo bishoboke ni uko Ibihugu byakuba gatatu umuvuduko biri kugenderaho ubu bishaka kugera kuri 1.50C.

Title: Guverinoma iri kwiga ku buryo bwo kubungabunga ibirwa biri mu Rwanda
Body:
Hari kwigwa imbanzirizamushinga y’itegeko rishya rizashyira mu byiciro bitandukanye ibirwa biri mu Rwanda kugira ngo hafatwe ingamba zitandukanye zo kubibungabunga.
Hari kwigwa imbanzirizamushinga y’itegeko rishya rizashyira mu byiciro bitandukanye ibirwa biri mu Rwanda kugira ngo hafatwe ingamba zitandukanye zo kubibungabunga.
Umuyobozi ushinzwe iby’igenzura ry’amategeko ajyanye n’ibidukikije mu kigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe Ibidukikije (REMA), Remy Duhuze yabwiye The New Times dukesha iyi nkuru ko iyo mbanzirizamushinga iri kuganirwaho n’inzego zitandukanye.
Duhuze yavuze ko kugeza ubu mu Rwanda bamaze kumenya ko hari ibirwa 131 mu biyaga bitandukanye biri hirya no hino mu gihugu.
Ati “Mu Rwanda hari ibiyaga 23. Muri byo hari ibirwa 131 tumaze kumenya, muri byo ibirwa 113 biri mu kiyaga cya Kivu ku ruhande rw’u Rwanda. Tugomba kubimenya neza no kubishyira mu byiciro kugira ngo turusheho kubibungabunga.”
Inzobere mu bidukikije zivuga ko ibirwa ari iby’agaciro ku rusobe rw’ibinyabuzima kuko akenshi bibaho ubwoko bw’inyamaswa n’ibimera bidakunze kuboneka ahandi.
Ibirwa bikunze kuba intaho ikomeye y’ibiguruka birimo inyoni, ndetse bivugwa ko ibirwa ku isi bituweho n’abantu basaga miliyoni 600, ni ukuvuga kimwe cya cumi cy’abatuye isi yose.
Duhuze yavuze ko kubw’ako kamaro kose k’ibirwa, bafashe ingamba zo kubibungabunga.
Ati “Bimwe mu biri kwigwaho ni ugushyira ibirwa mu byiciro bibiri. Icya mbere ni icy’ibirwa bishobora guturwaho bikaba byakoreshwa mu mirimo itandukanye nko mu buhinzi, ariko bikubahiriza amabwiriza. Ikindi cyiciro ni icy’ibirwa bizaba ibya Leta bikitabwaho mu buryo bwihariye nyuma yo kwimura no guha ingurane ababituyeho.”
Duhuze yavuze ko hari n’abasaba ko habaho ibyiciro bitatu by’ibirwa.
Ati “Harimo ibirwa bishobora guturwaho bikanakorerwaho ibikorwa bitandukanye. Icyiciro cya kabiri byaba ibirwa byahindurwamo ahantu h’ubukerarugendo hakaba hanubakwa amahoteli, naho icya gatatu ni icyiciro cy’ibirwa byabungabungwa ku buryo nta gikorwa kindi na kimwe kihakorerwa.”
Yavuze ko bakiri kwiga kuri iryo tegeko kuko bigaragara ko hazazamo ibyo kwimura abaturage kubw’ingurane.
Duhuze yavuze ko iryo tegeko rizanarushaho gutuma ibinyabuzima biri ku birwa no mu mazi abikikije birindwa kwangizwa, kuko byagaragaye ko hari abaturage batuye mu birwa batubahiriza amategeko agenga ibidukikije nko kutagira ibikorwa bikorerwa muri metero 50 uvuye ku mazi.
Yavuze ko ibyo bituma hari ubwo nk’imiti bashyira mu bihingwa imanuka ikajya mu mazi, ikica ibinyabuzima biyarimo.
Duhuze avuga ko batangiye igenzura ku bikorwa byangiza ibidukikije bikorerwa ku birwa, ababikora ndetse n’ikigero cy’urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima bimaze kwangizwa.
Kwangiza urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima biri mu mazi bishobora kugira ingaruka ku musaruro w’amafi nko mu kiyaga cya Kivu gikorerwamo uburobyi cyane.
Bumwe mu bwoko bw’amafi buboneka mu kiyaga cya Kivu harimo nk’Isambaza, Indugu na tilapia.
Ikiyaga cya Kivu mu mwaka wa 2018 cyarobwemo amafi angana na toni 18,879, ni ukuvuga 70 % by’umusaruro w’amafi yarobwe mu Rwanda hose.

Title: U Rwanda rugiye kugira inyubako ya mbere muri Afurika itangiza ibidukikije
Body:
Sosiyete Ultimate Developers Limited (UDL), imwe mu zikomeye zubaka inzu zigezweho, yatangaje ko vuba aha u Rwanda ruzaba ari icyitegererezo muri Afurika mu kugira inyubako zubatswe mu buryo butangiza cyangwa ngo bubangamire ibidukikije.
Sosiyete Ultimate Developers Limited (UDL), imwe mu zikomeye zubaka inzu zigezweho, yatangaje ko vuba aha u Rwanda ruzaba ari icyitegererezo muri Afurika mu kugira inyubako zubatswe mu buryo butangiza cyangwa ngo bubangamire ibidukikije.
UDL iri mu nzira zo kubaka inyubako y’amagorofa 16 mu Mujyi wa Kigali, izaba yubakanywe ubuhanga n’uburyo butuma itangiza ibidukikije.
Iyi nyubako izaba iri mu kibanza gifite ubuso bwa kilometero kare enye mu mujyi rwagati, ahateganye na Hotel des Mille Collines.
Ubusanzwe inyubako itangiza ibidukikije ni inyubako haba mu gishushanyo mbonera cyayo, uburyo yubatswe n’imikorere yayo bikorwa mu buryo butagira ingaruka ku bidukikije.
By’umwihariko iyo nyubako iba ifite uburyo butuma idakoresha ingufu nyinshi (amashanyarazi menshi), kudakoresha amazi menshi, itohereza mu kirere imyuka myinshi n’ibindi.
Inyubako nk’izo kandi ziba zifite uburyo bwo gutunganya imyanda kandi ibikorwa byose bigakorwa mu buryo budahenze, bigaha abayituyemo n’abazayikoresha uburyo bwiza bw’imibereho.
Umuyobozi Mukuru w’agateganyo wa UDL, Alice Ntamitondero, yabwiye The New Times dukesha iyi nkuru ko, inyubako zirengera ibidukikije ari zimwe mu zikunzwe na benshi muri iki gihe.
Ati “Nk’abubaka inzu, tubona amahirwe menshi mu guhuza imyubakire igezweho n’uburyo burengera ibidukikije kuko byagaragaye ko abantu benshi babikunda.Turashaka kuba aba mbere bafite ubwo buziranenge.”
Nubwo imirimo yo gutangira kubaka iyo nyubako ikiri mu ntangiriro, Ntamitondero yavuze ko bamaze gutanga isoko ryo gukora igishushanyo mbonera no kubaka iyo nyubako.
Ati “Turacyari mu ntangiriro. Twamaze kwakira abahatanira isoko barimo abanyamahanga, turacyasuzuma amapiganwa yabo.”
UDL ivuga ko iyo nyubako izaba yuzuye mu gihe cy’imyaka nibura itatu. Iyo nyubako izaba irimo ibiro, amacumbi, aho gukorera imyidagaduro n’amaduka.
Iyo nyubako niramuka yuzuye, Ntamitondero avuga ko izaba ariyo nyubako ya mbere yo muri ubwo buryo ku mugabane wa Afurika ifite ibyangombwa byo kuba yubatse mu buryo burengera ibidukikije.
Bavuga ko iyo nyubako niyuzura, bizamenyakanisha umujyi wa Kigali n’u Rwanda mu bijyanye n’ubuhanga gushushanya no kubaka inyubako zigezweho.
Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye ryita ku bidukikije, rivuga ko inyubako zitwara 30 % by’umuriro w’amashanyarazi ukoreshwa ku Isi, zikagira uruhare rwa 28% ku myuka mibi yoherezwa mu kirere.
Loni ivuga ko muri Afurika, inyubako zikoresha 56% by’umuriro wose kuri uwo mugabane.
Inyubako zitabangamira ibidukikije byagaragajwe ko ari kimwe mu bisubizo byafasha kugabanya iyo mibare.

Title: Aho Papa yasomeye misa i Nyandungu hagiye kubakwa ubusitani buzajya bunasengerwamo
Body:
Hagati ya tariki 7 na 9 Nzeri 1990, Mutagatifu Papa Yohani Pawulo II, yasuye u Rwanda aruzaniye ubutumwa bw’amahoro, ndetse ababarirwa muri mirongo bagira umugisha wo guhabwa ubusaserdoti na we.
Hagati ya tariki 7 na 9 Nzeri 1990, Mutagatifu Papa Yohani Pawulo II, yasuye u Rwanda aruzaniye ubutumwa bw’amahoro, ndetse ababarirwa muri mirongo bagira umugisha wo guhabwa ubusaserdoti na we.
Mu minsi itatu yamaze mu Rwanda, uwavuga ko ari mike ku bakristu Gatolika ntiyaba abeshye kuko buri wese yifuzaga kumuhobera cyangwa nibura kumubona yageze muri Paruwasi ye.
Gusa Papa yagerageje gusomera Misa mu bice bitandukanye by’igihugu birimo; Mbare mu Karere ka Muhanga, ku Kamonyi mu Karere ka Kamonyi, na Nyandungu muri Kicukiro.
Buri hantu, Papa yahasigaga ikimenyetso ndetse hubakwa ibikorwa remezo na Kiliziya Gatolika mu rwego rwo guha icyubahiro Umuyobozi wa Kiliziya Gatolika ku Isi.
Urugero, i Mbare hubatswe ikigo cy’urubyiruko cyahawe izina rya Cité de Nazareth naho Kamonyi hashyirwa urwibutso rw’amasuka abiri yahashyize kuwa 8 Nzeri 1990, agaragaza ubuhinzi n’igitebo kibika umusaruro, hejuru hakaba inyuguti za IHS (Iesus Humanium Salvator) zishushanya amagambo y’ikilatini asonabura ko Yezu ari Umukiza w’abantu.
Mu gishanga cya Nyandungu, Papa Yohani Pawulo II, yahasomye Misa kuwa 9 Nzeri 1990, yitabiriwe n’abantu benshi.
Alitari n’igitereko Papa yasomeyeho misa kuri uwo munsi, byari biri ku musozi wa Kanombe, iruhande rw’ahari Kaminuza ya Kigali Institute of Management (KIM), ku muhanda uva Kigali werekeza i Rwamagana ahazwi nko kuri 12.
Aho alitari yari iteretse, Papa yahashinzwe umusaraba munini nyuma Kiliziya Gatolika, yongeraho ikibumbano cy’igiti cyerekana Papa arimo gusoma Misa.
Nyuma y’imyaka 28 Papa Yohani Pawulo II asuye u Rwanda, abakora ibijyanye no kubungabunga babonye ko hari ikindi cyakongerwa mu kwibutsa ibi bihe bidasanzwe by’uruzinduko rwe.
Ikigo cy’Igihugu cyo kubungabunga ibidukikije (REMA), cyatangaje ko hagiye kubakwa ubusitani mu gishanga cya Nyandungu aho imbaga y’abantu yari ikoraniye yaje kumva ubutumwa bwa Papa mu gitambo cya misa yahasomeye.
Umuhuzabikorwa w’umushinga NUWEP uzatunganya ubusitani bwa Nyandungu, yabwiye KT Press ko ubu busitani bw’urwibutso rwa Papa buzaba bungana na metero 10.5 kuri metero 17 cyangwa se bwose bukangana na metero kare 178.5.
Ati “Ni ahantu ho kuvugira isengesho rito ry’umuntu ku giti cye. Bazajya basenga banabone amakuru ku mateka y’uruzinduko abakiri bato batazi”.
Uretse gukora ubusitani n’ibyatsi n’indabo, ubu busitani buzaba burimo ikibumbano cya Mutagatifu Papa Yohani Pawulo II, n’icya Bikira Mariya Nyina wa Yezu.
 Djangwani ati “Turacyavugana na Kiliziya Gatolika ku bindi byashyirwa muri ubu busitani”.
Musenyeri wa Diyosezi ya Butare akaba na Perezida w’Inama y’Abepiskopi mu Rwanda, Musenyeri Philippe Rukamba, avuga ko Papa Yohani Pawulo II, ‘yigishije ubutumwa bw’amahoro ndetse asengera n’abarwayi. Twishimiye kugira ubwo busitani kuko abakristu bazahora bibuka ubutumwa bwe ubwo yabasuraga’.
Mgr Rukamba avuga ko ubwo Mutagatifu Yohani Pawulo II yazaga mu Rwanda, yahaye ubupadiri abagera kuri 30 bo mu Rwanda na Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo. Mu banyarwanda harimo na Mgr Antoine Kambanda wa Arkidiyosezi ya Kigali.
Gukora ubusitani bwa Papa ni kimwe mu bindi bikorwa by’umushinga NUWEP, uzakorerwa kuri hegitari 130 mu gishanga cya Nyandungu. Ibi bikorwa byose bizaba byarangiye muri Nzeri 2020, aho bizatwara miliyari 5.2 FRW.

Title: Ibyo wamenya ku ishyamba rihingwamo imiti mu Rwanda rigasarurirwa muri Congo
Body:
Ishyamba ni umwe mu mitungo kamere ifatiye runini u Rwanda n’abarutuye kuko uretse kuba ribafasha kubona umwuka mwiza uhumekwa rinabafasha kubona amafaranga, ibiti byo kubakisha, imbaho, ibiti byo gucana, imiti n’ibindi.
Ishyamba ni umwe mu mitungo kamere ifatiye runini u Rwanda n’abarutuye kuko uretse kuba ribafasha kubona umwuka mwiza uhumekwa rinabafasha kubona amafaranga, ibiti byo kubakisha, imbaho, ibiti byo gucana, imiti n’ibindi.
Ikigo gishinzwe amazi n’amashyamba (RWFA) kigaragaza ko mu mashyamba igihugu gifite ateye ku buso busaga 28% by’ubutaka bwose, 68% ari ay’abaturage, 27% ari aya Leta, amashyamba acungwa n’Uturere angana na 2% n’aya sosiyete sivile angana na 3%.
Muri ayo y’abaturage habarurwamo ishyamba riherereye mu Karere ka Rusizi mu Ntara y’Uburengerazuba, mu nkengero z’ikiyaga cya Kivu, ryihariye guhingwamo ibiti bitunganywamo imiti ariko rigasarurirwa muri Repubulika iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo (RDC).
Umuyobozi wa koperative y’abakorera ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku burobyi mu kiyaga cya Kivu bo mu Murenge wa Gihundwe (Abagi), Nzeyimana Phenias, yabwiye IGIHE ko kuva cyera abona iryo shyamba risarurwamo ibitunganywamo imiti bigapakirwa ubwato bikajyanwa muri RDC.
Ati “Bahaguze cyera bateramo ibinini, birera bagasarura bagatera n’ibindi kuko ni ubutaka bunini bujya kungana nk’Utugari nka tubiri. Bahingamo ibihingwa byitwa Quinquina bahonda bakabikuraho ibihu, bakabijyana mu ruganda kubikoramo imiti.”
Nzeyimana yasobanuye bishoboka ko abazungu bene ryo baba baratangiye kurikoresha ku mwaduko w’abazungu mu Rwanda.
Ati “Pharmakina [Sosiyete y’Abadage ihinga ikanatunganya quinquina] ifite ubutaka bunini ihingaho mu Rwanda, i Bukavu na Uvila muri RDC..Icyo bakora, bahinga bakanatunganya imiti irimo za quinine [wamamaye mu kuvura malaria]”.
Uyu mugabo asobanura ko cyera hahoze ari ubutaka bw’abaturage abo bazungu babugurira n’abaturage babaha umunyu n’ibindi batangira kububyaza umusaruro.
Ati “Baraguze, bafite n’ibyangombwa, bivuze ko banatanga imisoro ya buri kwezi. Uyu munsi abakozi barikoramo n’ababacunga ni abanyarwanda..Bimeze nk’ibihuru ariko winjiyemo ni ahantu heza usanga biteye ku murongo.”
Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Ikigo gishinzwe amazi n’amashyamba (RWFA), Prime Ngabonziza, yabwiye IGIHE ko iryo shyamba ari umtungo w’Umudege witwa ‘Gebber Horst’ yahawe na Leta y’u Rwanda ku wa 1 Nzeri 1970.
Uyu mugabo [Gebber] uri no mu bashinze Pharmakina, ngo ubwo hatangiraga gahunda yo kubarura ubutaka kuri bene bwo, ku wa 21 Gicurasi 2014 yongeye guhabwa ibyangombwa by’ubwo butaka busaga hegitari 180.
Igice kimwe cy’iryo shyamba kiri mu Murenge wa Nkanka, Akagari ka Ngazi kikangana na hegitari 149, ikindi kiri mu Murenge wa Gihundwe, Akagari ka Gihaya rifite hegitari 28 naho irindi rifite hegitari 3.1 riherere mu Murenge wa Gihundwe, Akagari ka Kagara.
Ngabonziza ati “Umwihariko w’aya mashyamba ni uko yatewe afitiwe gahunda yo kubyazwa umusaruro, bivugwa ko yaba avamo imiti. Yarabikoze ariko akanabikorera mu gihugu cya RDC duturanye.”
Ngabonziza yasobanuye ko bizwi ko abibyaza uwo musaruro ariko adasarura amashyamba mu buryo bwo kuyatema ngo ayajyane muri RDC cyangwa ahandi.
Ati “Afite uko asarura ariko ishyamba rihora rihari nta biti atema, ntabwo byangiza ibidukikije, ntibihungabanya ubuso buteyeho amashyamba. Ikindi ntekereza kandi nzi ni uko akomeza kugira akamaro gasanzwe ko kugabanya imyuka mibi yangiza ikirere, gutanga imvura.”
Nubwo Pharmakina itagaragaza ingano ya Quinquina isarura kuri ubwo butaka bwo mu Rwnada, urubuga rwayo rugaragaza ko 60% by’umusaruro bikorwamo imiti ivura malaria ucuruzwa mu bihugu birimo n’u Rwanda.
Urwego rw’amashyamba by’umwihariko aya Leta arimo kwegurirwa abikorera, mu 2017 rwinjije miliyari zisaga 67Frw, bikaba biteganyijwe ko nyuma yo kuyegurira abikorera azinjiza asaga miliyari 200Frw ku mwaka.

Title: U Rwanda rugeze he rushaka igisubizo kirambye cy’inda zibasira amashyamba?
Body:
Guhera 2013 mu Rwanda hagaragaye udusimba twitwa inda z’ishyamba, turya amababi y’inturusu bigatuma zidakomeza gukura nk’uko bisanzwe, biha umukoro Leta n’abandi bafite amashyamba mu nshingano wo gushakisha umuti ubasha guhangana nazo.
Guhera 2013 mu Rwanda hagaragaye udusimba twitwa inda z’ishyamba, turya amababi y’inturusu bigatuma zidakomeza gukura nk’uko bisanzwe, biha umukoro Leta n’abandi bafite amashyamba mu nshingano wo gushakisha umuti ubasha guhangana nazo.
Utu dusimba tuzwi nka nka ‘Thaumastocoris Peregrinus’ ngo dufite inkomoko mu bihugu inturusu zaturutsemo birimo Australie n’ahandi higanje amashyamba menshi yazo.
Bizumuremyi Faustin wo mu Karere ka Gisagara yabwiye IGIHE ko ‘ziriya nda ziracyahari mu biti by’inturusu gusa ntabwo zikiri nyinshi nk’uko byari bimeze mu minsi yashize kuko hari igihe wajyaga mu ishyamba zikakuzuraho, ukabona inturusu ziri kuma zihagaze’.
Mu kiganiro cyihariye yahaye IGIHE, Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Ikigo gishinzwe amazi n’amashyamba (RWFA), Prime Ngabonziza, yavuze ko ubushakashatsi bwerekanye ko ziriya nda ziterwa no kudakorera ishyamba nk’uko n’abantu barwara inda kubera umwanda.
Ati “Twafasheho duke muri turiya dusimba dukorana n’Ikigo cy’Ubushakashatsi cyabaga muri RAB tubyohereza mu mahanga, baturebera aho inturusu zaturutse babona turiya dukoko batuzi, batugira inama ko duterwa n’uko amashyamba afashwe.”
Ubwo bushakashatsi bwerekanye ko ziterwa n’amazi make ari aho ibiti biba biteye, uko bikoreye n’ibindi kandi ko kuzirwanya hakoreshejwe umuti wuhirwa byagira izindi ngaruka ku bidukikije nk’amazi, imyaka n’ibindi.
Ati “Batubwira ko kuzana umuti wo gufuhera muri ayo mashyamba byateza ikibazo gikomeye kurusha utwo dukoko duterwa n’uko amashyamba afashwe. Batugira inama yo gukorera amashyamba, hagacibwamo imiringoti ifata amazi, ibiti bikabona ahagije.”
Yakomeje agira ati “Ibyo bamaze kubitubwira twatangiye kubikora, tuganira n’abaturage n’uturere hari aho byagiye bicika. Uko byari bimeze mu 2014, ubu ntabwo ariko bimeze. N’aho uzibona ni nko mu ishyamba ry’umuturage usanga ridafashwe neza.”
Indwara y’inda yibasiye inturusu yagaragaye bwa mbere mu bihugu bya Australie, Afurika y’Epfo, Zimbabwe, Eritrea no muri Uganda.
Inturusu zibasirwa n’izi nda zihariye ubuso bunini bw’ahateye amashyamba mu Rwanda kuko ziteye ku buso bungana na 55% by’ubuso bwose buteyeho amashyamba.
Ubusanzwe u Rwanda rufite ubuso bungana na kilometero kare 26 336. Muri ubwo buso bwose, 28.3% hateyeho amashyamba.
U Rwanda rwihaye intego ko mu 2020 amashyamba azaba ari kuri 30% by’ubuso bwose bw’igihugu hagamijwe kugira ikirere kitabangamiye umusaruro w’igihugu n’abagituye.

Title: Amashyamba ya leta amaze kwegurirwa abikorera ku kigero cya 30%
Body:
Guverinoma y’u Rwanda ikomeje ibikorwa byo kwegurira abikorera amashyamba ya Leta no gushishikariza abaturage bayafite kwibumbira muri koperative mu kunoza imicungire n’imikoreshereze yayo no kongera umusaruro uyakomokaho.
Guverinoma y’u Rwanda ikomeje ibikorwa byo kwegurira abikorera amashyamba ya Leta no gushishikariza abaturage bayafite kwibumbira muri koperative mu kunoza imicungire n’imikoreshereze yayo no kongera umusaruro uyakomokaho.
Politiki y’amashyamba yo mu 2010, iheruka kuvugururwa mu 2018 iteganya ko abikorera bagomba kugira uruhare rukomeye mu kongera umusaruro n’agaciro by’amashyamba kuko igenzura ryakoze ryagaragaje ko ashobora gucungwa neza mu gihe yeguriwe abikorera.
Mu kiganiro cyihariye yahaye IGIHE, Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Ikigo gishinzwe amazi n’amashyamba (RWFA), Prime Ngabonziza, yavuze ko kugeza uyu munsi amashyamba ya Leta amaze kwegurirwa abikorera ku kigero cya 30% hatabariwemo za Pariki.
Ati “Muri iyi gahunda tumaze kwegurira abikorera amashyamba ya Leta agera kuri 30% ariko ntabwo mbariyemo amapariki kuko iyo rimaze kwitwa pariki ryegurirwa ikigo gishinzwe iterambere (RDB), rikabyazwa umusaruro mu rwego rw’ubukerarugendo.”
Mu bafatanyabikorwa bigeze kuvugwa muri iyi gahunda yo kwegurira amashyamba abikorera harimo Inganda z’icyayi, ibigo bikora imirimo yo gusatura no gutunganya imbaho birimo icyitwa New Forest Company, gikorera muri Afurika y’Iburasirazuba, ikitwa Sawmill East Africa cyo muri Lithuania gikora ibikorwa byo gusatura imbaho zifashishwa n’ibigo by’ubwubatsi n’ububaji.
Ngabonziza ati “Dufite abafatanyabikorwa bo mu gihugu n’abaturuka hanze, baza bagashyira imari yabo mu mashyamba. Urabona nk’aya mapoto y’amashanyarazi, ni ibiti byo mu Rwanda.”
Yasobanuye ko hari abandi batunganya imbaho mu mashyamba ya Leta n’abiyemeje gukora ubushakashatsi bushobora gutuma amwe atunganywamo imiti.
Ati “Hari abandi babonye muri ayo mashyamba iryo bazakoreramo ubushakashatsi, tubona ko bakazakuramo imiti. Ni ukuvuga ngo gahunda ya Leta ni ukwegurira amashyamba ya Leta abikorera kugira ngo afatwe neza.”
Ngabonziza yakomeje agira ati “Icyayi gitunganywa hakoreshejwe inkwi ziva mu mashyamba yo mu Rwanda. Baraza bagakorana amasezerano na Leta, ikabegurira amashyamba bagasarura amashyamba ariko batera n’ayandi.”
RWFA igaragaza ko mu mashyamba igihugu gifite 68% ari ay’abaturage, 27% ari aya Leta.
Ati “Twatangiye gahunda yo guhuriza hamwe abaturage, bagafashwa mu kwigishwa gushyira hamwe uwo mutungo wabo, bakigishwa uko ufatwa neza.”
Nyuma yo kwishyira hamwe bakagira ishyamba rigari babishaka bakaryegurira abikorera cyangwa bakaribyaza umusaruro ubwabo bakurikije inama bagirwa n’ababishinzwe. Iyi gahunda imaze gukorerwa mu Karere ka Rwamagana, Gicumbi, Gakenke na Rulindo.
Urwego rw’amashyamba kandi ni rumwe mu zifatiye runini ubukungu bw’u Rwanda kuko nko mu 2017 rwinjije miliyari zisaga 67Frw. Biteganyijwe ko nyuma yo kuyegurira abikorera azinjiza asaga miliyari 200Frw ku mwaka.

Title: Imiterere y’ikigo cya Ellen DeGeneres mu Rwanda yagaragajwe (Video)
Body:
Muri Gashyantare uyu mwaka, mu Karere ka Musanze hashyizwe ibuye ry’ifatizo ahazubakwa ikigo cy’umunyamerika Ellen DeGeneres kigamije kubungabunga ingagi zo mu birunga.
Muri Gashyantare uyu mwaka, mu Karere ka Musanze hashyizwe ibuye ry’ifatizo ahazubakwa ikigo cy’umunyamerika Ellen DeGeneres kigamije kubungabunga ingagi zo mu birunga.
DeGeneres ni umugore w’imyaka 61 wamamaye muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika kubera ikiganiro cyamwitiriwe kuri Televiziyo kizwi nka ‘The Ellen DeGeneres Show’.
Icyo kigo ni impano yahawe n’umufasha we Portia de Rossi (bombi babana ari abagore) umwaka ushize ubwo yuzuzaga imyaka 60 y’amavuko.
Ellen usanzwe yarihebeye kubungabunga inyamaswa, amaze guhabwa iyo mpano yahise aza mu Rwanda kwirebera ibikorwa bya Dian Fossey mu kubungabunga ingagi zo mu mu birunga.
Yahise atangira ibikorwa byo gukusanya inkunga igamije gushinga ikigo mu Rwanda kizibanda ku bushakashatsi bugamije kubungabunga ingagi zo mu misozi miremire ziri gukendera ku Isi.
Ikigega The Ellen Fund cyerekanye imiterere ya The Ellen DeGeneres Campus izafasha mu bikorwa by’umuryango witiriwe Dian Fossey wita ku ngagi, Dian Fossey Gorilla, kivuga ko intego bafite ari uguha amahirwe abanyeshuri b’abanyafurika n’abashakashatsi bafite inyota yo kwita ku rusobe rw’ibinyabuzima.
The Ellen Fund irimo gufasha mu kubaka ikigo kizafasha mu bikorwa bya Dian Fossey Gorilla Fund, kizaba kiri ku buso bwa metero kare zirenga 4600, gifite laboratwari, isomero, ibyumba by’inama, ahazajya habera imurikabikorwa, amashuri n’amacumbi y’abashakashatsi n’abanyeshuri.
Inyubako zizaba zirimo amacumbi, aho kwigira, ibigo by’ubushakashatsi ndetse n’aho kumurikira ibihangano by’ubugeni bijyanye no kubungabunga ibinyabuzima.
Iki kigega kivuga ko “Intego ni ugufasha umuryango witiriwe Dian Fossey wita ku ngagi, Dian Fossey Gorilla Fund, mu bikorwa byawo byo kurengera ingagi. Ni no kubera icyitegererezo buri wese uyisuye mu bijyanye no kwita ku ngagi ndetse no kuzibungabunga”.
“Icy’ingenzi cyane, iki kigo kizafasha mu kwigisha abanyafurika b’igisekuru cy’ahazaza ibijyanye no kubungabunga urusobe rw’ibidukikije.”
Muri iki kigo nta ngagi zizahaba ahubwo hazaba abanyeshuri n’abashakashatsi. Mu kubaka iki kigo abaturage 1500 bazahabwa imirimo. Ibuye ry’ifatizo ryashyizweho tariki 12 Gashyantare 2019.
Muri icyo kigo ni naho hazaba hari ibiro by’ ikigega Dian Fossey Gorilla Fund kimaze imyaka isaga 50 gikorera mu Rwanda binyuze mu gashami kacyo gashinzwe ubushakashatsi ka Karisoke Research Centre mu Karere ka Musnze.
Ikigega Dian Fossey Fund ni kimwe mu miryango mpuzamahanga ikomeye mu bijyanye no kubungabunga ingagi.
Iki kigo kizashimangira ubushake bw’u Rwanda mu kubungabunga urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima no guteza imbere ubumenyi. Biteganyijwe ko ikigo gishya kizafungura imiryango ku mugaragaro mu ntangiriro za 2021.
Amateka avunaguye ya Ellen Lee DeGeneres
Ellen Lee DeGeneres ni umunyarwenya, umukinnyi n’umuyobozi wa film, umwanditsi, umukozi wa televiziyo wavukiye i Metairie muri leta ya Louisiana, imwe mu zigize Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
Yatangiye kuba umunyarwenya wabigize umwuga mu ntangiriro za 1980, aho yazengurutse igihugu cyose akora ibitaramo byo gusetsa, byaje gutuma mu 1982 ahabwa igihembo nk’umuntu wa mbere uzi gutera urwenya.
Kuva mu 1994-1998 yagaragaye mu kiganiro ‘The Ellen’, mu 2003 aza gutangira ikiganiro ‘The Ellen DeGeneres Show’, kigikunzwe n’uyu munsi, kikaba kigaragaramo ibyamamare ndetse n’abantu bakomeye ku Isi.
DeGeneres umaze kwandika ibitabo bine, no kwegukana ibihembo byinshi birimo n’ibya Emmy Awards 30, mu 2016 yashimiwe na Barack Obama wari Perezida wa Amerika, ahabwa umudali uzwi nka ‘Presidential Medal of Freedom’, uza ku rwego rwo hejuru mu mashimwe ahabwa abasivili.
Mu 1997 nibwo yatangaje ko aryamana n’abo bahuje ibitsina (Lesbian), ndetse mu 2008 ashakana n’umukinnyi wa film, Portia de Rossi bari bamaze igihe kinini bakundana. Afite umutungo ubarirwa muri miliyoni 380 z’amadolari.

Our goal is to create opportunities for African students and researchers who are dedicated to protecting #wildlife. #Africa #Rwanda #education #conservation @massdesignlab @savinggorillas pic.twitter.com/yYh7s2Fiio
