Title: Havumbuwe ko hari indi mibumbe aho ubuzima bushoboka kurusha ku Isi
Body:
Ubushakashatsi bushya bwagaragaje ko mu isanzure hari indi mibumbe ishobora kuba yabonekaho ubuzima bwiza kurusha ku Isi.
Ubushakashatsi bushya bwagaragaje ko mu isanzure hari indi mibumbe ishobora kuba yabonekaho ubuzima bwiza kurusha ku Isi.
Mu nama izwi nka Goldschmidt Geochemistry Congress yabereye i Barcelone muri Espagne, abashakashatsi bayobowe na Dr Stephanie Olson bamuritse ubushakashatsi bari bamazemo iminsi bureba niba hari imibumbe mu isanzure ishobora kubonekaho ubuzima nk’uko Isi imeze.
Ubushakashatsi bwabo bwasanze hari imibumbe myinshi ahubwo aho ubuzima bushoboka cyane kurusha ku Isi.
Hashize imyaka inzobere mu by’isanzure zivumbura imibumbe yindi iri mu isanzure myinshi ariko bakayibona kure cyane ku buryo bigoye kuyigeraho ndetse no kureba neza ibiyiriho hakoreshejwe indebakure (telescope) bikaba ingorabahizi.
Mu gukora ubwo bushakashatsi, ababukoze bifashishije porogaramu yakozwe na NASA, ibafasha kwinjira imbere mu miterere y’iyo mibumbe iri kure cyane y’Isi. Bifashishije iyo porogaramu, babashije kwiga neza no kwinjira mu miterere n’imimerere y’ibihe n’inyanja ziri kuri iyo mibumbe.
Baje gutungurwa no kubona hari imwe muri iyo mibumbe ifite imiterere ishobora guturwaho ubuzima bukaba bwiza kurusha uko bimeze ku Isi.
Mu byo bashingiyeho bareba harimo kubanza kumenya uburyo ubuzima ku Isi bushoboka bitewe n’inyanja, bakagereranya niba bakurikije inyanja babonye kuri iyo mibumbe naho ubuzima bwashoboka.
Abakozi ubushakashatsi bagize bati “Akazi kacu kibanze ku kumenya inyanja ziri kuri iyo mibumbe ifite inyanja zifite byinshi mu bituma ubuzima bwo mu Nyanja zo ku Isi bubaho. Ubuzima mu Nyanja bushoborwa n’intungabuzima zizamurwa zivuye mu mwijima wo ku ndiba y’inyanja, zikazamuka hejuru ku gice cy’inyanja kigerwaho n’izuba aho zishobora guhumeka. Izo mbaraga zo kuzamura intungabuzima uko ziyongera, niko n’intungamubiri ziyongera, bisobanuye ko no kororoka byiyongera.”
Ubwo buryo bakoresheje bwaberetse ko hari indi mibumbe myinshi ubuzima bushoboka ndetse neza cyane kurusha Isi.
Icyakora abakoze ubushakashatsi bavuga kubera ibikoresho bidahagije, hari ibyo batabashije kubona ku buryo bemeza ko hari n’ibindi byatuma ubuzima bushoboka cyane kuri iyo mibumbe batabashije kubona.
Dr Olson yavuze ko ubwo bushakashatsi ikindi buzabafasha ari ukumenya uburyo bwo kubaka indebakure nshya zizafasha kureba cyane ibiri kuri iyo mibumbe ya kure, ku buryo abantu bajya guturayo.

Title: Inkongi yibasiye ishyamba rya Amazon yahagurukije abakomeye ku Isi
Body:
Igice giherereye muri Brésil cy’ishyamba rya Amazon, rifatwa nk’igihaha cy’Isi kubera akamaro rifite mu guha Isi umwuka mwiza cyafashwe n’inkongi y’umuriro.
Igice giherereye muri Brésil cy’ishyamba rya Amazon, rifatwa nk’igihaha cy’Isi kubera akamaro rifite mu guha Isi umwuka mwiza cyafashwe n’inkongi y’umuriro.
Ikigo gishinzwe Ubushakashatsi mu by’isanzure muri Brésil cyatangaje ko umubare w’inkongi muri iki gihugu wazamutse ku kigero cya 80% ugereranyije n’umwaka ushize, kimwe cya kabiri cy’izi nkongi zibasira agace ka Amazon ibintu bikomeza gushyira mu kaga ibidukikije.
Abashyirwa mu majwi kuba inyuma y’iyi nkongi ni abakorera imirimo y’ubuhinzi n’ubworozi muri iri shyamba nk’uko bitangazwa n’Umuryango udaharanira inyungu ushinzwe kureberera Amazon.
Abahinzi n’aborozi barashinjwa gutwika iri shyamba nk’uburyo bwo gushaka ubutaka bwo gukoreraho imirimo yabo.
Perezida w’u Bufaransa, Emmanuel Macron, yavuze ko uyu muriro wibasiye Amazon ari ikiza mpuzamahanga, asaba ko ikibazo cy’iri shyamba cyazaganirwaho mu nama itaha ya G7 kigashakirwa umuti.
Abantu b’ibyamamare ku Isi mu ngeri zitandukanye batanze ibitekerezo byabo kuri iyi nkongi y’umuriro, basaba ko hakorwa ibishoboka byose iri shyamba rikabungabungwa kuko ari umutungo ukomeye ku Isi.
Muri abo harimo umukinnyi Cristiano Ronaldo, umuhanzi Madonna, n’abandi benshi.

Title: Ibiteye amatsiko ku rugendo n’amateka bya Richard Kandt mu Rwanda
Body:
Dr Richard Kandt, umuvumbuzi uzwi cyane mu mateka y’Akarere ka Afurika y’Iburasirazuba, yageze mu Rwanda mu 1898 aje mu bikorwa by’ubushakashatsi birimo gushakisha isôoko y’uruzi rwa Nile.
Dr Richard Kandt, umuvumbuzi uzwi cyane mu mateka y’Akarere ka Afurika y’Iburasirazuba, yageze mu Rwanda mu 1898 aje mu bikorwa by’ubushakashatsi birimo gushakisha isôoko y’uruzi rwa Nile.
Nubwo avugwa cyane muri Afurika y’Iburasirazuba, amateka ye azwi cyane mu Rwanda rw’imisozi 1000 ruri mu bihugu yazengurutse igihe kirekire.
Yinjiriye mu Burasirazuba bwarwo, agera mu Majyaruguru, mu Burengerazuba, mu Majyepfo ahingukira i Kigali agirwa Rezida warwo ku ngoma y’Abakoloni.
Urugendo rwe kuva mu Budage kugera muri Afurika ntabwo rwose iyi nkuru igiye kuruva imuzi, iragaruka cyane ku guhera yinjiye mu Rwanda kugeza arusohotsemo, by’umwihariko inzira yanyuzemo n’amateka yahasize.
Uyu mugabo wari umusirikare, akaba n’umuganga wavukiye mu Mujyi wa Posen muri Pologne mu 1867, yagiriye bihe bitandukanye mu Rwanda, amateka ye arigishwa hirya no hino ku Isi, ndetse aho yanyuze mu Rwanda ni hamwe mu duce nyaburanga dukurura abakerarugendo.
Amateka agaragaza ko mbere y’uko aza muri Afurika Dr Kandt yakunze gusoma cyane ibitabo bivuga ku mateka n’umuco byayo, ndetse ajya no kwiga ururimi rw’igiswahile i Berlin mu Budage.
Ibyo byamufashije kuza mu Rwanda akurikiye abazungu ba mbere bahageze b’Abadage, Von Gotzen na Dr Oscar Baumann. Urugendo rwe yinyira muri Afurika yarutangiye mu 1897 afite imyaka 30, aje mu bikorwa by’ubushakashatsi ku giti cye.
Ibitabo yanditse bigaragaza ko muri Afurika y’Iburasirazuba yageze i Dar-es-Salaam yinjiriye Zanzibar muri Tanzania mu 1897, ahamara amezi hafi atatu ategura urugendo rwe, yifuzaga kugera mu Rwanda.
Icyo gihe ngo yaje yitwaje imodoka zikururwa [Rumoroki] zisaga 140, abayobora mukerarugendo batatu, abasirikare batanu n’abagaragu barindwi n’ibindi byari kumufasha muri gahunda ye.
Kuwa 7-10 Kanama 2019, Umunyamakuru wa IGIHE kimwe n’abafite ibigo bifasha ba mukerarugendo mu Rwanda, basuye ibice bitandukanye bigaragaza inzira Dr Richard Kandt yanyuzemo mu Rwanda.
Uru rugendo ikigo gishinzwe Ingoro z’Umurage w’u Rwanda n’Umushinga w’Abadage wita ku iterambere (GIZ) byabageneye, hagamijwe gutangiza inzira nshya y’ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku muco n’amateka.
Umushakashatsi mu kigo cy’igihugu cy’ingoro z’Umurage, Mugabowagahunde Maurice, yabwiye IGIHE ko Dr Kandt yinjiye mu Rwanda mu 1898 aturutse i Burundi, mu rugendo rugamije gushakisha isôoko nyakuri y’uruzi rurerure ku Isi, rwa Nile.
Uyu mugabo ngo yinjiriye ku kiyaga cya Rweru , ubu ni mu Karere ka Bugesera, akomereza mu bice bitandukanye by’igihugu.
Mugabowagahunde yasobanuye ko kugeza uyu munsi hari uduce tugera ku 10 Kandt yasizemo amateka ariko hari utw’ingenzi dusurwa n’abakerarugendo umunsi ku wundi.
Ati “Yazengurutse igihugu cyose, yinjira mu gihugu yahereye mu Bugesera ku kiyaga cya Rweru, akomereza ku Kagera aho umugezi wa Nyabarongo uhurira n’Akanyaru arimo gushakisha isôoko ya Nile.”
Asobanura ko Dr Kandt yakomereje i Gatagara hafi y’i Bwami agiye kumenyesha umwami ko ari mu gihugu, ajya gushaka isôoko ya Nile, amaze kuyibona akomereza mu Majyaruguru gupima ibirunga, ahasanga Inkima zifite ibara rya zahabu.
Yakomereje ku Gisenyi ahamara iminsi itatu, urugendo rwe rukomereza ku nkengero z’ikiyaga cya Kivu aho yaje gutura i Shangi yise ku murwa w’amahoro, ubu ni mu Karere ka Nyamasheke, ashushanya ikarita ya Kivu, ahava aza gutura i Kigali, ubwo yagirwaga Rezida.
Uko yaharuye inzira y’ubukerarugendo
Mu Birunga
Pariki y’Ibirunga iherere mu Majyaruguru y’igihugu, Dr Richard Kandt yayivumbuyemo Inkima[Golden Monkies], zifite ibara rya zahabu, azandikaho inyandiko nyinshi ndetse zihabwa izina ry’ubushakashatsi rya ‘Cercopithecus kandti.
Uyu munsi ni zimwe mu nyamaswa zitangaje zikunzwe n’Abakerarugendo mu Rwanda.
I Shangi
Nubwo uyu munsi habaye mu itongo, i Shangi mu Karere ka Nyamasheke ni hamwe mu duce nyaburaganga dufite amateka akomeye y’u Rwanda ndetse dusurwa n’abakerarugendo.
Ku wa 24 Werurwe 1899 nibwo Dr Richard Kandt yahubatse inzu y’ibyatsi, ayituramo akajya ayikoreramo ibikorwa bye by’ubushakashatsi. Nyuma yo kuzenguruka ikiyaga cya Kivu, niho yicaye ahashushanuriza ikarita yacyo.
Muri uru rugo habereye imishyikirino itandukanye hagati y’Abadage n’Ababiligi, igamije kumvikana uburyo bigabanya u Rwanda na Congo.
Muri uru rugo kandi niho Abamisiyoneri ba mbere bari baturutse i Burundi bacumbitse bagiye kugisha inama Kandt y’uko ibikorwa byabo byazatanga umusaruro, abagira iyo kubanza kwiyegereza umwami. Aha ni naho hasomewe misa ya mbere y’Abazungu.
Nyungwe
Uyu mugabo yaturutse i Burayi afite intego yo kuvumbura isôoko nyakuri ya Nile nyuma y’imyaka 40 umwongereza John Speke atangaje ko ikomoka mu kiyaga cya Victoria muri Uganda ariko ntiyanyurwa, yiyemeza gukurikirana imigezi yose iroha muri icyo kiyaga akareba uturuka kure kurusha iyindi.
Ubushakashatsi bugaragaza ko Dr Kandt yavumbuye Isôoko ya Nile mu ishyamba rya Pariki ya Nyungwe hagati ya Nyakanga na Kanama 1898 nyuma y’Ukwezi ageze mu gihugu, ahasiga ikimenyetso cy’uko ariyo Isôoko ya kure mu migezi yiterateranya ikawubyara.
Iyi pariki iri mu ishya kimeza ry’inzitane rigizwe n’ubwoko bw’ibiti 250, ibimera 1068, inyamaswa 84 n’inyoni 299 burimo 27 bw’umwihariko mu Karere, ibarizwamo isôoko Nile ku bwa Richard Kandt ni imwe mu bice nyaburanga cyane bisurwa cyane mu Rwanda. Ibi yaje kubihererwa n’igihembo nk’umuntu w’intwari ubwo yari asubiye iwabo mu 1902.
Rubavu
Mugabowagahunde yasobanuye ko Dr Richard Kandt yageze ku Gisenyi, ubu ni mu Karere ka Rubavu ari mu bushakashatsi bwo gupima ikiyaga cya Kivu, ndetse yubaka inzu y’ibyatsi ahazwa ku izina rya Tamu Tamu ariko iyo nzu yaje gusenywa. Muri uyu mujyi uhana imbibi na RDC, niwe wahubatse ibiro by’iposita.
Aka gace gakunda gusurwa n’abakerarugendo cyane bitewe n’amateka gafite arimo n’indake zacukuwe n’abasirikare b’u Budege mu gihe cy’intambara ya mbere y’Isi, Labolatwari y’amatungo yubatswe n’Abadege n’imva y’umusirikare w’umudage wahapfiriye.
Kigali
Dr Kandt wabaye igihe kirekire mu bikorwa by’ubushakashatsi i Shangi, nyuma akaza gusubira mu Budage, agarutse mu Rwanda yakomeje ibikorwa by’ubushakashatsi ariko aza no kugirirwa icyizere, agirwa Rezida w’u Rwanda, ahita yimukirayo akazwi nk’Ingoro yo kwa ‘Richard Kandt’.
Iyi nzu ifatwa nk’imwe mu zigezweho zimaze igihe kirekire mu Rwanda, ni imwe mu zisurwa cyane n’abakerarugendo, inihariye ku amateka yaranze Abadage n’Abanyarwanda.
Mu 1913, Dr Kandt yiyemeje gusubira mu Budage kubera impamvu z’uburwayi ntiyongera kugaruka mu Rwanda. Nyuma intambara ya mbere y’Isi yahise itangira yasize u Rwanda rukuwe mu maboko y’Abadage.
Muri iyo ntambara Kandt yari umuganga w’ingabo z’Abadage aho yaje gupfa ku wa 29 Mata 1918 azize ibyuka bihumanya yatewe ku wa 2 Nyakanga 1917.

Title: Ibiteye amatsiko ku ngoro ndangamurage y’ibidukikije yihariye muri Afurika iherereye i Karongi (Amafoto)
Body:
Mu 2015 nibwo ingoro ndangamurage y’ibidukikije ibitse ibikorwa bitandukanye by’urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima ya mbere mu Rwanda no mu karere ko munsi y’ubutayu bwa Sahara yafunguwe mu Murenge wa Bwishyura mu Karere ka Karongi, mu Ntara y’Uburengerazuba.
Mu 2015 nibwo ingoro ndangamurage y’ibidukikije ibitse ibikorwa bitandukanye by’urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima ya mbere mu Rwanda no mu karere ko munsi y’ubutayu bwa Sahara yafunguwe mu Murenge wa Bwishyura mu Karere ka Karongi, mu Ntara y’Uburengerazuba.
Icyo gihe ifungurwa yibandaga ku kumurika ibijyanye n’ingufu (Renewable and non renewable energy), urugendo rukorwa ngo zitange amashanyarazi n’ingaruka zigira ariko nyuma yaje kongerwamo ibijyanye n’inyamaswa n’amabuye y’agaciro byabaga i Kigali mu Ngoro y’Amateka kamere izwi nko kwa “Kandt”
Kuwa 7-10 Kanama 2019, umunyamakuru wa IGIHE kimwe n’abafite n’abakorera ibigo bifasha ba mukerarugendo mu Rwanda, basuye iyi ngoro ndangamurage y’ibidukikije, mu rugendo rugamije gutangiza inzira nshya y’ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku muco n’amateka.
Muri uru rugendo ikigo gishinzwe Ingoro z’Umurage w’u Rwanda n’Umushinga w’Abadage wita ku iterambere (GIZ) byabageneye rwibanze ku bifitanye amateka n’umuvumbuzi Dr Richard Kandt, basobanuriwe ibice by’ingenzi bigize iyi ngoro.
Dr Richard Kandt, umuvumbuzi uzwi cyane mu mateka y’u Rwanda no mu Karere ka Afurika y’Uburasirazuba yageze mu Rwanda mu 1898 aje mu bikorwa by’ubushakashatsi birimo gushakisha Isôoko y’uruzi rwa Nile, aza no kugirwa Rezida w’u Rwanda mu 1907.
Iyi ngoro igizwe n’ibice bitatu bimurikwa birimo ikijyanye n’ingufu, ikigizwe n’inyamaswa n’ubucukuzi bw’amabuye y’agaciro ndetse n’igice kirimo ubusitani bugizwe n’ibiti n’ibyatsi gakondo bitandukanye bya kinyarwanda kugira bidacika ahubwo abantu bajye bahakura imbuto.
Ikimurikirwamo amabuye y’agaciro agaragaza ubukungu bw’u Rwanda n’aho aherereye nka gasegereti, almunium, colta, wolfram n’ayandi. Iyi ngoro igaragaramo ibuye ryo mu bwoko bwa Meteorite[amanuka mu kirere ashyushye, abantu bakunze kwita kibonumwe], ryaguye mu Rwanda mu Karere ka Burera mu 1976.
Hari nyiramugengeri igaragara mu bice bitandukanye by’igihugu n’ubundi bwoko bw’amakara bugereranywa nayo ariko buba mu Budage gusa, amakara y’ibiti n’acukurwa.
Iyi ngoro kandi igaragaramo ubwoko butandukanye bw’ingufu zikoreshwa mu Rwanda zirimo izitangwa n’amazi, Gaz Méthane igaragara mu kiyaga cya Kivu, izituruka ku muyaga, ku mashyuza, ku zuba n’izindi. Hari n’igice kimurikirwamo ingufu za Iranium u Rwanda rurimo kwiga uburyo zakoreshwa.
Muri iyi ngoro hamurikirwamo ibisigazwa by’ingagi, imwe mu zavumbuwe bwa mbere muri Pariki y’Ibirunga. Muri iyi ngoro unasangamo ubwoko butandukanye bw’inyamaswa zumishije mu buryo bwa gihanga, ushobora kureba utitegereje neza ntubashe kuzitandukanya n’inzima.
Muri izo harimo inzoka, impala, ingona, isiha, ingwe, urusamagwe, inkima n’amoko y’inyoni atandukanye adakunze kugaragra aho ariho hose.
Uretse ibi bice, hari n’ikindi kimurikirwa ubwoko butandukanye bw’ibimera bifite amateka yihariye mu muco wa Kinyarwanda birimo n’ibyifashishwaga mu migenzo ya Kinyarwanda n’ubuvuzi bw’indwara zitandukanye aho abakozi bashinzwe gusobanurira abayisura bagufasha ku buryo utaha amatsiko yashize.
Ikigo cy’ingoro ndangamurage kigaragaza ko kimaze gukora ubushakashatsi bugamije kugaragaza ibice nyaburanga by’u Rwanda abakerarugendo basura, bwagaragaje ibisaga 500 birimo 10 bifitanye isano n’urugendo rwa Dr Richard Kandt.

Title: Ikaze ku Isôoko ya Nile, yavumbuwe na Richard Kandt muri Pariki ya Nyungwe
Body:
Nubwo waba warabyibagiwe, umuntu wese wagize amahirwe yo kwiga cyangwa gusoma ibitabo by’amateka n’ubumenyi bw’Isi, yumvise nibura ko Isôoko y’umugezi wa Nile, ufitiye akamaro gakomeye ibihugu bitandukanye, yavumbuwe mu Rwanda n’umushakashatsi w’Umudage, Dr Richard Kandt.
Nubwo waba warabyibagiwe, umuntu wese wagize amahirwe yo kwiga cyangwa gusoma ibitabo by’amateka n’ubumenyi bw’Isi, yumvise nibura ko Isôoko y’umugezi wa Nile, ufitiye akamaro gakomeye ibihugu bitandukanye, yavumbuwe mu Rwanda n’umushakashatsi w’Umudage, Dr Richard Kandt.
Umugezi wa Nile utemba mu bice bitandukanye by’Amajyaruguru ashyira Uburasirazuba bwa Afurika, niwo muremure ku Isi, ureshya na Kilometero 6,650. Gusa hari ibitabo bimwe bivuga ko ari uwa kabiri nyuma y’uwitwa Amazon ariko Wikipedia igaragaza ko ureshya na Kilometero 6400.
Uyu mugezi ufatiye runini Isi, cyane cyane Afurika mu bijyanye no kubona amazi abayituye bakoresha. Hari ibihugu bimwe biwufata nk’inka imwe birimo nka Misiri na Sudan n’ibindi, kuko ubifasha guhangana n’ingaruka z’ubutayu, bawifashisha mu bikorwa bya buri munsi nko kuhira imyaka n’ibindi.
Kuwa 7-10 Kanama 2019, umunyamakuru wa IGIHE kimwe n’abafite n’abakorera ibigo bifasha ba mukerarugendo mu Rwanda, basuye Isôoko na Nile yavumbuwe na Dr Richard Kandt muri Pariki ya Nyungwe, mu rugendo rugamije gutangiza inzira nshya y’ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku muco n’amateka.
Uru rugendo ikigo gishinzwe Ingoro z’Umurage w’u Rwanda n’Umushinga w’Abadage wita ku iterambere (GIZ) byabageneye, rwibanze ku mateka y’Ubukoloni bw’Abadege mu Rwanda by’umwihariko urugendo rwa Dr Richard Kandt wari ubahagarariye.
Dr Richard Kandt, umuvumbuzi uzwi cyane mu mateka y’u Rwanda no mu Karere ka Afurika y’Uburasirazuba yageze mu Rwanda mu 1898 aje mu bikorwa by’ubushakashatsi birimo gushakisha Isôoko y’uruzi rwa Nile.
Ubushakashatsi bugaragaza ko Dr Kandt yavumbuye Isôoko ya Nile mu ishyamba rya Pariki ya Nyungwe hagati ya Nyakanga na Kanama 1898 nyuma y’Ukwezi ageze mu gihugu, ahasiga ikimenyetso cy’uko ariyo Isôoko ya kure mu migezi yiterateranya ikawubyara.
Pariki ya Nyungwe ni ishyamba cyimeza ry’inzitane rimaze igihe kirekire muri Afurika, rikora ku Turere twa Nyaruguru, Nyamagabe mu Ntara y’Amajyepfo, Rusizi na Nyamasheke mu Ntara y’Uburengerazuba.
Ni Pariki yabayeho mbere y’izindi mu gihe cyiswe icy’ubutita (ice age) ikize ku runyurane rw’ibimera, ishyamba rigizwe n’amoko arenga 1068 y’ibimera, urwunge rw’ibiti by’indabyo zirimo ubwoko bw’ibiti n’iby’inganzamarumbo bya lobelia. Harimo n’ibiti bivamo imiti ya Kinyarwanda.
Iyi pariki ifite umwihariko wo kuba ariho hari amasôoko y’inzuzi nini muri Afurika. Harimo isôoko y’uruzi rwa Nile mu burasirazuba n’iy’uruzi rwa Congo mu Burengerazuba.
Kugera aho Dr Richard Kandt yemeje ko ariho Isôoko ya Nile iherereye, bigusaba urugendo rw’amasaha hagati y’atatu n’ane uturutse ku ishami rya Gisakura rishinzwe kwakira abakerarugendo mu Karere ka Nyamasheke, ukanyura muri Nyungwe hagati, ugatunguka mu Gasarenda muri Nyamagabe.
Kuva mu Gasarenda ugera ku Isôoko ya Nile harimo intera ya Km 42 ariko harimo izigera kuri 4.5Km umuntu agenda mu ishyamba rya Pariki ya Nyungwe rigizwe n’ubwoko bw’ibiti 250, ibimera 1068, inyamaswa 84 n’inyoni 299 burimo 27 bw’umwihariko mu Karere.
Nk’ibisanzwe mbere yo kwinjira muri Pariki, Umukozi ushinzwe kuyobora abakerarugendo muri Pariki ya Nyungwe witwa Ntoyinkima Claver, yatubwiye ko urugendo tugiye gukora ari rurerure, dusabwa kwitwaza amazi n’ibindi biribwa ariko twirinda kugira icyo dutamo cyangwa dukuramo, kwitwaza imyenda y’imvura n’inkweto ziturinda icyatubangamira.
Ni inzira y’inzitane inyura ahantu hameze nk’umuhora ariko ibiti n’ibyatsi biyuzuyemo ku buryo bisaba kugenda ubyegura cyangwa aho bibaye ngombwa ugasimba. Ni umurambi, n’ahaterera si cyane ku buryo hakubiza icyuya.
Ntoyinkima ati “Isôoko ya Nile tugiye kureba ni iyo yagezeho [Kandt] ya kure nubwo hari abandi bashakashashatsi bo muri New Zealand baje bakabona aharenzeho kilomotero mu 2006.”
Iyo Isôoko Kandt yavumbuye iri mu ishyamba hagati. Ni amazi macye azamuka mu butaka ku buryo no kuyavamo bitakorohera. Haruguru ikikijwe n’igishanga kirimo ibyatsi ukandagiraho ukumva hasukuma mu gihe ku rundi ruhande ari ibihuru bisanzwe.
Ati “Uko mureba kino gishanga, iyo imvura igwa amazi amanukamo, aka niko gasoko ka mbere atangira kuzamukamo...Ugenze nka metero 400 ugana hepfo ubona utundi dusoko twiyungaho, kakaba kanini kurushaho ku buryo ushobora kuyavomaho.”
Impamvu aho ariho hafatwa nk’Isôoko, Ntoyinkima asobanura ko ari uko ‘Iyo migezi yose upimye kuva ku nyanja ya Mediterane ukagera aho itangirira, aha niho usanga hari ibirometero byinshi’.
Nyuma y’uguhura k’utugezi two muri Nyungwe n’iyo sôoko yavumbuwe na Kandt, bikora umugezi witwa Rukarara, ugahura na Mwogo, nayo yahura n’uwitwa Mbirurume, bikabyara Nyabarongo.
Nyabarongo iyo imaze guhura n’Akanyaru bihinduka Akagera gasuka mu kiyaga cya Victoria ari nacyo umugezi wa Nile ufatiraho.
Ntoyinkima ati “Iri shyamba rifite akamaro kanini kuko navuga ko aricyo kigega cy’amazi y’u Rwanda kuko 70% by’akoreshwa mu Rwanda afata isoko muri iri shyamba.”
Igice cy’Uburasirazuba bw’ishyamba rya Pariki ya Nyungwe, Ntoyinkima yasobanuye ko kimena amazi mu kibaya cy’umugezi wa Nile naho igice cy’Uburengerazuba kikamena amazi mu kibaya cy’umugezi wa Congo.
Ikigo cy’igihugu ndangamurage kigaragaza ko kimaze gukora ubushakashatsi bugamije kugaragaza ibice nyaburanga by’u Rwanda abakerarugendo basura, bwagaragaje ibisaga 500 birimo 10 bifitanye isano n’urugendo rwa Dr Richard Kandt.

Title: Abanyarwanda batatu barinda pariki bagiye guhembwa ku rwego rwa Afurika
Body:
Abanyarwanda barimo Mpumuje Leonidas, Nzuki Anthony na Jean Nepomuscene Musekura bari mu barinzi 50 ba Pariki bazashimirwa uyu mwaka mu bihembo bizwi nka ‘African Rangers Awards’ biteganyijwe kuwa 15 Ugushyingo 2019 i Accra muri Ghana.
Abanyarwanda barimo Mpumuje Leonidas, Nzuki Anthony na Jean Nepomuscene Musekura bari mu barinzi 50 ba Pariki bazashimirwa uyu mwaka mu bihembo bizwi nka ‘African Rangers Awards’ biteganyijwe kuwa 15 Ugushyingo 2019 i Accra muri Ghana.
Mpumuje akuriye itsinda rishinzwe kurinda no kwita ku Nkura muri pariki y’Akagera ari naho mugenzi we Nzuki akora nk’umukuru w’agashami k’abarinzi mu gihe Musekura ari umurinzi muri pariki y’Ibirunga.
The African Ranger Awards ni gahunda igamije gushimira abarinzi b’amapariki ku bw’umusanzu w’intagereranywa batanga mu kurinda inyamaswa n’urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima ku mugabane wa Afurika.
Iyi gahunda yatangijwe muri 2017 n’umuherwe w’Umushinwa akaba na nyiri Alibaba ikigo kimenyerewe mu bucuruzi bwo kuri Internet, Jack Ma, abinyujije mu muryango yashinze ushinzwe kubungabunga ibidukikije ‘Paradise Foundation’
Uyu muhango ugamije kuzirikana umurimo ukorwa n’abarinzi ba pariki no gukora ubukangurambaga ku rwego rw’Isi ku kamaro ko kurinda urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima biboneka muri Afurika.
Imibare igaragaza ko mu 2016, 82% by’abarinda pariki muri Afurika bahuye n’ibyago byashoboraga gutuma bapfa mu gihe abangana na 60% batewe na ba rushimusi.
Mu 2015 nibura abarinda pariki 107 barishwe ubwo bari mu kazi kabo naho hagati ya 2006 na 2016 abarinzi ba pariki barenga 1000 bemeye kubura ubuzima bwabo mu kazi ko kurinda inyamaswa.
Muri ibi bihembo by’uyu mwaka hahatanaga abagera ku 115, baturutse mu bihugu 17 byo muri Afurika.
Bimwe mu bigenderwaho hatoranywa uhabwa ibihembo harimo ubwitange n’umusanzu mu kurinda pariki, ibyago n’ingorane yabashije guhangana nabyo ndetse n’ubushobozi mu by’imiyoborere.
The New Times yanditse ko Jack Ma washinze umuryango utanga ibi bihembo yavuze ko aha agaciro akazi abarinda pariki bakora.
Ati “Ubwitange bw’abarinzi ba pariki bunkora k’umutima bukantera n’imbaraga, turizera ko abantu benshi bazaha agaciro kubungabunga inyamaswa n’ibidukikije karemano bikorwa n’abarinzi ba parike”
Umuyobozi Mukuru Ushinzwe ubukerarugendo mu Kigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere (RDB), Belise Kariza, yavuze ko umurava w’abarinda pariki ari ingenzi mu rugendo rw’igihugu ruganisha ku bukerarugendo bushikamye.
Ati “Hatari akazi gakomeye n’ubwitange bigaragazwa n’abarinzi ba pariki bacu, iterambere ry’ubukerarugendo bw’u Rwanda ntiryari gushoboka, bari ku isonga mu kubungabunga urusobe rw’ibidukikije ari nayo mpamvu dushimira umuryango Paradise Foundation ku kuzirikana abarinzi b’amapariki muri Afurika n’akamaro kabo k’ingenzi”.

Title: Byinshi ku Nkura, imwe mu nyamaswa zikaze ku Isi zikundwa na ba mukerarugendo
Body:
Inkura ni imwe mu nyamaswa nini zikundwa na ba mukerarugendo ku buryo pariki izifite iba yihariye icyo gikundiro. Pariki y’Akagera mu Rwanda, ni umwe mu zifite Inkura harimo izakuwe muri Afurika y’Epfo n’izavuye muri Repubulika ya Tchèque.
Inkura ni imwe mu nyamaswa nini zikundwa na ba mukerarugendo ku buryo pariki izifite iba yihariye icyo gikundiro. Pariki y’Akagera mu Rwanda, ni umwe mu zifite Inkura harimo izakuwe muri Afurika y’Epfo n’izavuye muri Repubulika ya Tchèque.
Inkura niyo nyamabere ya kabiri nini ku Isi nyuma y’inzovu. Ni imwe kandi mu zikaze. Ni zimwe mu nyamaswa zagiye zicika ahantu hatandukanye bitewe no kubangamirwa n’ibikorwa bya muntu ari yo mpamvu ababungabunga urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima barimo kugerageza kuzitaho ngo zigwire.
Mu kinyejana cyashize habarwaga inkura zirenga ibihumbi 500 ku Isi, ubu zirabarirwa mu bihumbi 30 ziba mu mashyamba bitewe na ba rushimusi. Inkura z’umukara zisigaye ku Isi zibarirwa mu 5500, izo mu bwoko bwa Javan ni 60, naho izo mu bwa Sumatran ni 100.
Ubuzima bw’inkura, imiterere yazo, ubunini bwazo n’ibindi zihariye, bituma benshi bazitangarira.
-Inkomo y’izina ‘Rhinoceros’ : Inkomoko y’izina Rhinoceros ari yo Nkura mu Kinyarwanda, rikomoka mu magambo abiri y’ururimi rw’Ikigiriki ariyo ‘Rhino’ bivuga izuru na ‘Keras’ bivuga ihembe, muri make iyo uhinnye izina ryayo ukayita Rhino gusa uba uvuze izuru.
-Imiterere: Ubwoko bw’Inkura buba bunini ni Inkura z’umweru dore ko ishobora kugira uburebure bwa metero hagati 3.7 n’ubuhagarike ( kuva ku kimono ugera ku rutugu) bwa metero 1.8 ikagira uburemere bwa toni ebyiri n’ibiro 300.
Inkura nto ni izitwa Sumatran zigira uburebure bwa metero eshatu n’ubuhagarike bwa metero 1.8 n’uburemere bw’ibiro 800, mu gihe Inkura ikivuka ipima hagati y’ibiro 40 na 64.
-Kororoka: Inkura ihaka amezi ari hagati 14 na 18, inkura nto yavutse imara ibyumweru bibiri itunzwe no konka nyina gusa nyuma ikagenda imenyera ihereye ku kurya ibyatsi byoroshye.
Inkura nto ivukana ubwoya ku mubiri buyirinda ubukonje cyangwa gutwikwa n’izuba. Inkura ntishobora kongera kubyara iyo icyana yabyaye kitarakura ibintu bishobora gufata hagati y’imyaka itatu n’itanu. Ibi bitera Inkura z’ingabo kuba rimwe na rimwe zakwica Inkura nto kugira ngo zibone uko zibangurira nyina.
-Inkura zahoranye ubuhagarike bwa metero hafi 5: ubwoko bw’Inkura butagiraga ihembe buzwi nka ‘paraceratherium’ bwazimiye ku isi mu myaka miliyoni 30 ishize nkuko Siyansi ibivuga, bwagiraga ubuhagarike bwa metero 4.8, igihagararo inkura z’ubu zitakigira, kuko nk’Inkura y’umweru ishobora kugira ubuhagarike bwa metero 1.8.
-Inkura y’umweru n’Inkura y’umukara byose birasa ku ibara: uramutse wumvise aya mazina ushobora gucyeka ko imwe ari umukara indi ikaba umweru mu ibara, gusa zose zifite ibara ry’urwirungu, hari abavuga ko iri zina ‘white rhinos’ bivuze inkura z’umweru ryakomotse ku Baholandi babaga muri Afurika bazitaga ’Wijd’ (Wide) bashaka kuvuga inyamaswa ifite umunwa munini bikaza kumvwa nabi n’abavuga Icyongereza bayita ‘white’.
-Umubano wazo n’inyoni zitwa Oxpecker: Inkura zikunze kugaragara zifite Inyoni ku mutwe cyangwa ku mugongo gusa abahanga ntibavuga rumwe kuri uyu mubano kuko hari abavuga ko Inyoni zikunda kuba ziri ku Nkura kubera ko zizitoraho imbaragasa n’ibirondwe, mu gihe abandi bavuga ko izi nyoni zizfasha kumenya ko umwanzi azisatiriye.
Biterwa nuko ubushakashatsi bwagaragaje ko Inkura iyo nta nyoni zifite ku mugongo amahirwe yazo yo kuvumbura ko hari umwanzi uzisatiye ari 23% mu gihe iyo ifite inyoni ku mugongo amahirwe azamuka akaba 97%.
-Iganga mu ntera ndende: Inkura ishobora kuganga mu ntera ya metero hafi eshanu bikaba umwihariko ku ngabo kuko zibikora kugira ngo zerekane amakare yazo.
-Amase ni isoko y’amakuru ku Nkura: mu gihe abantu tubona amase nk’umwanda, ku Nkura ni isoko y’amakuru. Inkura iyo yinukirije amase y’indi ishobora kumenya amakuru menshi kuri yo, nk’imyaka yayo, niba ari ingabo cyangwa ingore cyangwa andi ayo ariyo yose ajyanye n’imyororokere yayo.
-Umusuzi wazo unuka nk’ikinyabutabire cya Sulfur: Inkura izwiho kugira umusuzi unuka cyane ku buryo ugereranwa n’ikinyabutabire cya Sulfar.
Wakomotseho n’imvugo iyo umusemburo wifashishwa mu gukora inzoga binyuze mu gutara iyo utanze ikinyabutabire cya ‘Hydrogene sulfide’ bitewe no kunuka babyita umusuzi w’Inkura (Rhino Fart).
Ihembe: Inkura igira amahembe abiri ahagana ku zuru iry’imbere rikaba rirerire kurusha iry’inyuma kandi akaba agizwe na Keratin, yo mu bwoko bw’inzara z’umuntu. Inkura zifashisha aya mahembe mu kwirwanaho, mu gihe cy’izuba ry’inshi ziyakoresha zicukura imizi y’ibiti yo kurya cyangwa zikayakoresha zicukura isoko y’amazi

Title: U Rwanda rwashyizwe mu hantu heza 19 ku Isi watemberera muri iyi mpeshyi
Body:
Ikinyamakuru CNN cyo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, kizwiho gukora inkuru zicukumbuye ku Isi, cyashyize u Rwanda mu hantu heza 19 ku Isi buri muntu yakwifuza kujya muri iyi mpeshyi ya 2019 akaba yaharuhukira.
Ikinyamakuru CNN cyo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, kizwiho gukora inkuru zicukumbuye ku Isi, cyashyize u Rwanda mu hantu heza 19 ku Isi buri muntu yakwifuza kujya muri iyi mpeshyi ya 2019 akaba yaharuhukira.
Iki kinyamakuru cyavuze ko niba uyu munsi waba urimo gutekereza aho wajya muri iyi mpeshyi, cyaguhitiyemo aha hantu kugira ngo uzahabone ibyo wifuza byose harimo u Rwanda.
Hamwe muri aha cyavuze ni Salar de Uyuni muri Bolivia, aka niko agace kanini ku Isi kagaragamo umunyu wafatanye gaherereye muri Bolivia muri Amerika y’Epfo.
Haza kandi Las Vegas iherereye muri Leta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, aha CCN ivuga ko ari ahantu hazataramirwa n’abahanzi barimo, Lady Gaga Janet, Jackson n’abandi.
Harimo Nova Scotia agace ko muri Canada, hari kandi Londres mu Bwongereza, Grand Canyon, muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Apollo 11 Anniversary Celebrations, Multiple US Cities, Tasmania, New York City, French Polynesia, Anchorage, Alaska, Singapore, Seattle, u Bufaransa, Churchill, Manitoba.
Iki kinyamakuru kandi kigaragaza u Rwanda nk’ahantu heza ho gutemberera muri iyi mpeshyi.
CNN ivuga ko iyo utekereje u Rwanda uhita utekereza Ingagi zo mu Birunga.
Kigaragaza kandi inyamanswa ziherereye muri Pariki y’Akagera nk’Intare, Ibisamagwe, Inkura, Inzovu n’Imbogo ko nabyo biri mu bikwiye gusurwa muri iyi mpeshyi.
Harimo kandi icumbi rigezweho, Magashi Camp riherereye muri iyi parike, aho abantu bashobora kuruhukira bakihera ijisho ibyiza bitatse u Rwanda.
Iri cumbi ryubatswe na Wilderness Safaris ryafunguwe mu Ukuboza 2018, ricungwa n’inzobere mu by’amacumbi muri Afurika y’Amajyepfo n’iy’Uburasirazuba.
Iri cumbi ry’ibyumba bitandatu byo gukambikamo, ryubatswe n’amahema, rikagira restaurant n’aho kuruhukira umuntu yicara yitegeye ubwiza bw’ikiyaga.
Aha hantu hihariye muri Pariki y’Akagera, abahakambitse bazajya babasha kwirebera ubwiza bw’inyamaswa amanywa n’ijoro, batemberejwe mu modoka cyangwa mu bwato.
Ikiyaga cya Rwanyakazinga cyubatsweho Magashi Camp, cyihariye ku mvubu nini muri Afurika, ingona ndende n’izindi nyamaswa zitandukanye mu gishanga kigikikije.
Imiterere y’imbere muri iri cumbi rigezweho n’imitako ihatamirijwe irimo iy’imigongo, ni iyo mu muco nyarwanda.
Abakunda koga, barisanzura muri piscine yabagenewe. Ibi bituma umunezero uba ari wose ku wagendereye Pariki y’Akagera, ifite inyamaswa eshanu zikomeye muri Afurika arizo intare, ingwe, inzovu, imbogo n’inkura.
Uri muri Pariki y’Akagera kandi ubona ibintu bitandukanye birimo amoko y’inyoni arenga 500.
Mu handi CNN yavuze heza ku Isi harimo Umujyi wa Washington, u Busuwisi, Kenya iherereye ku mugabane wa Afurika na Norvège.
Muri Gicurasi nabwo u Rwanda rwaje ku rutonde rwakozwe n’ikinyamakuru Business Insider, rugaragaza ahantu heza buri wese ufite amafaranga arimo gusura mu mwaka wa 2019, akaba yizeye kuba yahagirira ibihe byiza.
Ni urutonde rwakozwe nyuma yo kugenzura ibirebana n’ibishya biri aho hantu, ibikwiye gusurwa bitarakendera, ibizagusigira urwibutso n’impinduka zikomeye mu buzima bwawe.

Title: U Rwanda ruri kwiga uko rwakumira imodoka zishaje cyane zigurwa mu mahanga
Body:
Ikigo cy’Igihugu cyo kubungabunga Ibidukikije (REMA) cyatangaje ko hari kwigwa uko imodoka zishaje cyane zigurwa mu mahanga, zakumirwa kwinjizwa mu Rwanda mu kugabanya umwuka wanduye no kurinda ingaruka wagira ku baturage.
Ikigo cy’Igihugu cyo kubungabunga Ibidukikije (REMA) cyatangaje ko hari kwigwa uko imodoka zishaje cyane zigurwa mu mahanga, zakumirwa kwinjizwa mu Rwanda mu kugabanya umwuka wanduye no kurinda ingaruka wagira ku baturage.
Ubushakashatsi bwa REMA bwagaragaje ko ibiza ku isonga mu guhumanya umwuka uhumekwa mu Rwanda, harimo umwotsi w’imodoka, imyotsi y’amakara n’inkwi n’ibindi.
Bwanagaragaje kandi ko 95,2% y’imodoka ziri mu Rwanda zimaze imyaka irenga 10 zikozwe; 56,6 % zakozwe mbere yo mu 1999 naho 77,2% zakozwe mbere ya 2000.
Bwagaragaje ko uduce duto duto tutabonwa n’amaso twivanga n’umwuka uhumekwa tubangamiye bikomeye ubuzima bw’abaturarwanda bishobora gutera indwara z’ubuhumekero n’umutima.
Mu bice bituwe hari ubwo naho ikigero cy’utwo tuvungukira kirenga urugero rwemewe, ahanini kubera imyuka ikomoka ku gukoresha ibicanwa bikomoka ku biti no gutwika ibyatsi, ibiyorero n’amashyamba.
Ubwo hizihizwaga umunsi mpuzamahanga wo kurengera ibidukikije kuri uyu wa 5 Kamena 2019, Umuyobozi ushinzwe gukumira no kurwanya indwara, Dr. Innocent Turate, yavuze ko buri mwaka hakirwa miliyoni eshatu z’abivuza indwara z’ubuhumekero barimo 13% bazitewe n’ihumana ry’ikirere.
Ati “Umuntu umwe kuri bane ku mwaka arwara indwara y’ubuhumekero, usanga harimo nk’ibicurane, asthma n’izindi.”
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa REMA, Eng. Collette Ruhamya, yavuze ko hari kwigwa uko imodoka zakozwe cyera zakumirwa kwinjira mu Rwanda.
Ntabwo yagaragaje neza icyo iyo nyigo imaze kugeraho ariko yavuze ko izareba uburyo hashyirwaho umwaka ntarengwa, izakozwe mbere yawo ntizemererwe kwinjira mu Rwanda.
Ati “Ku modoka zishaje, haracyigwa uko zagabanywa ndetse zikajya ku myaka runaka tuvuga ngo imodoka irengeje imyaka runaka ntiyinjire mu gihugu.”
Kugeza ubu mu Rwanda nta ruganda ruhari rukora imodoka uretse uruganda Volkswagen rw’Abadage ruzihateranyiriza.
Ati “Muziko tutazikora, tuzikura hanze, ntacyatubuza rero cyane cyane ko mu bihugu duturanye nabo bamaze kubigeraho, turagira ngo twirinde kuba abakira imyanda y’abandi banze.”
Umwaka ushize REMA yari yasabye Leta gushaka uburyo imodoka zipakira ibintu byinshi zinyura mu Mujyi zishakirwa inzira yihariye mu kubungabunga umwuka uhumekwa.
Ubwo yatangizaga imirimo ya Volkswagen mu Rwanda umwaka ushize, Perezida Kagame yavuze ko ‘Umugabane wa Afurika udakeneye gukomeza kuba ikimoteri cy’imoodka zishaje’.
Yavuze ko ‘Gutangiza imirimo yarwo mu Rwanda ari ikimenyetso cy’uko Abanyarwanda n’Abanyafurika muri rusange bakwiye ibyiza, aho guhora bahendwa n’ibyakoze’.
Yagize ati “Afurika ntikeneye kuba ikimoteri cy’imodoka zishaje cyangwa ikindi kintu cyakoreshejwe. Iyo ugiye no kureba usanga wishyuye igiciro kinini. Niba wishyura igiciro kinini ku byakoreshejwe, kuki utacyishyura ugura ikintu gishya. Afurika n’u Rwanda bakwiye ibyiza kandi ubu ni bumwe mu buryo bwo kwerekana ko bashobora kubigura.”

Title: Gutwikira kanyanga mu ruhame ntibyemewe –Eng Ruhamya
Body:
Umuyobozi w’Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe kubungabunga Ibidukikije (REMA), Eng. Colette Ruhamya, yavuze ko gutwika kanyanga ku karubanda bitemewe kuko bihumanya ikirere.
Umuyobozi w’Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe kubungabunga Ibidukikije (REMA), Eng. Colette Ruhamya, yavuze ko gutwika kanyanga ku karubanda bitemewe kuko bihumanya ikirere.
Ingaruka ziterwa n’imyuka ihumanya ikirere ni kimwe mu bibazo bihangayikishije Isi. U Rwanda by’umwihariko ruri mu bihugu bishyize imbere ingamba zitandukanye zigamije kubungabunga ikirere hirindwa gukwirakwiza imyuka ihumanya ikirere.
Umuyobozi wa REMA, Eng. Colette Ruhamya, yasabye abanyarwanda kugira uruhare mu kubungabunga ibidukikije kuko iyo bidakozwe, ingaruka zabyo zigera kuri benshi.
Yabigarutseho mu kiganiro “Zinduka” yagiranye na Radio 10 kuri uyu wa 8 Gicurasi 2019 cyavugaga ku bijyanye no kwandura kw’ikirere, urusaku rubangamira ibidukikije, kubungabunga ibishanga hamwe no guca amacupa akoreshwa rimwe.
Mu byangiza ikirere harimo impamvu kamere nk’iruka ry’ibirunga, ibikorwa bya muntu, ibinyabiziga bikoresha mazutu bisohora imyuka y’umukara ihumanya. Muri make, ibyangiza ikirere bishobora kuba imyuka iboneshwa amaso n’itaboneshwa amaso.
Ati “Gutwika ibiyorero, gutwika imbagara hamwe no gutwikira imyanda ku gasozi ni bimwe mu bihumanya ikirere. Niyo mpamvu duhora tubwira abaturage kubyirinda. Imyanda ishyirwa mu gikoresho cyabugenewe ikajyanwa aho igomba gushyirwa ikabora, hanyuma ibiyorero n’imbagara nabyo birundwa hamwe bikabora bigatanga ifumbire. Iyo ubitwitse uba wangije ikirere.”
Umwe mu bari bakurikiye iki kiganiro yabajije Eng. Ruhamya igikorwa kugira ngo gutwikira ibiyobyabwenge ku karubanda nabyo bicike.
Ati “Avuze kurwanya gutwika nibuka ko Leta itwikira urumogi na kanyanga mu ruhame. Mbariza niba imyotsi yabyo itica agakingirizo k’imirasire y’izuba.”
Eng. Ruhamya yamusubije ati “Gutwika ni bibi. N’izo kanyanga batwika ntabwo byemewe, ubwo nyine baba bakoze amakosa nk’abandi ni ugushaka umwanya tukaganira nabo ndetse bakajya babisabira uruhushya.”
Yakomeje agira ati “Ubundi gutwika hari nibyo usabira uruhushya ukaba wabyemererwa kubera impamvu runaka ariko ntabwo upfa gutwika gusa.”
Ku bijyanye n’imyanda yo kwa muganga, uyu muyobozi yavuze ko itwikirwa ahantu habugenewe kandi ngo haba hari ubushyuhe buri ku gipimo cyo hejuru cyane ku buryo itagira ingaruka ku kirere.

Title: Ellen DeGeneres yashyize mu cyamunara inkweto ashaka inkunga yo kubaka ikigo mu Rwanda
Body:
Umunyarwenya Ellen DeGeneres yashyize mu cyamunara inkweto kugira ngo akusanye amafaranga yo kubaka ikigo kizita ku ngagi zo muri Pariki y’Ibirunga mu Karere ka Musanze.
Umunyarwenya Ellen DeGeneres yashyize mu cyamunara inkweto kugira ngo akusanye amafaranga yo kubaka ikigo kizita ku ngagi zo muri Pariki y’Ibirunga mu Karere ka Musanze.
DeGeneres ni umugore w’imyaka 61 wamamaye muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika kubera ikiganiro cyamwitiriwe kuri Televiziyo kizwi nka ‘The Ellen DeGeneres Show’.
Kuri uyu wa Kabiri izi nkweto zashyizwe ku rubuga rwa interinet rwa eBay rugurirwaho ibicuruzwa bitandukanye. Rufite amabara y’umweru n’umukara, mu ruhande rwayo hashushanyijeho ingagi naho ku mupira handitseho “Ellen DeGeneres Wild Life Fund”.
Amafaranga azava muri iyi cyamunara yose azashyirwa mu kigega Ellen DeGeneres yatangije kigamije kubaka icyicaro cy’ikigo ‘Ellen DeGeneres Campus’, kibungabunga ingagi zo mu birunga mu Rwanda.
Iki kigo cyatangiye kubakwa mu Kinigi mu Karere ka Musanze ni impano Portia de Rossi yahaye DeGeneres bashyingiranwe bahuje ibitsina, ubwo yuzuzaga imyaka 60 y’amavuko.
Iki kigo kizunganira ibikorwa bisanzwe bikorwa n’Ikigega cyitiriwe Diana Fossey, bigamije gushyigikira intego za Leta y’u Rwanda mu kubungabunga ibidukikije n’umutungo kamere.
Ellen DeGeneres Campus niyo izaba irimo ibiro by’ ikigega Dian Fossey Gorilla Fund kimaze imyaka isaga 50 gikorera mu Rwanda binyuze mu gashami kacyo gashinzwe ubushakashatsi ka Karisoke Research Centre mu Karere ka Musnze.
Kizaba kirimo laboratwari, ibyumba by’inama, ibyo kwigishirizamo n’inzu ndangamateka ivuga kuri Dian Fossey wishwe mu Ukuboza 1985.
Biteganyijwe ko ikigo gishya kizafungura imiryango ku mugaragaro mu ntangiriro za 2021, gitwaye miliyoni 10 z’amadolari.
Mu minsi ishize Ellen DeGeneres yateje mu cyamunara agapupe gakoze nk’ingagi umukunzi Portia De Rossi yakuye mu Rwanda. Icyo gihe bari bamaze gukusanya asaga miliyoni $5.

Title: Igishanga cya Nyandungu kizashyirwamo ikiyaga, kigiye gushorwamo asaga miliyari 4Frw
Body:
Igishanga cya Nyandungu kiri ahazwi nko kuri 15 hagati y’Akarere ka Kicukiro n’aka Gasabo, kigiye gushorwamo asaga miliyari enye z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda, yo kugitunganya kugira ngo kibe cyakorwamo n’ibikorwa by’ubukerarugendo.
Igishanga cya Nyandungu kiri ahazwi nko kuri 15 hagati y’Akarere ka Kicukiro n’aka Gasabo, kigiye gushorwamo asaga miliyari enye z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda, yo kugitunganya kugira ngo kibe cyakorwamo n’ibikorwa by’ubukerarugendo.
Gahunda yo gutunganya iki gishanga yatangiye mu 2017 ariko nyuma iza guhagarara mu buryo butunguranye.
Abatuye muri aka gace, babwiye Radiyo Rwanda ko bari bishimiye uburyo iki gishanga cyari cyatangiye gutunganywa cyane ko byari byanatumye bamwe muri bo babona akazi.
Umwe yagize ati “Aha hantu rero hasurwa n’abantu benshi akenshi n’abazungu baba barimo, batangiye imirimo bishimisha abantu benshi ibyo bakoraga ariko nyuma ntabwo bigeze bashaka kurangiza ibyo bari barimo, ntabwo twigeze tumenya niba ari ubushobozi bwababanye buke.”
Undi ati “Hariya hirya gatoya habaga icyapa mbese bavuga ko bagiye kuhashyira ibidendezi by’amazi (pond) umuntu wese yajya ahagera akabona ko ari nk’icyitegererezo ariko urabona ko igihuru cyabaye igihuru kandi hegeranye n’ikigo cy’amashuri.”
Ubuyobozi bw Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe kubungabunga ibidukikije (REMA) bwatanze isoko ryo gutunganya iki gishanga mu 2017, buvuga ko rwiyemezamirimo wari warahawe iri soko yananiwe kuzuza ibyo yari yasabwe bituma rihabwa undi ndetse iyo mirimo ubu imaze amezi atandatu isubukuwe.
Umuyobozi wa REMA, Eng Coletta Ruhamya, yemeza ko imirimo yo kugitunganya haterwamo ibiti n’inzira y’abanyamaguru, imitako n’ibidendezi by’amazi izarangirira ku gihe.
Yagize ati ‘Ubu kampanyi irimo ni nshya, impamvu twayifashe n’uko yerekanye ko ifite ubushobozi buruta ubw’ikompani ya mbere twari twabihaye biba ngombwa ko dushaka abandi bashya bashobora kubikora bijyanye n’icyerekezo cy’igihugu n’icy’Umujyi wa Kigali.”
Rwiyemezamirimo mbere wari waratsindiye isoko ryo gutunganya iki gishanga nyuma yo kunanirwa kuharangiza yishyuwe miliyoni 360, ndetse biteganyije ko gahunda yose yo kugitunganya izarangira hashowemo miliyari enye na miliyoni zikabakaba 530 z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda.

Title: Guverinoma yashoye asaga miliyoni 900Frw mu bikoresho bizagenzura imyuka yoherezwa mu kirere
Body:
Guverinoma y’u Rwanda yashoye miliyoni 927 z’Amanyarwanda mu bikoresho bizajya byifashishwa mu kugenzura imyuka ijya mu kirere, mu rwego rwo kureba ko ingaruka z’imyuka ihumanye.
Guverinoma y’u Rwanda yashoye miliyoni 927 z’Amanyarwanda mu bikoresho bizajya byifashishwa mu kugenzura imyuka ijya mu kirere, mu rwego rwo kureba ko ingaruka z’imyuka ihumanye.
Rwanda Today ivuga ko ibi bikoresho (air quality monitors), byashyizwe mu duce 10 hirya no hino mu gihugu, aho bizajya bigenzura imyuka ijya mu kirere ku mihanda minini, inganda n’ibindi bikorwa remezo nk’ingomero z’amashanyarazi, iminara n’imiturirwa.
Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe kubungabunga ibidukikije, REMA, Eng. Coletha Ruhamya, yavuze ko ibi bikoresho byinshi byamaze kugezwa ahatoranyijwe, ahasigaye n’aho bikazahagezwa vuba.
Ati “ Buri gihe tuzajya tubasha gutanga raporo irimo amakuru asesenguye ku miterere y’ubuziranenge bw’imyuka yoherezwa mu kirere mu gihugu hose”.
Yakomeje avuga ko aya makuru azatuma babasha gusesengura umusaruro w’ingamba za politiki iriho ubu, no gutanga ibitekerezo ku byarushaho kunozwa.
Icyemezo cyo kugenzura ibirebana n’imyuka ihumanye yoherezwa muri kirere kije mu gihe hirya no hino ku Isi ubwiza bw’umwuka bukomeje kwangirika ugereranyije n’ibipimo byemewe by’Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye ryita ku Buzima, OMS.
Inyandiko yakozwe mu 2018 ku mvano y’ihumana ry’ikirere yagaragaje ko imyotsi irekurwa n’ibinyabiziga n’itwikwa rya ‘biomass’ biri mu bikomeje kwangiza ikirere cy’u Rwanda, by’umwihariko mu bice by’imijyi.
Umushakashatsi akaba n’Umunyamabanga Mukuru w’Urwego rushinzwe ubuziranenge muri Afurika, Hermogene Nsengimana, yavuze ko kuba hatabagaho ibikoresho byifashishwa mu kugenzura ibirebana n’imyuka yoherezwaga mu kirere, byatumaga bigorana gutanga impuruza igihe ingaruka zishobora kuba nyinshi ku baturage.
Ati “ Turizera ko u Rwanda rugiye kubera icyitegererezo ibindi bihugu nabyo bigafata iki cyemezo nka kimwe mu biganisha ku igerwaho ry’intego z’iterambere rirambye, no kugabanya umubare w’abahitanwa no guhumeka umwuka uhumanye”.
Ibi bikoresho bizakoreshwa mu kugenzura imiterere y’imyuka yoherezwa mu kirere byashyizwe mu duce turimo; Rusizi, Rubavu, Nyabihu, Gicumbi, Byimana, Kirehe, Kayonza, Nyagatare n’Umujyi wa Kigali.

Title: Umushinga wa Dr Nsengimana wo kubungabunga imisambi wahembwe miliyoni 50 Frw
Body:
Dr Nsengimana Olivier watangije umushinga wo kwita ku misambi yari iri gucika mu Rwanda yahawe igihembo mpuzamahanga cyo kubungabunga urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima kizwi nka ‘Future For Nature Award 2019’.
Dr Nsengimana Olivier watangije umushinga wo kwita ku misambi yari iri gucika mu Rwanda yahawe igihembo mpuzamahanga cyo kubungabunga urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima kizwi nka ‘Future For Nature Award 2019’.
Uyu Munyarwanda w’imyaka 34 na Fernanda Abra ukomoka muri Brésil n’Umuhinde Divya Karnad batoranyijwe buri wese azahabwa 50,000 by’ama-euro, akabakaba miliyoni 50 Frw.
Dr Nsengimana yahembwe mu bagera ku 125 bagaragaje imishinga yo kubungabunga urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima. Umushinga we watsinze ni uwo guteza imbere imyororokere no kurinda imisambi igenda izimira.
Igihembo cya Future For Nature (FFN) yahawe azagishyikirizwa mu birori bizabera muri pariki nto ya ‘Royal Burgers’ Zoo’ mu Mujyi wa Arnhem mu Buholandi, ku wa 4 Gicurasi 2019.
Dr Nsengimana yabwiye IGIHE ko iki gihembo kizamufasha kongera imbaraga mu bikorwa byo kubungabunga urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima.
Yagize ati “Birashimishije cyane. Sinjye wahembwe ahubwo ni igihembo cy’umushinga, ni ishimwe ku bo dukorana n’igihugu kuko u Rwanda rufite umwihariko wo kwihutisha ibikorwa kubera imikoranire n’inzego kandi umusaruro ukagaragara mu gihe gito.’’
Yakomeje avuga ko “U Rwanda rufite ubushake bwo kubungabunga urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima. Kubona igihugu kivugwa birashimishije kandi bizamura isura yacyo.’’
Ibikorwa Dr Nsengimana amazemo imyaka ine byo kubungabunga ibinyabuzima abifatanya na leta harwanywa ubucuruzi bw’imisambi butumwa ihigwa, ikanagurishwa ku bashaka kuyitunga mu ngo zabo.
Yagize ati “Abayitunga batumaga igabanuka, imwe igapfa mu gihe bayihiga. Twaganiriye n’abayifite bemera kuyiduha tuyisubiza muri Pariki y’Akagera. Abanyamahanga batangazwa n’uburyo Abanyarwanda bakorana bakagera kuri iyi ntego.’’
Imishinga ihanzwe amaso mu kubungabunga imisambi
Dr Nsengimana wabaye umuganga w’ingagi yatangije Ikigo kirengera Inyamaswa zo mu Gasozi (RWCA) mu 2014 nyuma yo kubona ko hari inyamaswa ziri gucika zirimo n’imisambi.
Yagize igitekerezo cyo gutanga umusanzu we mu kubungabunga imisambi kubera iyapfuye bayihiga, iyagejejwe mu ngo z’abantu igakatwa amababa bigatuma itisanzura uko bikwiye.
RWCA ifite abakozi 15 n’abakorerabushake 55 bafasha mu kubungabunga imisambi yarimo ikendera mu gihugu no ku Isi muri rusange bitewe no kuyicuruza binyuranye n’amategeko.
Dr Nsengimana yavuze ko “Igihembo twahawe kizadufasha kongera ubushobozi bw’abo dukorana, bakaba ba ambasaderi b’ibikorwa byacu. Tukabaha smartphone, bakatugezaho amakuru mu gihe nyacyo, bakanakorana n’inzego z’ibanze. Turateganya no gukomeza kubarura imisambi no kubaka ikoranabuhanga rizadufasha kureba aho iri n’ibyo irya ku buryo tumenya aho kongera imbaraga.’’
Mu Rwanda habarurwa imisambi 500 iri mu gasozi, irimo iyari isanzwemo n’iyasubijweyo kuva mu 2016. Igikorwa cyo kuyibarura kirakomeje ndetse Abanyarwanda basabwa kukigiramo uruhare.
Uyu muganga yatanze inama yo kudatunga imisambi cyangwa izindi nyamaswa zo mu gasozi mu ngo.
Ati “Ntibyemewe keretse ababifitiye uburenganzira bwa leta. Inyamaswa zishobora kuzana uburwayi bwakwanduza imiryango. Abafite imisambi bataramenyekanisha, byaba byiza bayibaruje kuko yose igiye gukurwa mu ngo z’abantu. Abazaba bakiyifite bashobora kuzahura n’amategeko.’’
Mu 2017, Umuryango utera inkunga abantu bafite ibitekerezo by’ubuvumbuzi n’ubushakashatsi mu bijyanye n’Ubumenyi bw’Isi ‘National Geographic Society’, wahembye Dr. Nsengimana kubera ibikorwa bye byo guteza imbere imyororokere no kurinda imisambi igenda izimira mu rusobe rw’ibinyabuzima. Mu 2014, yari yatsindiye igihembo cya Rolex.

Title: Kigali Marriott yabimburiye izindi hotel mu guca ikoreshwa ry’imiheha ya plastique
Body:
Kigali Marriott Hotel yabaye iya mbere ibimburiye izindi mu gushyira mu bikorwa umwanzuro wafashwe na Marriott International wo kurengera ibidukikije binyuze mu guca ikoreshwa ry’imiheha ikozwe muri plastique.
Kigali Marriott Hotel yabaye iya mbere ibimburiye izindi mu gushyira mu bikorwa umwanzuro wafashwe na Marriott International wo kurengera ibidukikije binyuze mu guca ikoreshwa ry’imiheha ikozwe muri plastique.
Muri Nyakanga 2018 nibwo Marriott International yafashe umwanzuro wo kugabanya ikoreshwa ry’imiheha ya plastique muri hotel zayo zisaga 6500 ziri hirya no hino ku Isi.
Icyo gihe Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Marriott International, Arne Sorenson, yatangaje ko batewe ishema no kuba kimwe mu bigo binini muri Amerika bifasha umwanzuro wo guhagarika ikoreshwa ry’imiheha ya plastique mu mashami ari hirya no hino ku Isi.
Ati “Guhagarika ikoreshwa ry’imiheha ya plastique ni uburyo bworoshye abakiliya bacu bashobora gukoresha mu kugira uruhare mu kugabanya ikoreshwa rya plastique igihe bacumbitse iwacu. Igikorwa gisanzwe kibahangayikishije kandi batangiye gushyira mu bikorwa mu ngo zabo”.
Mu ntego iki kigo cyihaye ni uko kugera muri Nyakanga 2019, uyu mwanzuro uzaba wamaze gushyirwa mu bikorwa aho bateganya kujya bagabanya imiheha isaga miliyari imwe yakoreshwaga buri mwaka.
Iyi gahunda yo guhindura ubwoko bw’imiheha ikoreshwa yahise itangira gushyirwa mu bikorwa na hotel zirimo Kigali Marriott, ni imwe mu bikorwa byinshi Marriott International ikomeje gukora mu rwego rwo kurushaho kubungabunga no kurengera ibidukikije.
Mu ntangiriro za 2018, Marriott yatangiye gusimbuza ubwoko bw’amacupa arimo ibikoresho by’isuku byifashishwa mu bwiherero, igikorwa cyitezweho kugabanya amacupa asaga miliyoni 35 buri mwaka.
Uyu mwanzuro ushyizwe mu bikorwa mu gihe Inama y’Abaminisitiri idasanzwe yateranye ku wa 28 Mutarama 2019, yemeje umushinga w’Itegeko ryerekeye kubuza ikorwa, itumizwa mu mahanga, ikoreshwa n’icuruzwa ry’ibikoresho bikozwe muri plastique bikoreshwa inshuro imwe.
Minisitiri w’Ibidukikije, Vincent Biruta, yasobanuye ko uyu mushinga ugamije guca ibikoresho bya plastique bitari amashashi bigenda bikwira hose nk’imiheha, udukombe, amacupa, amasahani, amakanya, ibiyiko n’ibindi bikoreshwa rimwe ugasanga birajugunywe kandi bitazabora.
Yavuze ko bazahera ku dukombe n’imiheha ya plastique kuko abantu batabikoresheje ntacyo baba, iyi miheha yo bikaba bishoboka ko yasimbuzwa indi ikozwe mu mpapuro zishobora kubora ari nayo kuri ubu Kigali Marriott ikoresha.
Iri tegeko rigiye kujyaho nyuma y’imyaka isaga 10 Leta y’u Rwanda iciye ikoreshwa ry’amashashi aho yanashyizeho itegeko rihana ababirenzeho, ibi byatumye ruza mu bihugu 40 ku Isi byateye intambwe mu kurengera ibidukikije.
